original: pavattaṃ vā vacanaṃ vibhatti bhummavacanaṃ, tena yuttaṃ tathā, sattamīvibhattiyuttapadanti
analyzed: pavattam vā vacanam vibhatti bhumma vacanam tena yuttam tathā sattamī vibhatti yutta padanti

original: attho. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – kāmaṃ bhagavā ambavaneyeva viharati. Tassamīpattā pana
analyzed: atthaḥ idam vuttam hoti kāmam bhagavā ambavaneyā iva viharati tad samīpa ttā pana

original: gocaragāmadassanatthaṃ bhummavacanavasena “rājagahe”tipi vuttaṃ yathā taṃ “gaṅgāyaṃ
analyzed: gocara gāma dassana attham bhumma vacana vasena rāja gaha iti pi vuttam yathā tam

original: gāvo caranti, kūpe gaggakula”nti cāti. Aneneva yadi bhagavā rājagahe viharati, atha
analyzed: gāvaḥ caranti kūpe ca ati anena iva yadi bhagavā rājagahe viharati atha

original: na vattabbaṃ “ambavane”ti. Yadi ca ambavane, evampi na vattabbaṃ “rājagahe”ti. Na
analyzed: na vattabbam ambavane iti yadi ca ambavane evam pi na vattabbam rājagahe iti na

original: hi “pāṭaliputte pāsāde vasatī”tiādīsu viya idha adhikaraṇādhikaraṇassa abhāvato adhikaraṇassa
analyzed: hi pāṭaliputte pāsāde vasati itiādīsu viya idha adhikaraṇa adhikaraṇassa abhāvataḥ adhikaraṇassa

original: dvayaniddeso yutto siyāti codanā anavakāsā katāti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Kumārabhato eva komārabhacco

original: sakatthavuttipaccayena, niruttinayena vā yathā “bhisaggameva bhesajja”nti. “Yathāhā”tiādinā
analyzed: sa kattha vutti paccayena nirutti nayena vā yathā bhisaggam eva bhesajjanti yathā āha ātiādinā

original: khandhakapāḷivasena tadatthaṃ sādheti. Kasmā ca ambavanaṃ jīvakasambandhaṃ katvā

original: vuttanti anuyogena mūlato paṭṭhāya tamatthaṃ dassento “ayaṃ panā”tiādimāha.
analyzed: vuttam ti anuyogena mūlataḥ paṭṭhāya tam attham dassentaḥ ayam pana iti ādim āha

original: Dosābhisannanti vātapittādivasena ussannadosaṃ. Virecetvāti dosappakopato vivecetvā.
analyzed: dosa abhisannam iti vāta pitta ādi vasena ussanna dosam virecetvā iti dosa ppakopataḥ vivecetvā

original: Siveyyakaṃ dussayuganti siviraṭṭhe jātaṃ mahagghaṃ dussayugaṃ. Divasassa dvattikkhattunti
analyzed: siveyyakam dussa yuganti siviraṭṭhe jātam mahaggham dussa yugam divasassa dvatti khattunti

original: ekasseva divasassa dvivāre vā tivāre vā bhāge, bhummatthe vā etaṃ sāmivacanaṃ, ekasmiṃyeva

original: Sacīvarabhattenāti cīvarena, bhattena ca. “Taṃ sandhāyā”ti iminā na bhagavā ambavanamatteyeva

original: Aḍḍhena teḷasa aḍḍhateḷasa. Tādisehi bhikkhusatehi. Aḍḍho panettha satasseva. Yena

analyzed: satassa vai aḍḍham tathā

original: Rājatīti attano issariyasampattiyā dibbati sobhati ca. Rañjetīti dānādinā, sassamedhādinā

original: vā tabbāsikānaṃ gahitattā. Raññoti pitu bimbisārarañño. Sasati hiṃsatīti sattu, verī,
analyzed: vā tad bāsikānam gahita ttā rañño ti pitu bimbisāra rañño sasati hiṃsati iti verī

original: ajātoyeva sattu ajātasattu. “Nemittakehi niddiṭṭho”ti vacanena ca ajātassa tassa

original: ajātoyevesa rañño sattūtipi vadanti.

original: “Tasmi”ntiādinā tadatthaṃ vivarati, samattheti ca. Dohaḷoti abhilāso. Bhāriyeti garuke,

original: aññesaṃ asakkuṇeyye vā. Asakkontīti asakkuṇamānā. Akathentīti akathayamānā samānā.

original: Nibandhitvāti vacasā bandhitvā. Suvaṇṇasatthakenāti suvaṇṇamayena satthakena, ghanasuvaṇṇakatenāti

original: attho. Ayomayañhi rañño sarīraṃ upanetuṃ ayuttanti vadanti. Suvaṇṇaparikkhatena vā
analyzed: atthaḥ ayaḥ mayam hi raññaḥ sarīram upanetum ayuttam ti vadanti suvaṇṇa parikkhatena vā

original: pavattatīti oparajjaṃ, ṭhānantaraṃ.
analyzed: pavattati iti

original: Mahāti mahatī. Samāse viya hi vākyepi mahantasaddassa mahādeso. Dhurāti gaṇassa dhurabhūtā,

original: nibbattaneyeva dissati “makkaṭako nāma devaputto hutvā nibbatti kaṇṭako nāma…pe…
analyzed: nibbattaneya iva dissati makkaṭakaḥ nāma deva puttaḥ hutvā nibbatti kaṇṭakaḥ nāma pe

original: nibbatti, maṇḍūko nāma…pe… nibbattī”tiādīsu viya. Dvinnaṃ vā padānaṃ bhāvatthamapekkhitvā
analyzed: nibbatti maṇḍūkaḥ nāmape nibbatti iti ādīsu viya dvinnam vā padānam bhāva ttham apekkhitvā

original: “yakkho”tiādīsu sāmiatthe paccattavacanaṃ kataṃ purimāya pacchimavisesanato, paricārakassa…pe…
analyzed: yakkha iti ādīsu sāmi atthe paccatta vacanam katam purimāya pacchima visesanato paricāra kassape

original: yakkhassa bhāvena nibbattīti attho, hetvatthe vā ettha tvā-saddo yakkhassa bhāvato
analyzed: yakkhassa bhāvena nibbatti iti atthaḥ hetvatthe vā ettha tvāsaddaḥ yakkhassa bhāvato

original: pavattanahetūti. Assa pana rañño mahāpuññassapi samānassa tattha bahulaṃ nibbattapubbatāya
analyzed: pavattana hetū ti assa pana raññaḥ mahāpuññassa api samānassa tattha bahulam nibbatta pubba tāya

original: ciraparicitanikanti vasena tattheva nibbatti veditabbā.
analyzed: cira paricita nikanti vasena tattha eva nibbatti veditabbā

original: Taṃ divasamevāti rañño maraṇadivaseyeva. Khobhetvāti puttasnehassa balavabhāvato,
analyzed: tam divasam evā ti raññaḥ maraṇa divaseya iva khobhetvā ati putta snehassa balava bhāvato

original: taṃsahajātapīti vegassa ca savipphāratāya taṃ samuṭṭhānarūpadhammehi pharaṇavasena
analyzed: tam sahajāta pīti vegassa ca sa vipphāra tāya tam samuṭṭhāna rūpa dhammehi pharaṇa vasena

original: sakalasarīraṃ āloḷetvā. Tenāha “aṭṭhimiñjaṃ āhacca aṭṭhāsī”ti. Pituguṇanti pituno
analyzed: sakala sarīram āloḷetvā tena āha aṭṭhimiñjam aṭṭhāsi iti

original: attani sinehaguṇaṃ. Tena vuttaṃ “mayi jātepī”tiādi. Vissajjetha vissajjethāti turitavasena,
analyzed: sineha guṇam tena vuttam mayi jāte pi itiādi vissajjetha vissajjetha ati turita vasena

original: sokavasena ca vuttaṃ.
analyzed: soka vasena ca vuttam

original: Anuṭṭhubhitvāti achaḍḍetvā.
analyzed: anuṭṭhubhitvā iti a chaḍḍetvā

original: Nāḷāgirihatthiṃ muñcāpetvāti ettha iti-saddo pakārattho, tena “abhimārakapurisapesenādippakārenā”ti
analyzed: nāḷā giri hatthim muñca āpetvā ati ettha iti saddo pakāra attho tena abhimāraka purisa pesena ādi ppakārena ati

original: pubbe vuttappakārattayaṃ paccāmasati, katthaci pana so na diṭṭho. Pañca vatthūnīti
analyzed: pubbe vutta ppakāra ttayam paccāmasati katthaci pana so na diṭṭho pañca vatthūni iti

original: “sādhu bhante bhikkhū yāvajīvaṃ āraññikā assū”tiādinā vinaye vuttāni pañca vatthūni.
analyzed: sādhu bhante bhikkhū yāvajīvam āraññikāḥ assu iti ādinā vinaye vuttāni pañca vatthūni

original: Yācitvāti ettha yācanaṃ viya katvāti attho. Na hi so paṭipajjitukāmo yācatīti ayamattho
analyzed: yācitvā iti ettha yācanam viya katvā iti atthaḥ na hi saḥ paṭipajjitu kāmaḥ yācati iti ayam atthaḥ

original: vinaye vuttoyeva. Saññāpessāmīti cintetvā saṅghabhedaṃ katvāti sambandho. Idañca
analyzed: vinaye vuttaḥ yā iva saññāpessāmi iti cintetvā saṅgha bhedam katvā iti sambandhaḥ idam ca

original: tassa anikkhittadhuratādassanavasena vuttaṃ, so pana akatepi saṅghabhede tehi saññāpetiyeva.
analyzed: tassa a nikkhitta dhura tā dassana vasena vuttam saḥ pana a kate pi saṅgha bhede tehi saññā apetiyā iva

original: Uṇhalohitanti balavasokasamuṭṭhitaṃ uṇhabhūtaṃ lohitaṃ. Mahānirayeti avīciniraye.
analyzed: uṇha lohitam ti balava soka samuṭṭhitam uṇha bhūtam lohitam mahāniraya iti avīci niraye

original: Vitthārakathānayoti ajātasattupasādanādivasena vitthārato vattabbāya kathāya nayamattaṃ.
analyzed: vitthāra kathā nayo ti ajāta sattu pasādana ādi vasena vitthārataḥ vattabbāya kathāya naya mattam

original: Kasmā panettha sā na vuttā, nanu saṅgītikathā viya khandhake āgatāpi sā vattabbāti
analyzed: kasmā pana ittha sā na vuttā nanu saṅgīti kathā viya khandhake āgatā api sā vattabbā ti

original: codanāya āha “āgatattā pana sabbaṃ na vutta”nti, khandhake āgatattā, kiñcimattassa
analyzed: codanāya āha āgata ttā pana sabbam na vuttan ti khandhake āgata ttā kiñcimattassa

original: ca vacanakkamassa vuttattā na ettha koci virodhoti adhippāyo. “Eva”ntiādi yathānusandhinā nigamanaṃ.
analyzed: ca vacana kkamassa vutta ttā na ettha koci virodhaḥ ti adhippāyaḥ eva ntiādi yathā anusandhinā nigamanam

original: Kosalaraññoti pasenadikosalassa pitu mahākosalarañño. Nanu videhassa rañño dhītā
analyzed: kosala rañño ti pasenadi kosalassa pitu mahākosala rañño nanu videhassa rañño dhītā

original: vedehīti attho sambhavatīti codanamapaneti “na videharañño”ti iminā. Atha kenaṭṭhenāti
analyzed: vedehī iti attho sambhavati iti codanam apaneti na videha raññā iti iminā atha kenaṭṭhena ati

original: āha “paṇḍitādhivacanameta”nti, paṇḍitavevacanaṃ, paṇḍitanāmanti vā attho. Ayaṃ pana
analyzed: āha paṇḍita adhivacanam etat ti paṇḍita vevacanam paṇḍita nāmanti vā atthaḥ ayam pana

original: padattho kena nibbacanenāti vuttaṃ “tatrāya”ntiādi. Vidantīti jānanti. Vedenāti karaṇabhūtena
analyzed: padatthaḥ kena nibbacanena ati vuttam tatra āyanti ādi vidanti iti jānanti vedena ati karaṇa bhūtena

original: ñāṇena. “Īhatī”ti etassa pavattatītipi attho ṭīkāyaṃ vutto. Vedehīti idha nadādigaṇoti āha “vedehiyā”ti.
analyzed: ñāṇena īhati iti etassa pavattati iti pi atthaḥ ṭīkā ayam vuttaḥ vedehī iti idha nada ādi gaṇaḥ ti āha vedehiyā iti

original: Soyeva aho tadaho, sattamīvacanena pana “tadahū”ti padasiddhi. Etthāti etasmiṃ divase.
analyzed: aho tat aho sattamī vacanena pana tat aho iti ettha ati etasmin divase

original: Upasaddena visiṭṭho vasasaddo upavasaneyeva, na vasanamatte, upavasanañca samādānamevāti
analyzed: upa saddena visiṭṭhaḥ vasa saddaḥ upavasane iva iva na vasanam atte upavasanam ca samādānam eva ati

original: dassetuṃ “sīlenā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Ettha ca sīlenāti sāsane ariyuposathaṃ sandhāya vuttaṃ.
analyzed: dassetum sīlena atiādi vuttam ettha ca sīlena ati sāsane ariya uposatham sandhāya vuttam

original: Anasanenāti abhuñjanamattasaṅkhātaṃ bāhiruposathaṃ. Vā-saddo cettha aniyamattho,
analyzed: an asanena ati abhuñjana matta saṅkhātam bāhis uposatham vā saddaḥ ca ittha aniyama attho

original: tena ekaccaṃ manoduccaritaṃ, dussīlyādiñca saṅgaṇhāti. Tathā hi gopālakuposatho abhijjhāsahagatassa
analyzed: tena ekaccam manaḥ duccaritam dussīlya ādiñca saṅgaṇhāti tathā hi gopālaka uposathaḥ abhijjhā sahagatassa

original: cittassa vasena vutto, nigaṇṭhuposatho mosavajjādivasena. Yathāha visākhuposathe
analyzed: cittassa vasena vuttaḥ nigaṇṭha uposathaḥ mosa vajja ādi vasena yathā āha visākha uposathe

original: “so tena abhijjhāsahagatena cetasā divasaṃ atināmetī”ti, “iti yasmiṃ samaye sacce
analyzed: saḥ tena abhijjhā sahagatena cetasā divasam atināmeti iti iti yasmin samaye sacce

original: samādapetabbā, musāvāde tasmiṃ samaye samādapetī”ti ca ādi.
analyzed: samādapetabbā musāvāde tasmin samaye samādapeti iti ca ādi

original: Evaṃ adhippetatthānurūpaṃ nibbacanaṃ dassetvā idāni atthuddhāravasena nibbacanānurūpaṃ
analyzed: evam adhippeta ttha anurūpam nibbacanam dassetvā idāni attha uddhāra vasena nibbacana anurūpam

original: adhippetatthaṃ dassetuṃ “ayaṃ panā”tiādimāha. Etthāti uposathasadde. Samānasaddavacanīyānaṃ
analyzed: adhippeta attham dassetum ayam pana iti ādim āha ettha iti uposatha sadde

original: anekappabhedānaṃ atthānamuddharaṇaṃ atthuddhāro samānasaddavacanīyesu vā atthesu
analyzed: aneka ppabhedānam atthānam uddharaṇam atthuddhāraḥ samāna sadda vacanīyesu vā atthesu

original: adhippetasseva atthassa uddharaṇaṃ atthuddhārotipi vaṭṭati. Anekatthadassanañhi adhippetatthassa
analyzed: adhippetassa iva atthassa uddharaṇam atthuddhāraḥ ti pi vaṭṭati aneka attha dassanam hi adhippeta tthassa

original: uddharaṇatthameva. Nanu ca “atthamattaṃ pati saddā abhinivisantī”tiādinā atthuddhāre
analyzed: uddharaṇa attham eva nanu ca attham attam saddāḥ abhinivisanti iti ādinā attha uddhāre

original: codanā, sodhanā ca heṭṭhā vuttāyeva. Apica visesasaddassa avācakabhāvato pātimokkhuddesādivisayopi
analyzed: codanā sodhanā ca heṭṭhā vuttāya iva apica visesa saddassa avācaka bhāvato pātimokkha uddesa ādi visayaḥ api

original: uposathasaddo sāmaññarūpo eva, atha kasmā pātimokkhuddesādivisesavisayo vuttoti?
analyzed: uposatha saddo sāmañña rūpaḥ eva atha kasmā pātimokkha uddesa ādi visesa visayaḥ vuttaḥ ti

original: Saccametaṃ, ayaṃ panattho tādisaṃ saddasāmaññamanādiyitvā tattha tattha sambhavatthadassanavaseneva
analyzed: saccam etam ayam pana atthaḥ tādisam sadda sāmaññam an ādiyitvā tattha tattha sambhavattha dassana vasena iva

original: vuttoti, evaṃ sabbattha. Sīladiṭṭhivasena (sīlasuddhivasena dī. ni. ṭī. 1.150) upetehi
analyzed: vuttaḥ ti evam sabbattha sīla diṭṭhi vasena sīla suddhi vasena upetehi

original: samaggehi vasīyati na uṭṭhīyatīti uposatho, pātimokkhuddeso. Samādānavasena, adhiṭṭhānavasena
analyzed: samaggehi vasīyati na uṭṭhīyati iti uposathaḥ pātimokkha uddeso samādāna vasena adhiṭṭhāna vasena

original: vā upecca ariyavāsādiatthāya vasitabbo āvasitabboti uposatho, sīlaṃ. Anasanādivasena
analyzed: vā upecca ariya vāsa ādi atthāya vasitabbo āvasitabbaḥ iti uposathaḥ sīlam an asana ādi vasena

original: upecca vasitabbo anuvasitabboti uposatho, vatasamādānasaṅkhāto upavāso. Navamahatthikulapariyāpanne
analyzed: upecca vasitabbaḥ anuvasitabbaḥ ti uposathaḥ vata samādāna saṅkhātaḥ upavāsaḥ nava mahatthi kula pariyāpanne

original: hatthināge kiñci kiriyamanapekkhitvā taṃkulasambhūtatāmattaṃ pati ruḷhivaseneva uposathoti
analyzed: hatthi nāge kiñci kiriyam an apekkhitvā taṃ kula sambhūta tā mattam pati ruḷhi vasena iva

original: samaññā, tasmā tattha nāmapaññatti veditabbā. Arayo upagantvā useti dāhetīti uposatho,
analyzed: samaññā tasmā tattha nāma paññatti veditabbā arayaḥ upagantvā usā iti dāheti iti uposathaḥ

original: usasaddo dāhetipi saddavidū vadanti. Divase pana uposatha saddapavatti aṭṭhakathāyaṃ
analyzed: usa saddaḥ dāha iti pi sadda vidū vadanti divase pana uposatha sadda pavatti

original: vuttāyeva. “Suddhassa ve sadāphaggū”tiādīsu suddhassāti sabbaso kilesamalābhāvena
analyzed: vuttāya iva suddhassa ve sadā phaggu iti ādīsu suddhassa ati sabbasas kilesa mala abhāvena

original: parisuddhassa. Veti nipātamattaṃ, byattanti vā attho. Sadāti niccakālampi. Phaggūti
analyzed: parisuddhassa vā iti nipāta mattam byattanti vā attho sadā ati nicca kālam pi phaggū iti

original: phagguṇīnakkhattameva yuttaṃ bhavati, niruttinayena cetassa siddhi. Yassa hi sundarikabhāradvājassa
analyzed: phagguṇī nakkhattam eva yuttam bhavati nirutti nayena yassa hi sundarika bhāradvājassa

original: nāma brāhmaṇassa phagguṇamāse uttaraphagguṇīyuttadivase titthanhānaṃ karontassa saṃvaccharampi
analyzed: nāma brāhmaṇassa phagguṇa māse uttara phagguṇī yutta divase tittha nhānam karontassa saṃvaccharam pi

original: katapāpapavāhanaṃ hotīti laddhi. Tato taṃ vivecetuṃ idaṃ majjhimāgamāvare mūlapaṇṇāsake
analyzed: hoti iti tatas tam vivecetum idam majjhima āgama avare mūla paṇṇāsake

original: vatthasutte bhagavatā vuttaṃ. Suddhassuposatho sadāti yathāvuttakilesamalasuddhiyā
analyzed: vattha sutte bhagavatā vuttam suddhaḥ uposathaḥ sadā ati yathā vutta kilesa mala suddhiyā

original: parisuddhassa uposathaṅgāni, vatasamādānāni ca asamādiyatopi niccakālaṃ uposathavāso
analyzed: parisuddhassa uposathaṅgāni vata samādānāni ca a samādiyataḥ pi niccakālam uposatha vāso

original: eva bhavatīti attho. “Na bhikkhave”tiādīsu “abhikkhuko āvāso na gantabbo”ti nīharitvā
analyzed: eva bhavati iti atthaḥ na bhikkhava iti ādīsu abhikkhukaḥ āvāsaḥ na gantabbaḥ ti nīharitvā

original: sambandho. Upavasitabbadivasoti upavasanakaraṇadivaso, adhikaraṇe vā tabbasaddo daṭṭhabbo.
analyzed: sambandhaḥ upavasitabba divasaḥ iti upavasana karaṇa divasaḥ adhikaraṇe vā tabba saddaḥ daṭṭhabbo

original: Evañhi aṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttanibbacanena sameti. Antogadhāvadhāraṇena, aññatthāpohanena
analyzed: evam hi aṭṭhakathā ayam vutta nibbacanena sameti anta gadha avadhāraṇena aññattha apohanena

original: ca nivāraṇaṃ sandhāya “sesadvayanivāraṇattha”nti vuttaṃ. “Pannarase”ti padamārabbha
analyzed: ca nivāraṇam sandhāya sesa dvaya nivāraṇa atthanti vuttam pannarasa iti padam ārabbha

original: divasavasena yathāvuttanibbacanaṃ katanti dassento “teneva vutta”ntiādimāha. Pañcadasannaṃ
analyzed: divasa vasena yathā vutta nibbacanam katanti dassentaḥ tena iva vutta nti ādim āha

original: tithīnaṃ pūraṇavasena “pannaraso”ti hi divaso vutto.
analyzed: tithīnam pūraṇa vasena pannarasaḥ iti hi divasaḥ vutto

original: “Tāni ettha santī”ti ettakeyeva vutte nanvetāni aññatthāpi santīti codanā siyāti
analyzed: tāni ettha santi iti ettake iya iva vutte nanu etāni aññattha api santi iti codanā siyāti

original: taṃ nivāretuṃ “tadā kirā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Anena bahuso, atisayato vā ettha taddhitavisayo
analyzed: tam nivāretum tadā kirāti ādi vuttam anena bahusas ati sayataḥ vā ettha taddhita visayaḥ

original: payuttoti dasseti. Cātumāsī, cātumāsinīti ca paccayavisesena itthiliṅgeyeva pariyāyavacanaṃ.
analyzed: payuttaḥ ti dasseti cātumāsī cātumāsinī iti ca paccaya visesena itthi liṅgeya iva pariyāya vacanam

original: Pariyosānabhūtāti ca pūraṇabhāvameva sandhāya vadati tāya saheva catumāsaparipuṇṇabhāvato.
analyzed: ca pūraṇa bhāvam eva sandhāya vadati tāya saha iva catu māsa paripuṇṇa bhāvataḥ

original: Idhāti pāḷiyaṃ. Tīhi ākārehi pūretīti puṇṇāti atthaṃ dasseti “māsapuṇṇatāyā”tiādinā.
analyzed: idha āti pāḷiyam tīhi ākārehi pūreti iti puṇṇā ati attham dasseti māsa puṇṇa tāya ati ādinā

original: Tattha tadā kattikamāsassa puṇṇatāya māsapuṇṇatā. Purimapuṇṇamito hi paṭṭhāya yāva
analyzed: tattha tadā kattika māsassa puṇṇa tāya māsa puṇṇa tā purima puṇṇa mitaḥ hi paṭṭhāya yāva

original: aparā puṇṇamī, tāva eko māsoti tattha vohāro. Vassānassa utuno puṇṇatāya utupuṇṇatā.
analyzed: aparā puṇṇamī tāva ekaḥ māso ti tattha vohāraḥ vassānassa utuno puṇṇa tāya utu puṇṇa tā

original: Kattikamāsalakkhitassa saṃvaccharassa puṇṇatāya saṃvaccharapuṇṇatā. Purimakattikamāsato
analyzed: kattika māsa lakkhitassa saṃvaccharassa puṇṇa tāya saṃvacchara puṇṇa tā purima kattika māsataḥ

original: pabhuti yāva aparakattikamāso, tāva eko kattikasaṃvaccharoti evaṃ saṃvaccharapuṇṇatāyāti
analyzed: yāva apara kattika māso tāva ekaḥ kattika saṃvaccharaḥ iti evam saṃvacchara puṇṇa tāyai ati

original: vuttaṃ hoti. Lokikānaṃ matena pana māsavasena saṃvaccharasamaññā lakkhitā. Tathā
analyzed: vuttam hoti lokikānam matena pana māsa vasena saṃvacchara samaññā lakkhitā tathā

original: ca lakkhaṇaṃ garusaṅkantivasena. Vuttañhi jotisatthe –
analyzed: ca lakkhaṇam garu saṅkanti vasena vuttañhi jotisatthe

original: “Nakkhattena sahodaya-matthaṃ yāti sūramanti;
analyzed: nakkhattena saha udayam attham yāti

original: Tassa saṅkaṃ tatra vattabbaṃ, vassaṃ māsakamenevā”ti.
analyzed: tassa saṅkam tatra vattabbam vassam māsa kamena iva ati

original: Minīyati divaso etenāti mā. Tassa hi gatiyā divaso minitabbo “pāṭipado dutiyā, tatiyā”tiādinā.
analyzed: minīyati divasaḥ etena ati mā tassa hi gatiyā divasaḥ minitabbo pāṭipadaḥ dutiyā tatiyā atiādinā

original: Ettha puṇṇoti etissā rattiyā sabbakalāpāripūriyā puṇṇo. Candassa hi soḷasamo bhāgo
analyzed: ettha puṇṇaḥ ti etissā rattiyā sabba kalāpa aripūriyā puṇṇaḥ candassa hi soḷasamaḥ bhāgaḥ

original: “kalā”ti vuccati, tadā ca cando sabbāsampi soḷasannaṃ kalānaṃ vasena paripuṇṇo hutvā
analyzed: kalā ati vuccati tadā ca cando sabbāsam pi soḷasannam kalānam vasena paripuṇṇaḥ hutvā

original: dissati. Ettha ca “tadahuposathe pannarase”ti padāni divasavasena vuttāni, “komudiyā”tiādīni
analyzed: dissati ettha ca tad ahu posathe pannarasā iti padāni divasa vasena vuttāni komudiyā ati ādīni

original: tadekadesarattivasena.
analyzed: tad eka desa ratti vasena

original: Kasmā pana rājā amaccaparivuto nisinno, na ekakovāti codanāya sodhanālesaṃ dassetuṃ
analyzed: kasmai pana rājā amacca parivutaḥ nisinnaḥ na ekakaḥ uvā ati codanāya sodhana ālesam dassetum

original: pāḷipadatthameva avatvā “evarūpāyā”tiādīnipi vadati. Etehi cāyaṃ sodhanāleso dassito
analyzed: pāḷi pada attham eva avatvā vadati etehi ca ayam sodhana ālesaḥ dassito

original: “evaṃ ruciyamānāya rattiyā tadā pavattattā tathā parivuto nisinno”ti. Dhoviyamānadisābhāgāyāti
analyzed: evam ruciyamānāya rattiyā tadā tathā parivutaḥ nisinnaḥ ti dhoviyamāna disābhāgāya ati

original: etthāpi viyasaddo yojetabbo. Rajatavimānaniccharitehīti rajatavimānato nikkhantehi,
analyzed: ettha api viya saddaḥ yojetabbaḥ rajata vimāna niccharitehi iti rajata vimānataḥ nikkhantehi

original: rajatavimānappabhāya vā vipphuritehi. “Visaro”ti idaṃ muttāvaḷiādīnampi visesanapadaṃ.
analyzed: rajata vimāna ppabhāya vā vipphuritehi visaroti idam muttā vaḷi ādīnam pi visesana padam

original: Abbhaṃ dhūmo rajo rāhūti ime cattāro upakkilesā pāḷinayena. Rājāmaccehīti rājakulasamudāgatehi
analyzed: abbham dhūmaḥ rajaḥ rāhu iti ime cattāro upakkilesā pāḷinayena rājāmaccehi iti rāja kula samudāgatehi

original: amaccehi. Atha vā anuyuttakarājūhi ceva amaccehi cāti attho. Kañcanāsaneti sīhāsane.
analyzed: amaccehi atha vā anuyuttaka rājūhi ca iva amaccehi ca ati attho kañcana āsane iti sīhāsane

original: “Raññaṃ tu hemamāsanaṃ, sīhāsanamatho vāḷabījanitthī ca cāmara”nti hi vuttaṃ. Kasmā
analyzed: tu hemam āsanam sīhāsanam atho vāḷabīja nitthī ca cāmaran ti hi vuttam kasmā

original: nisinnoti nisīdanamatte codanā. Eta nti kandanaṃ, pabodhanaṃ vā. Itīti iminā hetunā.
analyzed: nisinnā iti nisīdanam atte codanā kandanam vā iti iti iminā hetunā

original: Nakkhatta nti kattikānakkhattachaṇaṃ. Sammā ghositabbaṃ etarahi nakkhattanti saṅghuṭṭhaṃ.
analyzed: nakkhatta nti kattikā nakkhatta chaṇam sammā ghositabbam etarahi nakkhatta nti saṅghuṭṭham

original: Pañcavaṇṇakusumehi lājena, puṇṇaghaṭehi ca paṭimaṇḍitaṃ gharesu dvāraṃ yassa tadetaṃ
analyzed: pañca vaṇṇa kusumehi lājena puṇṇa ghaṭehi ca paṭimaṇḍitam gharesu dvāram yassa tat etam

original: nagaraṃ pañca…pe… dvāraṃ. Dhajo vaṭo. Paṭāko paṭṭoti sīhaḷiyā vadanti. Tadā kira
analyzed: nagaram pañcape dvāram dhajaḥ vaṭaḥ paṭākaḥ paṭṭaḥ iti sīhaḷiyāḥ vadanti tadā kira

original: padīpujjalanasīsena katanakkhattaṃ. Tathā hi ummādantijātakādīsupi kattikamāse evameva
analyzed: kata nakkhattam tathā hi ummā dantijātaka ādīsu pi kattika māse evam eva

original: vuttaṃ. Tenāha “samujjalitadīpamālālaṅkatasabbadisābhāga”nti. Vīthi nāma rathikā
analyzed: vuttam tena āha samujjalita dīpa mālā alaṅkata sabba disā bhāganti vīthi nāma rathikā

original: mahāmaggo. Racchā nāma anibbiddhā khuddakamaggo. Tattha tattha nisinnavasena samānabhāgena
analyzed: mahā maggaḥ racchā nāma a nibbiddhā khuddaka maggo tattha tattha nisinna vasena samāna bhāgena

original: pāṭiyekkaṃ nakkhattakīḷaṃ anubhavamānena samabhikiṇṇanti vuttaṃ hoti. Mahāaṭṭhakathāyaṃ
analyzed: pāṭiyekkam nakkhatta kīḷam anubhavamānena samabhikiṇṇam ti vuttam hoti mahāaṭṭhakathāyam

original: evaṃ vatvāpi tattheva iti sanniṭṭhānaṃ katanti attho.
analyzed: evam vatvā api tattha iva iti sanniṭṭhānam katam ti attho

original: Udānaṃ udāhāroti atthato ekaṃ. Mānanti mānapattaṃ kattubhūtaṃ. Chaḍḍanavasena avaseko.
analyzed: udānam udāhāro ti atthataḥ ekam mānanti māna pattam kattu bhūtam chaḍḍana vasena avasekaḥ

original: Sotavasena ogho. Pītivacananti pītisamuṭṭhānavacanaṃ kammabhūtaṃ. Hadayanti cittaṃ
analyzed: sota vasena ogho pīti vacananti pīti samuṭṭhāna vacanam kamma bhūtam cittam

original: kattubhūtaṃ. Gahetunti bahi aniccharaṇavasena gaṇhituṃ, hadayantoyeva ṭhapetuṃ na
analyzed: kattu bhūtam bahis na

original: sakkotīti adhippāyo. Tena vuttaṃ “adhikaṃ hutvā”tiādi. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – yaṃ vacanaṃ
analyzed: sakkoti iti adhippāyaḥ tena vuttam adhikam hutvā atiādi idam vuttam hoti yam vacanam

original: paṭiggāhaka nirapekkhaṃ kevalaṃ uḷārāya pītiyā vasena sarasato sahasāva mukhato niccharati,
analyzed: paṭiggāhaka nirapekkham kevalam uḷārāya pītiyā vasena sarasataḥ sahasā ava mukhataḥ niccharati

original: tadevidha “udāna”nti adhippetanti.
analyzed: tadevidha udānanti adhippetanti

original: Dosehi itā gatā apagatāti dosinā ta-kārassa na-kāraṃ katvā yathā “kilese jito vijitāvīti
analyzed: dosehi itā gatā apagatā ati dosinā takārassa nakāram katvā yathā kilese jitaḥ vijitāvī iti

original: jino”ti āha “dosāpagatā”ti. Yadipi sutte vuttaṃ “cattārome bhikkhave candimasūriyānaṃ
analyzed: jinaḥ iti āha dosa apagatā iti yadi api sutte vuttam cattāro me bhikkhave candima sūriyānaṃ

original: upakkilesā, yehi upakkilesehi upakkiliṭṭhā candimasūriyā na tapanti na bhāsanti na
analyzed: upakkilesāḥ yehi upakkilesehi upakkiliṭṭhāḥ candima sūriyāḥ na tapanti na bhāsanti na

original: virocanti. Katame cattāro? Abbhā bhikkhave…pe… mahikā. Dhūmo rajo. Rāhu bhikkhave
analyzed: virocanti katame cattāraḥ abbhā bhikkhave pe mahikā dhūmaḥ rajaḥ rāhu bhikkhave

original: candimasūriyānaṃ upakkileso”ti, tathāpi tatiyupakkilesassa pabhedadassana vasena
analyzed: candima sūriyānaṃ upakkileso ti tathā api tatiya upakkilesassa pabheda dassana vasena

original: aṭṭhakathānayena dassetuṃ “pañcahi upakkilesehī”ti vuttaṃ. Ayamattho ca ramaṇīyādisaddayogato

original: ñāyatīti āha “tasmā”tiādi. Anīya-saddopi bahulā katvatthābhidhāyako yathā “niyyānikā
analyzed: āha tasmā itiādi bahulā katu attha abhidhāyakaḥ yathā niyyānikā

original: dhammā”ti dasseti “ramayatī”ti iminā. Juṇhāvasena rattiyā surūpattamāha “vuttadosavimuttāyā”tiādinā.
analyzed: dhammāti dasseti ramayati iti iminā juṇhā vasena rattiyāḥ surūpa ttam āha vutta dosa vimuttāya iti ādinā

original: Abbhādayo cettha vuttadosā. Ayañca hetu “dassituṃ yuttā”ti etthāpi sambajjhitabbo.
analyzed: abbha ādayaḥ ca ittha vutta dosāḥ ayam ca hetu dassitum yuttā iti ettha api sambajjhitabbaḥ

original: Tena kāraṇena, utusampattiyā ca pāsādikatā daṭṭhabbā. Īdisāya rattiyā yutto divaso
analyzed: tena kāraṇena utu sampattiyā ca pāsādika tā daṭṭhabbā īdisāya rattiyā yuttaḥ divasaḥ

original: māso utu saṃvaccharoti evaṃ divasamāsādīnaṃ lakkhaṇā sallakkhaṇupāyā bhavituṃ yuttā,
analyzed: evam divasa māsa ādīnam lakkhaṇā sat lakkhaṇa upāyā bhavitum yuttā

original: tasmā lakkhitabbāti lakkhaṇiyā, sā eva lakkhaññā ya-vato ṇa-kārassa ña-kārādesavasena
analyzed: tasmā lakkhitabbā ati lakkhaṇiyā sā eva lakkhaññā yavataḥ ṇakārassa ñakāra ādesa vasena

original: yathā “pokkharañño sumāpitā”ti āha “divasamāsādīna”ntiādi.
analyzed: yathā pokkharaññaḥ sumāpitā ti āha divasa māsa ādīn antiādi

original: “Yaṃ no payirupāsato cittaṃ pasīdeyyā”ti vacanato samaṇaṃ vā brāhmaṇaṃ vāti ettha
analyzed: yam no payis upāsataḥ cittam pasīdeyya ati vacanataḥ samaṇam vā brāhmaṇam vā ati ettha

original: paramatthasamaṇo, paramatthabrāhmaṇo ca adhippeto, na pana pabbajjāmattasamaṇo, na
analyzed: paramattha samaṇaḥ paramattha brāhmaṇaḥ ca adhippetaḥ na pana pabbajjā matta samaṇaḥ na

original: ca jātimattabrāhmaṇoti vuttaṃ “samitapāpatāyā”tiādi. Bahati pāpe bahi karotīti brāhmaṇo
analyzed: ca vuttam samita pāpa tāya ati ādi bahati pāpe bahi karoti iti brāhmaṇaḥ

original: niruttinayena. Bahuvacane vattabbe ekavacanaṃ, ekavacane vā vattabbe bahuvacanaṃ
analyzed: nirutti nayena bahuvacane vattabbe ekavacanam ekavacane vā vattabbe bahuvacanam

original: vacanabyattayo vacanavipallāsoti attho. Idha pana “payirupāsata”nti vattabbe “payirupāsato”ti
analyzed: vacana byattayaḥ vacana vipallāsaḥ ti atthaḥ idha pana payirupāsatanti vattabbe payirupāsataḥ ti

original: vuttattā bahuvacane vattabbe ekavacanavasena vacanabyattayo dassito. Attani, garuṭṭhāniye
analyzed: vutta ttā bahuvacane vattabbe ekavacana vasena vacana byattayaḥ dassitaḥ

original: ca hi ekasmimpi bahuvacanappayogo niruḷho. Payirupāsatoti ca vaṇṇavipariyāyaniddeso
analyzed: ca hi ekasmin pi bahuvacana payogaḥ niruḷhaḥ ca vaṇṇa vipariyāya niddeso

original: esa yathā “payirudāhāsī”ti. Ayañhi bahulaṃ diṭṭhapayogo, yadidaṃ parisadde ya-kārapare
analyzed: esa yathā payiḥ udāhāsi iti ayam hi bahulam diṭṭha payogaḥ yat idam parisadde yakāra pare

original: vaṇṇavipariyāyo. Tathā hi akkharacintakā vadanti “pariyādīnaṃ rayādivaṇṇassa yarādīhi
analyzed: vaṇṇa vipariyāyaḥ tathā hi akkhara cintakāḥ vadanti pariya ādīnam raya ādi vaṇṇassa yara ādīhi

original: vipariyāyo”ti. Yanti samaṇaṃ vā brāhmaṇaṃ vā. Iminā sabbenapi vacanenāti “ramaṇīyā
analyzed: vipariyāya uti yanti samaṇam vā brāhmaṇam vā iminā sabbena api vacanena ati ramaṇīyā

original: vatā”tiādivacanena. Obhāsanimittakammanti obhāsabhūtaṃ nimittakammaṃ, paribyattaṃ
analyzed: vata ati ādi vacanena obhāsa nimitta kammanti obhāsa bhūtam nimitta kammam paribyattam

original: nimittakaraṇanti attho. Mahāparādhatāyāti mahādosatāya.
analyzed: nimitta karaṇanti atthaḥ mahā aparādha tāya ati mahā dosa tāya

original: “Tena hī”tiādi tadatthavivaraṇaṃ. Devadatto cāti ettha ca-saddo samuccayavasena atthupanayane,
analyzed: tena hi itiādi tad attha vivaraṇam devadatto ca ati ettha ca saddo samuccaya vasena attha upanayane

analyzed: tena yathā rājā ajātasattu attanaḥ pitu ariya sāvakassa satthu upaṭṭhākassa ghātanena

original: mahāparādho, evaṃ bhagavato mahānatthakarassa devadattassa apassayabhāvenāpīti imamatthaṃ
analyzed: mahā aparādhaḥ evam bhagavataḥ mahān attha karassa devadattassa a passaya bhāvena api iti imam attham

original: upaneti. Tassa piṭṭhichāyāyāti vohāramattaṃ, tassa jīvakassa piṭṭhiapassayena, taṃ
analyzed: upaneti tassa piṭṭhi chāyāya ati vohāra mattam tassa jīvakassa piṭṭhi apassayena tam

original: pamukhaṃ katvā apassāyāti vuttaṃ hoti. Vikkhepapacchedanatthanti vakkhamānāya attano
analyzed: pamukham katvā a passāya iti vuttam hoti vikkhepa pacchedana attham ti vakkhamānāya attanaḥ

original: kathāya uppajjanakavikkhepassa pacchindanatthaṃ, anuppajjanatthanti adhippāyo. Tenāha
analyzed: kathāya uppajjanaka vikkhepassa pacchindana attham anuppajjana attham ti adhippāyaḥ tena āha

analyzed: tassam hi itiādi asikkhitānam ti kāya vacī saṃyamane vigata sikkhānam kulūpake iti kulam upagate

analyzed: satthāre gahita asāra tāya ati gahetabba guṇa sāra vigata tāya nibbikkhepanti aññesam apanayana virahitam

original: Bhaddanti avassayasampannatāya sundaraṃ.
analyzed: bhaddanti avassaya sampanna tāya sundaram

original: 151. Ayañcattho imāya pāḷicchāyāya adhigato, imamatthameva vā antogadhaṃ katvā pāḷiyamevaṃ

original: porāṇaṭṭhakathānayova kirasaddena vutto. Esa nayo parato makkhalipadanibbacanepi.
analyzed: porāṇa ṭṭhakathā nayo va kira saddena vuttaḥ esa nayaḥ paratas makkhali pada nibbacane pi

original: Ekūnadāsasataṃ pūrayamānoti ekenūnadāsasataṃ attanā saddhiṃ anūnadāsasataṃ katvā
analyzed: ekūna dāsa satam pūrayamānā uti eka inūna dāsa satam attanā saddhim anūna dāsa satam katvā

original: pūrayamāno. Evaṃ jāyamāno cesa maṅgaladāso jāto. Jātarūpenevāti mātukucchito vijātaveseneva,
analyzed: pūrayamānaḥ evam jāyamānaḥ ca isa maṅgaladāsaḥ jātaḥ jātarūpena iva ati mātukucchitaḥ vijāta vesena iva

original: yathā vā sattā anivatthā apārutā jāyanti, tathā jātarūpeneva. Upasaṅkamantīti upagatā
analyzed: yathā vā sattāḥ anivatthāḥ a pārutāḥ jāyanti tathā jātarūpena iva upasaṅkamanti iti upagatā

original: bhajantā honti. Tadeva pabbajjaṃ aggahesīti tadeva naggarūpaṃ “ayameva pabbajjā nāma
analyzed: bhajantāḥ honti tat eva pabbajjam aggahesi iti tat eva nagga rūpam ayam eva pabbajjā nāma

original: siyā”ti pabbajjaṃ katvā aggahesi. Pabbajiṃsūti taṃ pabbajitamanupabbajiṃsu.

analyzed: pabbajita samūha saṅkhātaḥ ti etena pabbajita samūha tā mattena saṅghaḥ na niyyānika diṭṭhi visuddha sīla sāmañña vasena

original: saṃhatattāti dasseti. Assa atthīti assa satthupaṭiññātassa parivārabhāvena atthi.
analyzed: saṃhata ttā ati dasseti assa atthi iti assa satthu paṭiññātassa parivāra bhāvena atthi

original: “Saṅghī gaṇī”ti cedaṃ pariyāyavacanaṃ, saṅketamattato nānanti āha “svevā”tiādi. Svevāti
analyzed: saṅghī gaṇī iti ca idam pariyāya vacanam āha su eva atiādi su eva iti

original: ca pabbajitasamūhasaṅkhāto eva. Keci pana “pabbajitasamūhavasena saṅghī, gahaṭṭhasamūhavasena
analyzed: ca pabbajita samūha saṅkhātaḥ eva keci pana pabbajita samūha vasena saṅghī gahaṭṭha samūha vasena

original: gaṇī”ti vadanti, taṃ tesaṃ matimattaṃ gaṇe eva loke saṅgha-saddassa niruḷhattā. Acelakavatacariyādi

original: attanā parikappitamattaṃ ācāro. Paññāto pākaṭo saṅghīādibhāvena. Appiccho santuṭṭhoti

original: atthato ekaṃ. Tattha labbhamānāppicchataṃ dassetuṃ “appicchatāya vatthampi na nivāsetī”ti
analyzed: atthatas ekam tattha labbhamāna appicchatam dassetum appicchatāya vattham pi na nivāseti iti

original: vuttaṃ. Na hi tasmiṃ sāsanike viya santaguṇaniggūhaṇalakkhaṇā appicchatā labbhati.
analyzed: vuttam na hi tasmin sāsanike viya santa guṇa niggūhaṇa lakkhaṇā appiccha tā labbhati

original: Yasoti kittisaddo. Taranti etena saṃsāroghanti evaṃ sammatatāya laddhi titthaṃ nāma
analyzed: taranti etena evam sammata tāya laddhi tittham nāma

original: “sādhū”ti sammato, na ca sādhūhi sammatoti atthamāha “aya”ntiādinā. Na hi tassa sādhūhi
analyzed: sādhu iti sammataḥ na ca sādhūhi sammataḥ iti attham āha ayanti ādinā na hi tassa sādhūhi

original: sammatatā labbhati. Sundaro sappurisoti dvidhā attho. Assutavatoti assutāriyadhammassa,
analyzed: sammata tā labbhati sundaraḥ sappuriso ti dvidhā attho assutavato ti assutāriya dhammassa

original: kattutthe cetaṃ sāmivacanaṃ. “Imāni me vatasamādānāni ettakaṃ kālaṃ suciṇṇānī”ti
analyzed: kattutthe ca itam sāmi vacanam imāni me vata samādānāni ettakam kālam su ciṇṇāni iti

original: bahū rattiyo jānāti. Tā panassa rattiyo cirakālabhūtāti katvā “ciraṃ pabbajitassā”tiādi
analyzed: bahū rattiyaḥ jānāti tāḥ panassa rattiyaḥ cira kāla bhūtā ati katvā ciram pabbajitassa atiādi

original: vuttaṃ, antatthaaññapadatthasamāso cesa yathā “māsajāto”ti. Atha tassa padadvayassa
analyzed: vuttam anta ttha añña pada ttha samāso ca isa yathā māsa jātaḥ ti atha tassa pada dvayassa

original: ko visesoti ce? Cirapabbajitaggahaṇenassa buddhisīlatā, rattaññūgahaṇena tattha sampajānatā
analyzed: kaḥ visesaḥ ti ce cira pabbajita ggahaṇena assa buddhi sīla tā rattaññū gahaṇena tattha sampajānatā

original: dassitā, ayametassa visesoti. Kiṃ pana atthaṃ sandhāya so amacco āhāti vuttaṃ “acirapabbajitassā”tiādi.
analyzed: dassitā ayam etassa visesaḥ ti kim pana attham sandhāya saḥ amaccaḥ āha ati vuttam acira pabbajitassa atiādi

original: Okappanīyāti saddahanīyā. Addhānanti dīghakālaṃ. Kittako pana soti āha “dve tayo
analyzed: okappanīyā ati saddahanīyā addhānanti dīgha kālam kittako pana saḥ ti āha dve tayo

original: rājaparivaṭṭe”ti, dvinnaṃ, tiṇṇaṃ vā rājūnaṃ rajjānusāsanapaṭipāṭiyoti attho. “Addhagato”ti
analyzed: rāja parivaṭṭā iti dvinnam tiṇṇam vā rājūnam rajja anusāsana paṭipāṭiyo ti attho addha gato ti

original: vatvāpi puna kataṃ vayaggahaṇaṃ osānavayāpekkhaṃ padadvayassa atthavisesasambhavatoti
analyzed: vatvā api puna katam vaya ggahaṇam osāna vaya apekkham pada dvayassa attha visesa sambhavato ti

original: dasseti “pacchimavaya”nti iminā. Ubhayanti “addhagato, vayoanuppatto”ti padadvayaṃ.
analyzed: dassa iti pacchima vayanti iminā ubhayanti addha gataḥ vayaḥ anuppatto ti pada dvayam

original: Kājaro nāma eko rukkhaviseso, yo “paṇṇakarukkho”tipi vuccati. Disvā viya anattamanoti
analyzed: kājaraḥ nāma ekaḥ rukkha viseso yo paṇṇaka rukkho ti pi vuccati disvā viya anatta mano ti

original: Celena celapaṭākāya yuddhe akanti gacchantīti celakā, jayaddhajagāhakāti āha “ye
analyzed: celena cela paṭākāya yuddhe gacchanti iti celakāḥ āha ye

original: yuddhe”tiādi. Jayadhajanti jayanatthaṃ, jayakāle vā paggahitadhajaṃ. Puratoti senāya
analyzed: yuddha itiādi jaya dhajanti jayana attham jaya kāle vā paggahita dhajam puratas iti senāya

original: pubbe. Yathā tathā ṭhite senike byūhavicāraṇavasena tato tato calayanti uccālentīti
analyzed: pubbe yathā tathā ṭhite senike byūha vicāraṇa vasena tato tato calayanti uccālenti iti

original: calakāti vuttaṃ “idha rañño”tiādi. Sakuṇagghiādayo viya maṃsapiṇḍaṃ parasenāsamūhasaṅkhātaṃ
analyzed: calakā iti vuttam idha rañño tiādi sakuṇagghi ādayaḥ viya maṃsa piṇḍam para senā samūha saṅkhātam

original: piṇḍaṃ sāhasikatāya chetvā chetvā dayanti uppatitvā uppatitvā niggacchantīti piṇḍadāyakā.

original: vā da-kārāgamena nipphatti.
analyzed: vā dakāra āgamena nipphatti

original: Uggatuggatāti saṅgāmaṃ patvā javaparakkamādivasena ativiya uggatā. Tadevāti parehi

original: vuttaṃ tameva sīsaṃ vā āvudhaṃ vā. Pakkhandantīti vīrasūrabhāvena asajjamānā parasenamanupavisanti.
analyzed: vuttam tam eva sīsam vā āvudham vā pakkhandanti iti vīrasūra bhāvena a sajjamānā para senam anupavisanti

original: Thāmajavabalaparakkamādisampattiyā mahānāgasadisatā. Tenāha “hatthiādīsupī”tiādi.
analyzed: thāma java bala parakkama ādi sampattiyāḥ mahā nāga sadisa tā tena āha hatthi ādīsu pi itiādi

original: Ekantasūrāti ekacarasūrā antasaddassa tabbhāvavuttito, sūrabhāvena ekākino hutvā

original: jālikāti hi atthato ekaṃ. Sacammikāti jālikā viya sarīraparittāṇena cammena sacammikā.

original: Cammakañcukanti cammamayakañcukaṃ. Pavisitvāti tassa anto hutvā, paṭimuñcitvāti vuttaṃ

analyzed: hoti sara parittāṇam cammanti camma paṭisibbitam celakam camma mayam vā phalakam

original: Balavasinehāti sāmini atisayapemā. Gharadāsayodhāti antojātadāsapariyāpannā yodhā,

original: “gharadāsikaputtā”tipi pāṭho, antojātadāsīnaṃ puttāti attho.

original: Āḷāraṃ vuccati mahānasaṃ, tattha niyuttā āḷārikā. Pūvikāti pūvasampādakā, ye pūvameva

original: muddikā. Tenāha “hatthamuddāyā”tiādi.

original: Ayakāro kammārakārako. Dantakāro bhamakāro. Cittakāro lepacittakāro. Ādi-saddena

analyzed: paribhāsanam issara anuvattakaḥ hi loko ti dhamma tā dassanena tad attha samatthanam attano

original: 164. Nu-saddo viya no-saddopi pucchāyaṃ nipātoti āha “abhijānāsi nū”ti. Ayañcāti
analyzed: nu saddaḥ viya no saddaḥ api puccha ayam nipāto ti āha abhijānāsi nu iti ayaṃ ca ati

original: Kathaṃ yojetabboti anuyogamapaneti “idañhī”tiādinā. Pucchitā nūti pubbe pucchaṃ kattā

original: viya rūpamassāti bhagavantarūpo, bhagavā viya ekantapaṇḍitoti attho.
analyzed: rūpam assa ati bhagavanta rūpaḥ bhagavā ekanta paṇḍito ti attho

original: Pūraṇakassapavādavaṇṇanā
165. Ekamidāhanti ettha idanti nipātamattaṃ, ekaṃ samayamicceva attho. Sammodeti
analyzed: ekam idā aham iti ettha idam nti nipāta mattam ekam samayam icca iva attho sammodeti

analyzed: sammodanam karoti iti sammodanīyam anīya saddaḥ hi yathā

original: vuttaṃ, saritabbayuttakanti ca saraṇānucchavikanti attho.
analyzed: vuttam saritabba yuttakan ti ca saraṇa ānucchavikan ti attho

original: 166. Sahatthāti sahattheneva, tena suddhakattāraṃ dasseti, āṇattiyāti pana hetukattāraṃ,
analyzed: sahatthā iti sahatthena iva tena suddha kattāram dasseti āṇattiyā iti pana hetu kattāram

original: Pacanaṃ dahanaṃ vibādhananti āha “daṇḍena uppīḷentassā”ti. Papañcasūdaniyaṃ nāma

original: bahuso dissati. Sokanti sokakāraṇaṃ, socanantipi yujjati kāraṇasampādanena phalassapi
analyzed: bahusas dissati soka kāraṇam yujjati kāraṇa sampādanena phalassa api

analyzed: suddha kattutthaḥ na labbhati atha kho attanaḥ phandana vasena iva iti āha param phandantam

original: phandanakāle sayampi phandato”ti, attanā katena parassa vibādhanapayogena sayampi
analyzed: phandana kāle sayam pi phandatoti attanā katena parassa vibādhana payogena sayam pi

original: phandatoti attho. “Atipātāpayato”ti padaṃ suddhakattari, hetukattari ca pavattatīti
analyzed: phandatoti atthaḥ padam suddha kattari hetu kattari ca pavattati iti

original: dasseti “hanantassāpi hanāpentassāpī”ti iminā. Sabbatthāti “ādiyato”tiādīsu. Karaṇakāraṇavasenāti
analyzed: dassa iti hana antassa api iti iminā sabbattha ati ādiyataḥ ti ādīsu karaṇa kāraṇa vasena ati

original: sayaṃkāraparaṃkāravasena.
analyzed: sayaṃkāra paraṃkāra vasena

original: Gharabhittiyā anto ca bahi ca sandhi gharasandhi. Kiñcipi asesetvā niravaseso lopo
analyzed: ghara bhittiyāḥ anto ca bahi ca sandhi ghara sandhi niravasesaḥ lopo

original: vilumpanaṃ nillopoti āha “mahāvilopa”nti. Ekāgāre niyutto vilopo ekāgāriko. Tenāha
analyzed: vilumpanam nillopo ti āha mahāvilopanti ekāgāre niyuttaḥ vilopo ekāgāriko tena āha

original: pakaraṇato siddhoti dasseti “āgatāgatāna”ntiādinā. “Parito sabbaso panthe hananaṃ
analyzed: pakaraṇato siddho ti dasseti āgata āgata ananti ādinā paritas sabbaso panthe hananam

original: Hananadānakiriyā hi tadāyattā. Mahāyāganti mahāvijitarañño yaññasadisampi mahāyāgaṃ.

original: Damasaddo indriyasaṃvarassa, uposathasīlassa ca vācakoti āha “indriyadamena uposathakammenā”ti.

original: “Ekadhammaṃ atītassa, musāvādissa jantuno;

original: Vitiṇṇaparalokassa, natthi pāpaṃ akāriya”nti. ;
analyzed: vitiṇṇa para lokassa natthi pāpam a kāriyanti

analyzed: pavatti iti yaḥ karoti tassa santāne phala uppāda paccaya bhāvena uppatti evañhi natthi

original: kathaṃ bhavissati. Sabbathāpīti “karoto”tiādinā vuttena sabbappakārenapi.

original: Labujanti likucaṃ. Pāpapuññānaṃ kiriyameva paṭikkhipati, na raññā puṭṭhaṃ sandiṭṭhikaṃ

original: Yo hi kammaṃ paṭikkhipati, tena atthato vipākopi paṭikkhittoyeva nāma hoti. Tathā

analyzed: makkhali gosāla vāda vaṇṇanā

original: Gaṇṭhikāti pabbagaṇṭhikā. Pabbagaṇṭhimhi hi pavuṭasaddo. Mahāpapātāti mahātaṭā. Pārisesanayena

original: khuddakapapātasatāni. Evaṃ supinesupi. “Mahākappino”ti idaṃ “mahākappāna”nti atthato
analyzed: khuddaka papāta satāni evam mahākappino ti idam mahākappānanti atthato

original: veditabbaṃ. Saddato panesa ajānanto evaṃ vadatīti na vicāraṇakkhamaṃ. Tathā “cullāsīti
analyzed: veditabbam saddataḥ pana esa a jānantaḥ evam vadati iti na vicāraṇa khamam tathā cullā asi iti

original: satasahassānī”ti idampi. So hi “caturāsīti satasahassānī”ti vattumasakkonto evaṃ
analyzed: sata sahassāni iti idam pi saḥ hi catur āsīti sata sahassāni iti vattum a sakkontaḥ evam

original: vadati. Saddaracakā pana “caturāsītiyā tulopo, cassa cu, rassa lo, dvittañcā”ti vadanti.
analyzed: vadati pana catur āsītiyā tu lopaḥ cassa cu rassa laḥ dvi ttam ca ati vadanti

original: Ettakā mahāsarāti etappamāṇavatā mahāsarato, sattamahāsaratoti vuttaṃ hoti. Kirāti
analyzed: ettakā mahā sarā ti eta pamāṇavatā mahā sarataḥ satta mahā sarataḥ ti vuttam hoti kira ati

original: tassa vādānussavane nipāto. Paṇḍitopi…pe… na gacchati, kasmā? Sattānaṃ saṃsaraṇakālassa niyatabhāvato.
analyzed: tassa vāda anussavane nipātaḥ na gacchati kasmā sattānam saṃsaraṇa kālassa niyata bhāvataḥ

original: “Acelakavatena vā aññena vā yena kenacī”ti vuttamatidisati “tādisenevā”ti iminā.
analyzed: vā aññena vā yena kenaci iti vuttam atidisati tādisena iva ati iminā

original: Tapokammenāti tapakaraṇena. Etthāpi “tādisenevā”ti adhikāro. Yo…pe… visujjhati, so
analyzed: tapo kammena ati tapa karaṇena ettha api tādisena iva ati adhikāraḥ yope visujjhati saḥ

original: aparipakkaṃ kammaṃ paripāceti nāmāti yojanā. Antarāti caturāsītimahākappasatasahassānamabbhantare.
analyzed: a paripakkam kammam paripāca iti nāma ati yojanā antarā ti catur āsīti mahākappa sata sahassānam abbhantare

original: Phussa phussāti patvā patvā. Vuttaparimāṇaṃ kālanti caturāsītimahākappasatasahassapamāṇaṃ
analyzed: phussa phussa ati patvā patvā vutta parimāṇam catur āsīti mahā kappa sata sahassa pamāṇam

original: kālaṃ. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – aparipakkaṃ saṃsaraṇanimittaṃ kammaṃ sīlādinā sīghaṃyeva
analyzed: kālam idam vuttam hoti a paripakkam saṃsaraṇa nimittam kammam sīla ādinā sīgham yeva

original: visuddhappattiyā paripāceti nāma. Paripakkaṃ kammaṃ phussa phussa kālena paripakkabhāvānāpādanena
analyzed: visuddha ppattiyā paripāca iti nāma paripakkam kammam phussa phussa kālena paripakka bhāva an āpādanena

original: byantiṃ vigamanaṃ karoti nāmāti. Doṇenāti pariminanadoṇatumbena. Rūpakavasenattho
analyzed: byantim vigamanam karoti nāma ati doṇena ati pariminana doṇa tumbena rūpaka vasena attho

original: labbhatīti vuttaṃ “mitaṃ viyā”ti. Na hāpanavaḍḍhanaṃ paṇḍitabālavasenāti dasseti
analyzed: labbhati iti vuttam mitam viyāti na hāpana vaḍḍhanam paṇḍita bāla vasena ati dasseti

original: “na saṃsāro”tiādinā. Vaḍḍhanaṃ ukkaṃso. Hāpanaṃ avakaṃso.
analyzed: na saṃsāra uti ādinā vaḍḍhanam ukkaṃsaḥ hāpanam avakaṃsaḥ

original: Katasuttaguḷeti katasuttavaṭṭiyaṃ. Paletīti pareti yathā “abhisamparāyo”ti, ra-kārassa
analyzed: kata sutta guḷā iti kata sutta vaṭṭiyam paleti iti pareti yathā rakārassa

original: pana la-kāraṃ katvā evaṃ vuttaṃ yathā “palibuddho”ti. So ca curādigaṇavasena gatiyanti
analyzed: pana lakāram katvā evam vuttam yathā palibuddhaḥ ti saḥ ca curādi gaṇa vasena

original: vuttaṃ “gacchatī”ti. Imāya upamāya cesa sattānaṃ saṃsāro anukkamena khīyateva, na
analyzed: vuttam gacchati iti imāya upamāya ca isa sattānam saṃsāraḥ anukkamena khīyate iva na

original: vaḍḍhati paricchinnarūpattāti imamatthaṃ vibhāvetīti āha “sutte khīṇe”tiādi. Tatthevāti khīyanaṭṭhāneyeva.
analyzed: vaḍḍhati paricchinna rūpa ttā ti imam attham vibhāveti iti āha sutte khīṇa itiādi tattha iva ati khīyana ṭṭhānā iya iva

original: Ajitakesakambalavādavaṇṇanā
analyzed: ajita kesa kambala vāda vaṇṇanā

original: 171. Dinnanti deyyadhammasīsena dānacetanāyeva vuttā. Taṃmukhena ca phalanti dasseti
analyzed: dinnam ti deyya dhamma sīsena dāna cetanāya iva vuttā tad mukhena ca phalanti dasseti

original: “dinnassa phalābhāva”nti iminā. Dinnañhi mukhyato annādivatthu, taṃ kathamesa paṭikkhipissati.
analyzed: iminā dinnam hi mukhyatas anna ādi vatthu tam katham esa paṭikkhipissati

original: Esa nayo yiṭṭhaṃ hutanti etthāpi. Sabbasādhāraṇaṃ mahādānaṃ mahāyāgo. Pāhunabhāvena
analyzed: esa nayaḥ ettha api sabba sādhāraṇam mahādānam mahāyāgaḥ pāhuna bhāvena

original: kattabbasakkāro pāhunakasakkāro. Phalanti ānisaṃsaphalaṃ, nissandaphalañca. Vipākoti
analyzed: kattabba sakkāro pāhunaka sakkāro phalanti ānisaṃsa phalam nissanda phalam ca vipāko ti

original: sadisaphalaṃ. Caturaṅgasamannāgate dāne ṭhānantarādipatti viya hi ānisaṃso, saṅkhabrāhmaṇassa
analyzed: catur aṅga samannāgate dāne hi ānisaṃsaḥ saṅkha brāhmaṇassa

original: dāne tāṇalābhamattaṃ viya nissando, paṭisandhisaṅkhātaṃ sadisaphalaṃ vipāko. Ayaṃ
analyzed: dāne tāṇa lābha mattam viya nissandaḥ paṭisandhi saṅkhātam sadisa phalam vipākaḥ ayam

original: loko, paralokoti ca kammunā laddhabbo vutto phalābhāvameva sandhāya paṭikkhipanato.
analyzed: loko para lokaḥ iti ca kammunā laddhabbaḥ vuttaḥ phala abhāvam eva sandhāya paṭikkhipanato

original: Paccakkhadiṭṭho hi loko kathaṃ tena paṭikkhitto siyā. “Sabbe tattha tattheva ucchijjantī”ti
analyzed: paccakkha diṭṭhaḥ hi loko katham tena paṭikkhittaḥ siyā sabbe tattha tattha iva ucchijjanti iti

original: iminā kāraṇamāha, yattha yattha bhavayoniādīsu ṭhitā ime sattā, tattha tattheva ucchijjanti,
analyzed: iminā kāraṇam āha yattha yattha bhava yoni ādīsu ṭhitāḥ ime sattā tattha tattha iva ucchijjanti

original: nirudayavināsavasena vinassantīti attho. Tesūti mātāpitūsu. Phalābhāvavaseneva vadati,
analyzed: nirudaya vināsa vasena vinassanti iti atthaḥ tesu iti mātā pitūsu phala abhāva vasena iva vadati

original: na mātāpitūnaṃ, nāpi tesu idāni kariyamānasakkārāsakkārānamabhāvavasena tesaṃ loke
analyzed: na mātā pitūnam na api tesu idāni tesam loke

original: paccakkhattā. Pubbuḷassa viya imesaṃ sattānaṃ uppādo nāma kevalo, na cavitvā āgamanapubbako
analyzed: paccakkhattā pubbuḷassa viya imesam sattānam uppādaḥ nāma kevalaḥ na cavitvā āgamana pubbako

original: atthīti dassanatthaṃ “natthi sattā opapātikā”ti vuttanti āha “cavitvā upapajjanakā
analyzed: atthi iti dassana tham na atthi sattā opapātikā iti vuttan ti āha cavitvā upapajjanakā

original: sattā nāma natthī”ti. Samaṇena nāma yāthāvato jānantena kassaci akathetvā saññatena
analyzed: sattā nāma natthi iti samaṇena nāma yāthāvataḥ jānantena kassaci a kathetvā saññatena

original: bhavitabbaṃ, aññathā ahopurisikā nāma siyā. Kiñhi paro parassa karissati, tathā ca
analyzed: bhavitabbam aññathā ahopurisikā nāma siyā kim hi paraḥ parassa karissati tathā ca

original: attano sampādanassa kassaci avassayo eva na siyā tattha tattheva ucchijjanatoti imamatthaṃ
analyzed: attano sampādanassa kassaci avassayaḥ eva na siyā tattha tattha iva ucchijjanato ti imamattham

original: sandhāya “ye imañca…pe… pavedentī”ti āha. Ayaṃ aṭṭhakathāvasesako attho.
analyzed: sandhāya ye imañcape pavedenti iti āha ayam aṭṭhakathā avasesakaḥ attho

original: Catūsu mahābhūtesu niyutto cātumahābhūtiko, atthamattato pana dassetuṃ “catumahābhūtamayo”ti
analyzed: catūsu mahābhūtesu niyuttaḥ cātumahābhūtikaḥ attham attataḥ pana dassetum catu mahābhūta mayaḥ ti

original: vuttaṃ. Yathā hi mattikāya nibbattaṃ bhājanaṃ mattikāmayaṃ, evamayampi catūhi mahābhūtehi
analyzed: vuttam yathā hi mattikāya nibbattam bhājanam mattikā mayam evam ayam pi catūhi mahābhūtehi

original: nibbatto catumahābhūtamayoti vuccati. Ajjhattikapathavīdhātūti sattasantānagatā pathavīdhātu.
analyzed: nibbattaḥ catu mahābhūta mayaḥ ti vuccati ajjhattika pathavī dhātu uti satta santāna gatā pathavī dhātu

original: Bāhirapathavīdhātunti bahiddhā mahāpathaviṃ, tena pathavīyeva kāyoti dasseti. Anugacchatīti
analyzed: bāhira pathavī dhātum ti bahiddhā mahā pathavim tena pathavīyā iva kāyo ti dasseti anugacchati iti

original: anubandhati. Ubhayenāpīti padadvayenapi. Upeti upagacchatīti bāhirapathavikāyato
analyzed: ubhayena api iti pada dvayena api upa iti upagacchati iti

original: tadekadesabhūtā pathavī āgantvā ajjhattikabhāvappatti hutvā sattabhāvena saṇṭhitā,
analyzed: tad eka desa bhūtā pathavī āgantvā ajjhattika bhāva ppatti hutvā satta bhāvena saṇṭhitā

original: sā ca mahāpathavī ghaṭādigatapathavī viya idāni tameva bāhiraṃ pathavikāyaṃ samudāyabhūtaṃ
analyzed: sā ca mahā pathavī ghaṭa ādi gata pathavī viyaḥ idāni tam eva bāhiram pathavikāyam samudāya bhūtam

original: puna upeti upagacchati, sabbaso tena bāhirapathavikāyena nibbisesataṃ ekībhāvameva
analyzed: punar upeti upagacchati sabbaso tena bāhira pathavi kāyena ekībhāvam eva

original: gacchatīti attho. Āpādīsupi eseva nayoti ettha pajjunnena mahāsamuddato gahitaāpo
analyzed: gacchati iti atthaḥ āpa ādīsu pi esa iva nayo ti ettha pajjunnena mahā samuddataḥ gahita āpaḥ

original: viya vassodakabhāvena punapi mahāsamuddaṃ, sūriyaraṃsito gahitaindaggisaṅkhātatejo
analyzed: viya vassa udaka bhāvena puna api mahā samuddam sūriya raṃsitaḥ gahita aindaggi saṅkhāta tejaḥ

original: viya punapi sūriyaraṃsiṃ, mahāvāyukkhandhato niggatamahāvāto viya punapi mahāvāyukkhandhaṃ
analyzed: viya puna api sūriya raṃsim mahā vāyu khandhataḥ niggata mahā vātaḥ viya puna api mahā vāyu khandham

original: upeti upagacchatīti parikappanāmattena diṭṭhigatikassa adhippāyo.
analyzed: upeti upagacchati iti parikappanā mattena diṭṭhigatikassa adhippāyaḥ

original: Manacchaṭṭhāni indriyānīti manameva chaṭṭhaṃ yesaṃ cakkhusotaghānajivhākāyānaṃ, tāni
analyzed: mana chaṭṭhāni indriyāni iti manam eva chaṭṭham yesam cakkhu sota ghāna jivhā kāyānam tāni

original: indriyāni. Ākāsaṃ pakkhandanti tesaṃ visayabhāvāti vadanti. Visayīgahaṇena hi visayāpi
analyzed: indriyāni ākāsam pakkhandanti tesam visaya bhāvā iti vadanti visayī gahaṇena hi

original: gahitā eva honti. Kathaṃ gaṇitā mañcapañcamāti āha “mañco ceva…pe… attho”ti. Āḷāhanaṃ
analyzed: gahitāḥ eva honti katham gaṇitāḥ mañca pañcamā ati āha mañco āḷāhanam

original: susānanti atthato ekaṃ. Guṇāguṇapadānīti guṇadosakoṭṭhāsāni. Sarīrameva vā padāni
analyzed: atthataḥ ekam guṇa aguṇa padāni iti guṇa dosa koṭṭhāsāni sarīram eva vā padāni

original: taṃtaṃkiriyāya pajjitabbato. Pārāvatapakkhivaṇṇānīti pārāvatassa nāma pakkhino vaṇṇāni.
analyzed: taṃ taṃ kiriyāya pajjitabbataḥ pārāvata pakkhi vaṇṇāni iti pārāvatassa nāma pakkhinaḥ vaṇṇāni

original: “Pārāvatapakkhavaṇṇānī”ti pāṭho, pārāvatasakuṇassa pattavaṇṇānīti attho. Bhasmantāti
analyzed: pārāvata pakkha vaṇṇāni iti pāṭhaḥ pārāvata sakuṇassa patta vaṇṇāni iti attho bhasmantā ati

original: chārikāpariyantā. Tenāha “chārikāvasānamevā”ti. Āhutisaddenettha “dinnaṃ yiṭṭhaṃ
analyzed: chārikā pariyantā tena āha chārikā avasānam eva ati āhuti saddena ittha dinnam

original: huta”nti vuttappakāraṃ dānaṃ sabbampi gahitanti dasseti “pāhunakasakkārādibhedaṃ
analyzed: hutam ti vutta ppakāram dānam sabbam pi gahitan ti dasseti pāhunaka sakkāra ādi bhedam

original: dinnadāna”nti iminā, virūpekasesaniddeso vā esa. Atthoti adhippāyato attho saddato
analyzed: dinna dānam ti iminā virūpa ikasesa niddesaḥ vā esa attho ti adhippāyataḥ attho saddato

original: tassa anadhigamitattā. Evamīdisesu. Dabbanti muyhantīti dattū, bālapuggalā, tehi
analyzed: tassa an adhigamita ttā evamīdisesu dabbanti muyhanti iti bāla puggalā tehi

original: dattūhi. Kiṃ vuttaṃ hotīti āha “bālā dentī”tiādi. Pāḷiyaṃ “loko atthī”ti mati yesaṃ
analyzed: dattūhi kim vuttam hoti iti āha bālāḥ denti itiādi pāḷiyam lokaḥ atthi iti mati yesam

original: te atthikā, “atthī”ti cedaṃ nepātikapadaṃ, tesaṃ vādo atthikavādo, taṃ atthikavādaṃ.
analyzed: te atthikāḥ atthi iti ca idam nepātika padam tesam vādaḥ atthika vādaḥ tam atthika vādam

original: Tatthāti tesu yathāvuttesu tīsu micchāvādīsu. Kammaṃ paṭibāhati akiriyavādibhāvato.
analyzed: tattha ati tesu yathā vuttesu tīsu micchāvādīsu kammam paṭibāhati akiriya vādi bhāvataḥ

original: Vipākaṃ paṭibāhati sabbena sabbaṃ āyatiṃ upapattiyā paṭikkhipanato. Vipākanti ca
analyzed: vipākam paṭibāhati sabbena sabbam āyatim upapattiyā paṭikkhipanataḥ vipākam ti ca

original: ānisaṃsanissandasadisaphalavasena tividhampi vipākaṃ. Ubhayaṃ paṭibāhati sabbaso
analyzed: ānisaṃsa nissanda sadisa phala vasena tividham pi vipākam ubhayam paṭibāhati sabbaso

original: hetupaṭisedhaneneva phalassāpi paṭisedhitattā. Ubhayanti ca kammaṃ vipākampi. So
analyzed: hetu paṭisedhanena iva phalassa api paṭisedhita ttā ubhayanti ca kammam vipākam pi so

original: hi “ahetū appaccayā sattā saṃkilissanti, visujjhanti cā”ti vadanto kammassa viya
analyzed: hi ahetū appaccayā sattā saṃkilissanti visujjhanti ca ati vadantaḥ kammassa viya

original: vipākassāpi saṃkilesavisuddhīnaṃ paccayattābhāvajotanato tadubhayaṃ paṭibāhati nāma.
analyzed: vipākassa api saṃkilesa visuddhīnam paccaya ttā abhāva jotanato tat ubhayam paṭibāhati nāma

original: Vipāko paṭibāhito hoti asati kammasmiṃ vipākābhāvato. Kammaṃ paṭibāhitaṃ hoti asati
analyzed: vipāko paṭibāhitaḥ hoti asati kammasmim vipāka abhāvato kammam paṭibāhitam hoti asati

original: vipāke kammassa niratthakatāpattito. Itīti vuttatthanidassanaṃ. Atthatoti sarūpato,
analyzed: vipāke kammassa niratthaka tā āpattitaḥ iti iti vutta ttha nidassanam atthataḥ ti sarūpataḥ

original: visuṃ visuṃ taṃtaṃdiṭṭhidīpakabhāvena pāḷiyaṃ āgatāpi tadubhayapaṭibāhakāvāti attho.
analyzed: visum visum taṃ taṃ diṭṭhi dīpaka bhāvena pāḷiyam āgatā api tad ubhaya paṭibāhakā avāti attho

original: Paccekaṃ tividhadiṭṭhikā eva te ubhayapaṭibāhakattā. “Ubhayappaṭibāhakā”ti hi hetuvacanaṃ
analyzed: paccekam tividha diṭṭhikāḥ eva te ubhaya paṭibāhaka ttā ubhaya ppaṭibāhakā iti hi hetu vacanam

original: hetugabbhattā tassa visesanassa. Ahetukavādā cevātiādi paṭiññāvacanaṃ tapphalabhāvena
analyzed: hetu gabbha ttā tassa visesanassa ahetuka vādā ca iva atiādi paṭiññā vacanam tad phala bhāvena

original: nicchitattā. Tasmā vipākapaṭibāhakattā natthikavādā, kammapaṭibāhakattā akiriyavādā,
analyzed: nicchita ttā tasmā vipāka paṭibāhaka ttā natthika vādā kamma paṭibāhaka ttā akiriya vādā

original: tadubhayapaṭibāhakattā ahetukavādāti yathālābhaṃ hetuphalatāsambandho veditabbo.
analyzed: tad ubhaya paṭibāhaka ttā ahetuka vādāḥ ti yathālābham hetu phala tā sambandhaḥ veditabbo

original: Yo hi vipākapaṭibāhanena natthikadiṭṭhiko ucchedavādī, so atthato kammapaṭibāhanena
analyzed: yaḥ hi vipāka paṭibāhanena natthika diṭṭhikaḥ uccheda vādī so atthataḥ kamma paṭibāhanena

original: akiriyadiṭṭhiko, ubhayapaṭibāhanena ahetukadiṭṭhiko ca hoti. Sesadvayepi eseva nayo.
analyzed: akiriya diṭṭhiko ubhaya paṭibāhanena ahetuka diṭṭhiko ca hoti sesa dvaye pi esa iva nayo

original: “Ye vā panā”tiādinā tesamanudiṭṭhikānaṃ niyāmokkantivinicchayo vutto. Tattha tesanti
analyzed: ye vā pana ati ādinā tesam anudiṭṭhikānam niyāma ukkanti vinicchayo vutto tattha tesam ti

original: pūraṇādīnaṃ. Sajjhāyantīti taṃ diṭṭhidīpakaṃ ganthaṃ yathā tathā tehi kataṃ uggahetvā
analyzed: pūraṇa ādīnam sajjhāyanti iti tam diṭṭhi dīpakam gantham yathā tathā tehi katam uggahetvā

original: paṭhanti. Vīmaṃsantīti tassa atthaṃ vicārenti. “Tesa”ntiādi vīmaṃsanākāradassanaṃ.
analyzed: paṭhanti vīmaṃsanti iti tassa attham vicārenti vīmaṃsana ākāra dassanam

original: “Karoto…pe… ucchijjatī”ti evaṃ vīmaṃsantānaṃ tesanti sambandho. Tasmiṃ ārammaṇeti
analyzed: ucchijjati iti evam vīmaṃsantānam tesanti sambandhaḥ tasmin ārammaṇe ti

original: yathāparikappite kammaphalābhāvādike “karoto na karīyati pāpa”ntiādi nayappavattāya
analyzed: yathā parikappite kamma phala abhāva ādike karotaḥ na pāpanti ādi naya ppavattāya

original: micchādassanasaṅkhātāya laddhiyā ārammaṇe. Micchāsati santiṭṭhatīti micchāsatisaṅkhātā
analyzed: micchādassana saṅkhātāya laddhiyāḥ ārammaṇe micchā sati santiṭṭhati iti micchā sati saṅkhātā

original: laddhisahagatā taṇhā santiṭṭhati. “Karoto na karīyati pāpa”ntiādivasena hi anussavūpaladdhe
analyzed: laddhi sahagatā taṇhā santiṭṭhati karotaḥ na karīyati

original: atthe tadākāraparivitakkanehi saviggahe viya sarūpato cittassa paccupaṭṭhite cirakālaparicayena

original: Kāraṇaggahaṇeneva hi phalampi gahitaṃ tadavinābhāvittā. Iti pavedanadesanādisādhakassa

original: Evaṃ “damiḷakirātasavaramilakkhūnaṃ bhāsā viyā”ti idaṃ paccekaṃ yojetabbaṃ. Milakkhūti

original: maṇḍapassa antokatassa udumbarasākhamaṇḍapassa majjhe suppatiṭṭhite udumbarabhaddapīṭhamhi
analyzed: maṇḍapassa antokatassa udumbara sākha maṇḍapassa majjhe suppatiṭṭhite udumbara bhadda pīṭhamhi

original: abhisekārahaṃ abhijaccaṃ khattiyaṃ nisīdāpetvā paṭhamaṃ tāva maṅgalābharaṇabhūsitā
analyzed: abhiseka araham abhijaccam khattiyam nisīda apetvā paṭhamam maṅgala ābharaṇa bhūsitā

original: jātisampannā khattiyakaññā gaṅgodakapuṇṇaṃ suvaṇṇamayasāmuddikadakkhiṇāvaṭṭasaṅkhaṃ
analyzed: jāti sampannā khattiya kaññā gaṅgā udaka puṇṇam suvaṇṇa maya sāmuddika dakkhiṇā vaṭṭa saṅkham

original: ubhohi hatthehi sakkaccaṃ gahetvā sīsopari ussāpetvā tena tassa muddhani abhisekodakaṃ
analyzed: ubhohi hatthehi sakkaccam gahetvā sīsa upari ussāpetvā tena tassa muddhani abhiseka udakaṃ

original: abhisiñcati, evañca vadeti “deva taṃ sabbepi khattiyagaṇā attānamārakkhatthaṃ iminā
analyzed: abhisiñcati evam ca vadeti deva tam sabbe pi khattiya gaṇāḥ attānam ārakkhattham iminā

original: abhisekena abhisekikaṃ mahārājaṃ karonti, tvaṃ rājadhammesu ṭhito dhammena samena
analyzed: abhisekena abhisekikam mahā rājam karonti tvam rāja dhammesu ṭhitaḥ dhammena samena

original: rajjaṃ kārehi, etesu khattiyagaṇesu tvaṃ puttasinehānukampāya sahitacitto, hitasamamettacitto
analyzed: rajjam kārehi etesu khattiya gaṇesu tvam putta sineha anukampāya sahita cittaḥ hita sama metta cittaḥ

original: ca bhava, rakkhāvaraṇaguttiyā tesaṃ rakkhito ca bhavāhī”ti. Tato puna purohitopi
analyzed: ca bhava rakkhā āvaraṇa guttiyā tesam rakkhito ca bhavāhi iti tatas puna purohitaḥ api

original: porohiccaṭhānānurūpālaṅkārehi alaṅkatapaṭiyatto gaṅgodakapuṇṇaṃ rajatamayaṃ saṅkhaṃ
analyzed: porohit caṭhāna anurūpa alaṅkārehi alaṅkata paṭiyattaḥ gaṅgā udaka puṇṇam rajata mayam saṅkham

original: ubhohi hatthehi sakkaccaṃ gahetvā tassa sīsopari ussāpetvā tena tassa muddhani abhisekodakaṃ
analyzed: ubhohi hatthehi sakkaccam gahetvā tassa sīsa upari ussāpetvā tena tassa muddhani abhiseka udakaṃ

original: abhisiñcati, evañca vadeti “deva taṃ sabbepi brāhmaṇagaṇā attānamārakkhatthaṃ iminā
analyzed: abhisiñcati evam ca vadeti deva tam sabbe pi brāhmaṇa gaṇāḥ attānam ārakkha attham iminā

original: abhisekena abhisekikaṃ mahārājaṃ karonti, tvaṃ rājadhammesu ṭhito dhammena samena
analyzed: abhisekena abhisekikam mahā rājam karonti tvam rāja dhammesu ṭhitaḥ dhammena samena

original: rajjaṃ kārehi, etesu brāhmaṇagaṇesu tvaṃ puttasinehānukampāya sahitacitto, hitasamamettacitto
analyzed: rajjam kārehi etesu brāhmaṇa gaṇesu tvam putta sineha anukampāya sahita cittaḥ hita sama metta cittaḥ

original: ca bhava, rakkhāvaraṇaguttiyā tesaṃ rakkhito ca bhavāhī”ti. Tato puna seṭṭhipi seṭṭhiṭṭhānabhūsanabhūsito
analyzed: ca bhava rakkhā āvaraṇa guttiyā tesam rakkhito ca bhavāhi iti tato puna seṭṭhi pi seṭṭhi ṭhāna bhūsana bhūsito

original: gaṅgodakapuṇṇaṃ ratanamayaṃ saṅkhaṃ ubhohi hatthehi sakkaccaṃ gahetvā tassa sīsopari
analyzed: gaṅgā udaka puṇṇam ratana mayam saṅkham ubhohi hatthehi sakkaccam gahetvā tassa sīsa upari

original: ussāpetvā tena tassa muddhani abhisekodakaṃ abhisiñcati, evañca vadeti “deva taṃ
analyzed: ussāpetvā tena tassa muddhani abhiseka udakam abhisiñcati evañca vadeti deva tam

original: sabbepi gahapatigaṇā attānamārakkhatthaṃ iminā abhisekena abhisekikaṃ mahārājaṃ karonti,
analyzed: sabbe api gahapati gaṇāḥ attānam ārakkha attham iminā abhisekena abhisekikam mahā rājam karonti

original: tvaṃ rājadhammesu ṭhito dhammena samena rajjaṃ kārehi, etesu gahapatigaṇesu tvaṃ
analyzed: tvam rāja dhammesu ṭhitaḥ dhammena samena rajjam kārehi etesu gahapati gaṇesu tvam

original: puttasinehānukampāya sahitacitto, hitasamamettacitto ca bhava, rakkhāvaraṇaguttiyā
analyzed: putta sineha anukampāya sahita cittaḥ hita sama metta cittaḥ ca bhava rakkhā āvaraṇa guttiyā

original: tesaṃ rakkhito ca bhavāhī”ti. Te pana tassa evaṃ vadantā “sace tvaṃ amhākaṃ vacanānurūpaṃ
analyzed: tesam rakkhitaḥ ca bhavāhi iti te pana tassa evam vadantā sace tvam amhākam vacana anurūpam

original: rajjaṃ karissasi, iccetaṃ kusalaṃ. No ce karissasi, tava muddhā sattadhā phalatū”ti
analyzed: rajjam karissasi iccā itam kusalam no ce karissasi tava muddhā sattadhā phalatu uti

original: evaṃ rañño abhisapanti viyāti daṭṭhabbanti. Vaḍḍhakīsūkarajātakādīhi cāyamattho vibhāvetabbo,
analyzed: evam raññaḥ abhisapanti viya ati daṭṭhabbanti vaḍḍhakī sūkara jātaka ādīhi ca ayam atthaḥ vibhāvetabbaḥ

original: abhisekopakaraṇānipi samantapāsādikādīsu gahetabbānīti.
analyzed: abhiseka upakaraṇāni pi samantapāsādika ādīsu gahetabbāni iti

original: Yasmā nihatapaccāmitto, tasmā na samanupassatīti sambandho. Anavajjatā kusalabhāvenāti
analyzed: yasmai nihata pacca amittaḥ tasmai na samanupassati iti sambandhaḥ anavajja tā kusala bhāvena ati

original: āha “kusalaṃ sīlapadaṭṭhānehī”tiādi. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti – kusalasīlapadaṭṭhānā avippaṭisārapāmojjapītipassaddhidhammā,
analyzed: āha kusalam sīla padaṭṭhānehi itiādi idam vuttam hoti kusala sīla padaṭṭhānāḥ a vippaṭisāra pāmojja pīti passaddhi dhammā

original: avippaṭisārādinimittañca uppannaṃ cetasikasukhaṃ paṭisaṃvedeti, cetasikasukhasamuṭṭhānehi
analyzed: a vippaṭisāra ādi nimittam ca uppannam cetasika sukham paṭisaṃvedeti cetasika sukha samuṭṭhānehi

original: ca paṇītarūpehi phuṭṭhasarīrassa uppannaṃ kāyikasukhanti.
analyzed: ca paṇīta rūpehi phuṭṭha sarīrassa uppannam kāyika sukhan ti

original: Indriyasaṃvarakathāvaṇṇanā
analyzed: indriya saṃvara kathā vaṇṇanā

original: 213. Sāmaññassa visesāpekkhatāya idhādhippetopi viseso tena apariccatto eva hotīti
analyzed: sāmaññassa visesa apekkha tāya idha adhippetaḥ api visesaḥ tena apariccattaḥ eva hoti iti

original: āha “cakkhusaddo katthaci buddhacakkhumhi vattatī”tiādi. Vijjamānameva hi abhidheyyabhāvena
analyzed: āha cakkhu saddo katthaci buddha cakkhumhi vattati itiādi vijjamānam eva hi abhidheyya bhāvena

original: visesatthaṃ visesantaranivattanena visesasaddo vibhāveti, na avijjamānaṃ. Sesapadesupi
analyzed: visesa attham visesa antara nivattanena visesa saddaḥ vibhāveti na avijjamānam sesa padesu pi

original: eseva nayo. Aññehi asādhāraṇaṃ buddhānameva cakkhu dassananti buddhacakkhu, āsayānusayañāṇaṃ,
analyzed: esa iva nayaḥ aññehi asādhāraṇam buddhānam eva cakkhu dassanan ti buddha cakkhu āsaya anusaya ñāṇam

original: indriyaparopariyattañāṇañca. Samantato sabbaso dassanaṭṭhena cakkhūti samantacakkhu,
analyzed: indriya para upari yatta ñāṇam ca samantataḥ sabbasas dassana ṭṭhena cakkhu iti samantacakkhu

original: sabbaññutaññāṇaṃ. Tathūpamanti pabbatamuddhūpamaṃ, dhammamayaṃ pāsādanti sambandho.
analyzed: sabbaññu taññāṇam tathūpamanti pabbatam uddhūpamam dhamma mayam pāsādam ti sambandhaḥ

original: Sumedha samantacakkhu tvaṃ janatamavekkhassūti attho. Ariyamaggattayapaññāti heṭṭhimāriyamaggattayapaññā.
analyzed: sumedha samanta cakkhu tvam janatam avekkhassu iti atthaḥ ariya magga ttaya paññā ati heṭṭhimā ariya magga ttaya paññā

original: “Dhammacakkhu nāma heṭṭhimā tayo maggā, tīṇi ca phalānī”ti saḷāyatanavaggaṭṭhakathāyaṃ
analyzed: dhammacakkhu nāma heṭṭhimā tayaḥ maggā tīṇi ca phalāni iti saḷāyatana vagga ṭṭhakathā ayam

original: vuttaṃ, idha pana maggeheva phalāni saṅgahetvā dasseti. Catusaccasaṅkhāte dhamme
analyzed: vuttam idha pana maggehi iva phalāni saṅgahetvā dasseti catu sacca saṅkhāte dhamme

original: cakkhūti hi dhammacakkhu. Paññāyeva dassanaṭṭhena cakkhūti paññācakkhu, pubbenivāsāsavakkhayañāṇaṃ.
analyzed: cakkhu iti hi dhamma cakkhu paññāya iva dassana ṭṭhena cakkhu iti paññācakkhu pubbenivāsa āsava kkhaya ñāṇam

original: Dibbacakkhumhīti dutiyavijjāya. Idhāti “cakkhunā rūpaṃ disvā”ti imasmiṃ pāṭhe. Ayanti
analyzed: dibba cakkhumhi iti dutiya vijjāya idha ati cakkhunā rūpam disvā iti imasmin pāṭhe ayanti

original: cakkhusaddo. “Pasādacakkhuvohārenā”ti iminā idha cakkhusaddo cakkhupasādeyeva nippariyāyato
analyzed: cakkhu saddo pasāda cakkhu vohārena ati iminā idha cakkhu saddo cakkhu pasādeya iva nippariyāyato

original: vattati, pariyāyato pana nissayavohārena nissitassa vattabbato cakkhuviññāṇepi yathā
analyzed: vattati pariyāyataḥ pana nissaya vohārena nissitassa vattabbato cakkhu viññāṇe pi yathā

original: “mañcā ukkuṭṭhiṃ karontī”ti dasseti. Idhāpi sasambhārakathā avasiṭṭhāti katvā sesapadesupīti
analyzed: mañcāḥ ukkuṭṭhim karonti iti dasseti idha api sa sambhāra kathā avasiṭṭhā ati katvā sesa padesu pi iti

original: pi-saddaggahaṇaṃ, “na nimittaggāhī”tiādipadesupīti attho. Vividhaṃ asanaṃ khedanaṃ
analyzed: na nimitta ggāhi iti ādi padesu pi iti atthaḥ vividham asanam khedanam

original: byāseko, kileso eva byāseko, tena virahito tathā, virahitatā ca asammissatā, asammissabhāvo
analyzed: byāsekaḥ kilesaḥ eva byāsekaḥ tena virahitaḥ tathā virahita tā ca asammissa tā asammissa bhāvaḥ

original: ca sampayogābhāvato parisuddhatāti āha “asammissaṃ parisuddha”nti, kilesadukkhena
analyzed: ca sampayoga abhāvato parisuddha tā ti āha asammissam parisuddhanti kilesa dukkhena

original: avomissaṃ, tato ca suvisuddhanti attho. Sati ca suvisuddhe indriyasaṃvare nīvaraṇesu
analyzed: avomissam tatas ca su visuddhanti attho sati ca su visuddhe indriya saṃvare nīvaraṇesu

original: padhānabhūtapāpadhammavigamena adhicittānuyogo hatthagato eva hoti, tasmā adhicittasukhameva
analyzed: padhāna bhūta pāpa dhamma vigamena adhicitta anuyogaḥ hattha gataḥ eva hoti tasmai adhicitta sukham eva

original: “abyāsekasukha”nti vuccatīti dasseti “adhicittasukha”nti iminā.
analyzed: abyāseka sukhanti vuccati iti dasseti adhicitta sukhanti iminā

original: Satisampajaññakathāvaṇṇanā
analyzed: sati sampajañña kathā vaṇṇanā

original: 214. Samantato pakārehi, pakaṭṭhaṃ vā savisesaṃ jānātīti sampajāno, tassa bhāvo sampajaññaṃ,
analyzed: samantataḥ pakārehi pakaṭṭham vā sa visesam jānāti iti sampajāno tassa bhāvaḥ sampajaññam

original: tathāpavattañāṇaṃ, tassa vibhajanaṃ sampajaññabhājanīyaṃ, tasmiṃ sampajaññabhājanīyamhi.
analyzed: tathā pavatta ñāṇam tassa vibhajanam sampajañña bhājanīyam tasmim sampajañña bhājanīyamhi

original: “Gamana”nti iminā abhikkamanaṃ abhikkantanti bhāvasādhanamāha. Tathā paṭikkamanaṃ
analyzed: gamanam iti iminā abhikkamanam bhāva sādhanam āha tathā paṭikkamanam

original: paṭikkantanti vuttaṃ “nivattana”nti. Gamanañcettha nivattetvā, anivattetvā ca gamanaṃ,
analyzed: paṭikkantanti vuttam nivattanam ti gamanam ca ittha nivattetvā a nivattetvā ca gamanam

original: nivattanaṃ pana nivattimattameva, aññamaññamupādānakiriyāmattañcetaṃ dvayaṃ. Kathaṃ
analyzed: nivattanam pana nivattimattam eva aññam aññam upādāna kiriyāmattam ca itam dvayam katham

original: labbhatīti āha “gamane”tiādi. Abhiharantoti gamanavasena kāyaṃ upanento. Paṭinivattentoti
analyzed: labbhati iti āha gamana itiādi abhiharantaḥ ti gamana vasena kāyam upanentaḥ paṭinivattentaḥ iti

original: tato puna nivattento. Apanāmentoti apakkamanavasena pariṇāmento. Āsanassāti pīṭhakādiāsanassa.
analyzed: tatas puna nivattentaḥ apanāmento ti apakkamana vasena pariṇāmentaḥ āsanassa ati pīṭhaka ādi āsanassa

original: Purimaaṅgābhimukhoti aṭanikādipurimāvayavābhimukho. Saṃsarantoti saṃsappanto. Pacchimaaṅgapadesanti
analyzed: purima aṅga abhimukho ti aṭanikā ādi purima avayava abhimukho saṃsaranto iti saṃsappanto pacchima aṅga padesanti

original: aṭanikādipacchimāyavappadesaṃ. Paccāsaṃsarantoti paṭiāsappanto. “Eseva nayo”ti iminā
analyzed: aṭanikā ādi pacchima āyava ppadesam paccā saṃsaranto ti paṭiāsappanto esā iva nayo ti iminā

original: nipannasseva abhimukhaṃ saṃsappanapaṭiāsappanāni dasseti. Ṭhānanisajjāsayanesu hi
analyzed: nipannassa iva abhimukham saṃsappana paṭiāsappanāni dasseti ṭhāna nisajjā sayanesu hi

original: yo gamanavidhuro kāyassa purato abhihāro, so abhikkamo. Pacchato apahāro paṭikkamoti lakkhaṇaṃ.
analyzed: yaḥ gamana vidhuro kāyassa puratas abhihāro saḥ abhikkamaḥ pacchatas apahāro paṭikkamaḥ ti lakkhaṇam

original: Sampajānanaṃ sampajānaṃ, tena attanā kattabbakiccassa karaṇasīlo sampajānakārīti
analyzed: sampajānanam sampajānam tena attanā kattabba kiccassa karaṇa sīlaḥ sampajāna kārī iti

original: āha “sampajaññena sabbakiccakārī”ti. “Sampajaññameva vā kārī”ti iminā sampajānassa
analyzed: āha sampajaññena sabba kicca kārī iti sampajaññam eva vā kārī iti iminā sampajānassa

original: karaṇasīlo sampajānakārīti dasseti. “So hī”tiādi dutiyavikappassa samatthanaṃ. “Sampajañña”nti
analyzed: karaṇa sīlaḥ sampajāna kārī iti dasseti saḥ hi itiādi dutiya vikappassa samatthanam sampajaññanti

original: ca iminā sampajāna-saddassa sampajaññapariyāyatā vuttā. Tathā hi ācariyānandattherena
analyzed: ca iminā sampajāna saddassa sampajañña pariyāya tā vuttā tathā hi ācariya ānandattherena

original: vuttaṃ “samantato, sammā, samaṃ vā pajānanaṃ sampajānaṃ, tadeva sampajañña”nti ayaṃ
analyzed: vuttam samantataḥ sammā samam vā pajānanam sampajānam tat eva sampajaññanti ayam

original: aṭṭhakathāto aparo nayo – yathā atikkantādīsu asammohaṃ uppādeti, tathā sampajānassa
analyzed: aṭṭhakathātaḥ aparaḥ nayaḥ yathā atikkanta ādīsu asammoham uppādeti tathā sampajānassa

original: kāro karaṇaṃ sampajānakāro, so etassa atthīti sampajānakārīti.
analyzed: kāro karaṇam sampajāna kāro saḥ etassa atthi iti sampajāna kārī iti

original: Dhammato vaḍḍhisaṅkhātena atthena saha vattatīti sātthakaṃ, abhikkantādi, sātthakassa
analyzed: dhammataḥ vaḍḍhi saṅkhātena atthena saha vattati iti sātthakam abhikkanta ādi sātthakassa

original: sampajānanaṃ sātthakasampajaññaṃ. Sappāyassa attano patirūpassa sampajānanaṃ sappāyasampajaññaṃ.
analyzed: sampajānanam sātthaka sampajaññam sa pāyassa attanaḥ patirūpassa sampajānanam sa pāya sampajaññam

original: Abhikkamādīsu bhikkhācāragocare, aññattha ca pavattesu avijahitakammaṭṭhānasaṅkhāte
analyzed: abhikkama ādīsu bhikkhā ācāra gocare aññattha ca pavattesu a vijahita kammaṭṭhāna saṅkhāte

original: gocare sampajānanaṃ gocarasampajaññaṃ. Sāmaññaniddesena, hi ekasesanayena vā gocarasaddo
analyzed: gocare sampajānanam gocarasampajaññam sāmañña niddesena hi eka sesa nayena vā gocara saddo

original: tadatthadvayepi pavattati. Atikkamādīsu asammuyhanasaṅkhātaṃ asammohameva sampajaññaṃ
analyzed: tad attha dvaye pi pavattati atikkama ādīsu asammuyhana saṅkhātam asammoham eva sampajaññam

original: asammohasampajaññaṃ. Cittavasenevāti cittassa vaseneva, cittavasamanugatenevāti attho.
analyzed: asammoha sampajaññam citta vasena iva ati cittassa vasena iva citta vasam anugatena iva ati attho

original: Pariggahetvāti tulayitvā tīretvā, paṭisaṅkhāyāti attho. Saṅghadassaneneva uposathapavāraṇādiatthāya
analyzed: pariggahetvā iti tulayitvā tīretvā paṭisaṅkhāya ati attho saṅgha dassanena iva uposatha pavāraṇa ādi atthāya

original: gamanaṃ saṅgahitaṃ. Ādisaddena kasiṇaparikammādīnaṃ saṅgaho. Saṅkhepato vuttaṃ tadatthameva
analyzed: gamanam saṅgahitam ādi saddena kasiṇa parikamma ādīnam saṅgahaḥ saṅkhepataḥ vuttam tad attham eva

original: vivarituṃ “cetiyaṃ vā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Arahattaṃ pāpuṇātīti ukkaṭṭhaniddeso esa. Samathavipassanuppādanampi
analyzed: vivaritum cetiyam vā ātiādi vuttam arahattam pāpuṇāti iti ukkaṭṭha niddesaḥ esa samatha vipassana uppādanam pi

original: hi bhikkhuno vaḍḍhiyeva. Tatthāti asubhārammaṇe. Kecīti abhayagirivāsino. Āmisatoti
analyzed: hi bhikkhuno vaḍḍhiyā iva tattha ati asubha ārammaṇe keci iti abhayagiri vāsino āmisato ti

original: cīvarādiāmisapaccayato. Kasmāti āha “taṃ nissāyā”tiādi.
analyzed: cīvara ādi āmisa paccayato kasmā iti āha tam nissāya atiādi

original: Tasminti sātthakasampajaññavasena pariggahitaatthe. Yasmā pana dhammato vaḍḍhiyeva
analyzed: tasmin ti sātthaka sampajañña vasena pariggahita atthe yasmā pana dhammataḥ vaḍḍhiyā iva

original: attho nāma, tasmā yaṃ “sātthaka”nti adhippetaṃ gamanaṃ, taṃ sabbampi sappāyamevāti
analyzed: atthaḥ nāma tasmai yam sātthakam ti adhippetam gamanam tam sabbam pi sappāyam eva ati

original: siyā avisesena kassaci āsaṅkāti tannivattanatthaṃ “cetiyadassanaṃ tāvā”tiādi āraddhaṃ.
analyzed: siyā avisesena kassaci āsaṅkā ati tad nivattana attham cetiya dassanam tāva ati ādi āraddham

original: Mahāpūjāyāti mahatiyā pūjāya, bahūnaṃ pūjādivaseti vuttaṃ hoti. Cittakammarūpakānī

original: dutiye pana vāyodhātuyā anugamakatā, tejodhātuyā anugantabbatāti. Tattha akkantaṭṭhānato

analyzed: vītiharaṇam yāva patiṭṭhita pādo tāva haraṇam atiharaṇam tatas param haraṇam vītiharaṇanti

analyzed: vai ayam etesam visesaḥ

analyzed: sāmatthiyataḥ adhimatta tā itarāsam ca tad abhāvataḥ omatta tā ati dassentaḥ āha vossajja nepe

analyzed: hoti tathā ghaṭṭana kiriyāya pathavī dhātuyā vasena sannirujjhanassa sijjhanato tassā

original: Anugamakānugantabbatāvisesepi sati pathavīdhātuāpodhātubhāvamattaṃ sandhāya tathāsaddaggahaṇaṃ

analyzed: rūpa dhammā ca arūpa dhammā atiharaṇam na pāpuṇanti khaṇa matta avaṭṭhānato

original: Sabbattha esa nayo. Tattha tatthevāti yattha yattha uddharaṇādike uppannā, tattha

original: sayanaṃ, tasmāti attho. Andhabālaputhujjanasammūḷhassa attano abhikkamananivattanañhetaṃ

original: vacanaṃ. Atha vā “ko eko…pe… abhikkamana”nti codanāya “paramatthato hī”tiādinā sodhanā vuttā.
analyzed: vacanam atha vā ko ekope abhikkamananti codanāya paramatthataḥ hi iti ādinā sodhanā vuttā

original: Tasmiṃ tasmiṃ koṭṭhāseti yathāvutte chabbidhepi koṭṭhāse gamanādikassa apaccāmaṭṭhattā.

original: idaṃ yaṃ tato nirujjhamānacittato upari sattarasamacittassa uppādakkhaṇe uppannaṃ,

analyzed: pana anārammaṇāḥ pakāsetabbāḥ evam tesam pakāsetabba bhāva nipphatti soḷasahi cittehi

analyzed: atthaḥ veditabbaḥ aññam cittam nirujjhati aññam uppajjate cittanti yojetabbam aññaḥ

analyzed: bhāva napuṃsaka vacanam

analyzed: kattutthe sāmivacanam iti iti iminā ālokanena

original: Sātthakatā ca sappāyatā ca veditabbā ālokitavilokitassāti ajjhāharitvā sambandho.

original: Tasmāti kammaṭṭhānāvijahanasseva ālokitavilokite. Gocarasampajaññabhāvato etthāti
analyzed: tasmā ati kammaṭṭhāna avijahanassa iva ālokita vilokite gocara sampajañña bhāvato ettha ati
