original: viloketā. Viññattinti kāyaviññattiṃ. Itīti tasmā uppajjanato. Cittakiriyavāyodhātuvipphāravasenāti
analyzed: viloketā viññattin ti kāya viññattim iti iti tasmai uppajjanato citta kiriya vāyodhātu vipphāra vasena ati

original: kiriyamayacittasamuṭṭhānāya vāyodhātuyā vicalanākārasaṅkhātakāyaviññattivasena. Akkhidalanti
analyzed: kiriya maya citta samuṭṭhānāya vāyodhātuyā vicalana ākāra saṅkhāta kāya viññatti vasena akkhidalanti

original: akkhipaṭalaṃ. Adho sīdatīti osīdantaṃ viya heṭṭhā gacchati. Uddhaṃ laṅghetīti laṅghentaṃ
analyzed: akkhi paṭalam adhas sīdati iti osīdantam viya heṭṭhā gacchati uddham laṅgheti iti laṅghentam

original: viya upari gacchati. Yantakenāti akkhidalesu yojitarajjuyo gahetvā paribbhamanakacakkena.
analyzed: viya upari gacchati yantakena ati akkhi dalesu gahetvā paribbhamanaka cakkena

original: Tatoti tathā akkhidalānamosīdanullaṅghanato. Manodvārikajavanassa mūlakāraṇaparijānanaṃ
analyzed: tatas ti tathā manodvārika javanassa mūla kāraṇa parijānanam

original: mūlapariññā. Āgantukassa abbhāgatassa, tāvakālikassa ca taṅkhaṇamattapavattakassa
analyzed: mūla pariññā āgantukassa abbhāgatassa tāvakālikassa ca

original: bhāvo āgantukatāvakālikabhāvo, tesaṃ vasena.
analyzed: bhāvaḥ tesam vasena

original: Tatthāti tesu gāthāya dassitesu sattasu cittesu. Aṅgakiccaṃ sādhayamānanti padhānabhūtaaṅgakiccaṃ
analyzed: tattha ati tesu gāthāya dassitesu sattasu cittesu aṅga kiccam sādhayamānanti padhāna bhūta aṅga kiccam

original: nipphādentaṃ, sarīraṃ hutvāti vuttaṃ hoti. Bhavaṅgañhi paṭisandhisadisattā padhānamaṅgaṃ,
analyzed: nipphādentam sarīram hutvā iti vuttam hoti bhavaṅgam hi paṭisandhi sadisa ttā padhānam aṅgam

original: padhānañca “sarīra”nti vuccati, avicchedappavattihetubhāvena vā kāraṇakiccaṃ sādhayamānanti
analyzed: padhānam ca sarīranti vuccati aviccheda ppavatti hetu bhāvena vā kāraṇa kiccam sādhayamānan ti

original: attho. Taṃ āvaṭṭetvāti bhavaṅgasāmaññavasena vuttaṃ, pavattākāravisesavasena pana
analyzed: atthaḥ tam āvaṭṭetvā ti bhavaṅga sāmañña vasena vuttam pavatta ākāra visesa vasena pana

original: atītādinā tibbidhaṃ, tattha ca bhavaṅgupacchedasseva āvaṭṭanaṃ. Tannirodhāti tassa
analyzed: atīta ādinā tibbidham tattha ca āvaṭṭanam tad nirodhā ti tassa

original: nirujjhanato, anantarapaccayavasena hetuvacanaṃ. “Paṭhamajavanepi…pe… sattamajavanepī”ti
analyzed: nirujjhanataḥ anantara paccaya vasena hetuvacanam sattama javane pi iti

original: idaṃ pañcadvārikavīthiyaṃ “ayaṃ itthī, ayaṃ puriso”ti rajjanadussanamuyhanānamabhāvaṃ
analyzed: idam pañcadvārika vīthiyam ayam itthī ayam purisaḥ iti

original: sandhāya vuttaṃ. Tattha hi āvajjanavoṭṭhabbanānaṃ puretaraṃ pavattāyonisomanasikāravasena
analyzed: sandhāya vuttam tattha hi āvajjana voṭṭhabbanānam puretaram pavatta ayonisoma nasikāra vasena

original: ayoniso āvajjanavoṭṭhabbanākārena pavattanato iṭṭhe itthirūpādimhi lobhasahagatamattaṃ
analyzed: ayonisaḥ āvajjana voṭṭhabbana ākārena pavattanataḥ iṭṭhe itthi rūpa ādimhi lobha sahagata mattam

original: javanaṃ uppajjati, aniṭṭhe ca dosasahagatamattaṃ, na panekantarajjanadussanādi, manodvāre
analyzed: javanam uppajjati aniṭṭhe ca dosa sahagata mattam na manaḥ dvāre

original: eva ekantarajjanadussanādi hoti, tassa pana manodvārikassa rajjanadussanādino pañcadvārikajavanaṃ
analyzed: eva ekanta rajjana dussana ādi hoti tassa pana manodvārikassa rajjana dussana ādino pañcadvārika javanam

original: mūlaṃ, yathāvuttaṃ vā sabbampi bhavaṅgādi, evaṃ manodvārikajavanassa mūlakāraṇavasena
analyzed: mūlam yathā vuttam vā sabbam pi bhavaṅga ādi evam manaḥ dvārika javanassa mūla kāraṇa vasena

original: mūlapariññā vuttā, āgantukatāvakālikatā pana pañcadvārika javanasseva apubbabhāvavasena,
analyzed: mūla pariññā vuttā āgantuka tā avakālika tā pana pañcadvārika javanassa iva apubba bhāva vasena

original: ittaratāvasena ca. Yuddhamaṇḍaleti saṅgāmappadese. Heṭṭhupariyavasenāti heṭṭhā ca
analyzed: ittara tā vasena ca yuddha maṇḍala iti saṅgāma ppadese heṭṭhu pariya vasena ati heṭṭhā ca

original: upari ca parivattamānavasena, aparāparaṃ bhavaṅguppattivasenāti attho. Tathā bhavaṅguppādavasena
analyzed: upari ca parivattamāna vasena apara aparam bhavaṅga uppatti vasena ati tathā bhavaṅga uppāda vasena

original: hi tesaṃ bhijjitvā patanaṃ, iminā pana heṭṭhimassa, uparimassa ca bhavaṅgassa aparāparuppattivasena
analyzed: hi tesam bhijjitvā patanam iminā pana heṭṭhimassa uparimassa ca bhavaṅgassa apara apara uppatti vasena

original: pañcadvārikajavanato visadisassa manodvārikajavanassa uppādaṃ dasseti tassa vaseneva
analyzed: pañca dvārika javanataḥ visadisassa manodvārika javanassa uppādam dasseti tassa vasena iva

original: rajjanādipavattanato. Tenevāha “rajjanādivasena ālokitavilokitaṃ hotī”ti.
analyzed: rajjana ādi pavattanataḥ tena iva āha rajjana ādi vasena ālokita vilokitam hoti iti

original: Āpāthanti gocarabhāvaṃ. Sakakiccanipphādanavasenāti āvajjanādikiccanipphādanavasena.
analyzed: gocara bhāvam saka kicca nipphādana vasena ati āvajjana ādi kicca nipphādana vasena

original: Tanti javanaṃ. Cakkhudvāre rūpassa āpāthagamanena āvajjanādīnaṃ pavattanato pavattikāraṇavaseneva
analyzed: tanti javanam cakkhu dvāre rūpassa āpātha gamanena āvajjana ādīnam pavattanataḥ pavatti kāraṇa vasena iva

original: “gehabhūte”ti vuttaṃ, na nissayavasena. Āgantukapuriso viyāti abbhāgatapuriso viya.
analyzed: geha bhūtā iti vuttam na nissaya vasena āgantuka purisaḥ viya ati abbhāgata purisaḥ viya

original: Duvidhā hi āgantukā atithiabbhāgatavasena. Tattha kataparicayo “atithī”ti vuccati,
analyzed: duvidhāḥ hi āgantukāḥ atithi abbhāga ta vasena tattha kata paricayaḥ atithi iti vuccati

original: akataparicayo “abbhāgato”ti, ayamevidhādhippeto. Tenāha “yathā paragehe”tiādi. Tassāti
analyzed: a kata paricayaḥ abbhāgato ti tena āha yathā para geha itiādi tassa ati

original: javanassa rajjanadussanamuyhanaṃ ayuttanti sambandho. Āsinesūti nisinnesu. Āṇākaraṇanti attano vasakaraṇaṃ.
analyzed: javanassa rajjana dussana muyhanam ayuttanti sambandhaḥ āsinesu iti nisinnesu āṇākaraṇam ati attanaḥ vasa karaṇam

original: Saddhiṃ sampayuttadhammehi phassādīhi. Tattha tattheva sakakiccanipphādanaṭṭhāne
analyzed: saddhim sampayutta dhammehi phassa ādīhi tattha tattha iva saka kicca nipphādana ṭṭhāne

original: bhijjanti. Itīti tasmā āvajjanādivoṭṭhabbanapariyosānānaṃ bhijjanato. Ittarānīti
analyzed: bhijjanti iti iti tasmai āvajjana ādi voṭṭhabbana pariyosānānam bhijjanataḥ ittarāni iti

original: aciraṭṭhitikāni. Tatthāti tasmiṃ vacane ayaṃ upamāti attho. Udayabbayaparicchinno
analyzed: acira ṭṭhitikāni tattha ati tasmin vacane ayam upamā ati atthaḥ udaya bbaya paricchinnaḥ

original: tāva tattako kālo etesanti tāvakālikāni, tassa bhāvo, taṃvasena.
analyzed: tāva tattakaḥ kālaḥ tassa bhāvaḥ taṃvasena

original: Etanti asammohasampajaññaṃ. Etthāti etasmiṃ yathāvuttadhammasamudāye. Dassanaṃ cakkhuviññāṇaṃ, tassa vaseneva ālokanavilokanapaññāyanato āvajjanādīnamaggahaṇaṃ.
analyzed: etat ti asammoha sampajaññam ettha ati etasmin yathāvutta dhamma samudāye dassanam cakkhu viññāṇam tassa vasena iva ālokana vilokana paññāyanataḥ āvajjana ādīnam aggahaṇam

original: Samavāyeti sāmaggiyaṃ. Tatthāti pañcakkhandhavasena ālokanavilokana paññāyamāne.
analyzed: samavāya iti sāmaggiyam tattha āti pañca kkhandha vasena ālokana vilokana paññāyamāne

original: Nimittatthe cetaṃ bhummaṃ, tabbinimuttako ko eko āloketi na tveva āloketi. Ko ca
analyzed: nimitta atthe ca itam bhummam kaḥ ekaḥ āloketi na tu eva āloketi kaḥ ca

original: eko viloketi natveva viloketīti attho.
analyzed: ekaḥ vilokā iti na tvā iva vilokā iti iti attho

original: “Tathā”tiādi āyatanavasena, dhātuvasena ca dassanaṃ. Cakkhurūpāni yathārahaṃ dassanassa
analyzed: tathā atiādi āyatana vasena dhātu vasena ca dassanam cakkhu rūpāni yathāraham dassanassa

original: nissayārammaṇapaccayo, tathā āvajjanā anantarādipaccayo, āloko upanissayapaccayoti
analyzed: nissaya ārammaṇa paccayaḥ tathā āvajjanā anantara ādi paccayaḥ ālokaḥ upanissaya paccayaḥ ti

original: dassanassa suttantanayena pariyāyato paccayatā vuttā. Sahajātapaccayopi dassanasseva,
analyzed: dassanassa suttanta nayena pariyāyataḥ paccaya tā vuttā sahajāta paccayaḥ pi dassanassa iva

original: nidassanamattañcetaṃ aññamaññasampayuttaatthiavigatādipaccayānampi labbhanato, “sahajātādipaccayā”tipi
analyzed: labbhanato sahajāta ādi paccayā atipi

original: adhunā pāṭho dissati. “Eva”ntiādi nigamanaṃ.
analyzed: adhunā pāṭhaḥ dissati evanti ādi nigamanam

original: Idāni yathāpāṭhaṃ samiñjanapasāraṇesu sampajānaṃ vibhāvento “samiñjite pasārite”tiādimāha.
analyzed: idāni yathāpāṭham samiñjana pasāraṇesu sampajānam samiñjite pasārita iti ādim āha

original: Tattha pabbānanti pabbabhūtānaṃ. Taṃsamiñjanapasāraṇeneva hi sabbesaṃ hatthapādānaṃ
analyzed: tattha pabbānam ti pabba bhūtānam taṃsa miñjana pasāraṇena iva hi sabbesam hattha pādānam

original: samiñjanapasāraṇaṃ hoti, pabbametesanti vā pabbā yathā “saddho”ti, pabbavantānanti
analyzed: samiñjana pasāraṇam hoti pabbam etesanti vā pabbāḥ yathā saddhā uti pabbavantānam

original: attho. Cittavasenevāti cittaruciyā eva, cittasāmatthiyā vā. Yaṃ yaṃ cittaṃ uppajjati
analyzed: citta vasena iva ati citta ruciyā eva citta sāmatthiyā vā yam yam cittam uppajjati

original: sātthepi anatthepi samiñjituṃ, pasārituṃ vā, taṃtaṃcittānugateneva samiñjanapasāraṇamakatvāti
analyzed: sa atthe api anatthe api samiñjitum pasāritum vā tad tad citta anugatena iva samiñjana pasāraṇam a katvā iti

original: vuttaṃ hoti. Tatthāti samiñjanapasāraṇesu atthānatthapariggaṇhanaṃ veditabbanti sambandho.
analyzed: vuttam hoti tattha ati samiñjana pasāraṇesu attha anattha pariggaṇhanam veditabbanti sambandhaḥ

original: Khaṇe khaṇeti tathā ṭhitakkhaṇassa byāpanicchāvacanaṃ. Vedanāti santhambhanādīhi
analyzed: khaṇe khaṇe ti tathā ṭhita kkhaṇassa byāpana icchā vacanam vedanā ati santhambhana ādīhi

original: rujjanā. “Vedanā uppajjatī”tiādinā paramparapayojanaṃ dasseti. Tathā “tā vedanā nuppajjantī”tiādināpi.
analyzed: rujjanā vedanā uppajjati itiādinā parampara payojanam dasseti tathā tāḥ vedanāḥ na uppajjanti itiādinā api

original: Purimaṃ purimañhi pacchimassa pacchimassa kāraṇavacanaṃ. Kāleti samiñjituṃ, pasārituṃ
analyzed: purimam purimam hi pacchimassa pacchimassa kāraṇa vacanam kāla iti samiñjitum pasāritum

original: vā yuttakāle. Phātinti vuddhiṃ. Jhānādi pana viseso.
analyzed: vā yutta kāle vuddhim jhāna ādi pana visesaḥ

original: Tatrāyaṃ nayoti sappāyāsappāyaapariggaṇhane vatthusandassanasaṃṅkhāto nayo. Tadapariggahaṇe
analyzed: tatra ayam nayo ti sappāya asappāya a pariggaṇhane vatthu sandassana saṃṅkhātaḥ nayo tad a pariggahaṇe

original: ādīnavadassaneneva pariggahaṇepi ānisaṃso vibhāvitoti tesamidha udāharaṇaṃ veditabbaṃ.
analyzed: ādīnava dassanena iva pariggahaṇe pi ānisaṃso vibhāvito ti tesam idha udāharaṇam veditabbam

original: Mahācetiyaṅgaṇeti duṭṭhagāmaṇiraññā katassa hemamālīnāmakassa mahācetiyassa aṅgaṇe. Vuttañhi –
analyzed: mahā cetiya ṅgaṇa iti duṭṭha gāmaṇi raññā katassa hemamālī nāmakassa mahā cetiyassa aṅgaṇe vuttam hi

original: “Dīpappasādako thero, rājino ayyakassa me;
analyzed: dīpappasādakaḥ theraḥ rājinaḥ ayyakassa me

original: Evaṃ kirāha nattā te, duṭṭhagāmaṇi bhūpati.
analyzed: evam kira āha nattā te duṭṭha gāmaṇi bhūpati

original: Mahāpuñño mahāthūpaṃ, soṇṇamāliṃ manoramaṃ;
analyzed: mahā puññaḥ mahā thūpam soṇṇa mālim manoramam

original: Vīsaṃ hatthasataṃ uccaṃ, kāressati anāgate”ti.
analyzed: vīsam hattha satam uccam kāressati anāgata iti

original: Bhūmippadeso cettha aṅgaṇaṃ “udaṅgaṇe tattha papaṃ avindu”ntiādisu viya, tasmā upacārabhūte
analyzed: bhūmippadeso ca ittha aṅgaṇam udaṅgaṇe tattha tasmai upacāra bhūte

original: susaṅkhate bhūmippadeseti attho. Teneva kāraṇena gihī jātoti kāyasaṃsaggasamāpajjanahetunā
analyzed: su saṅkhate bhūmi ppadese ti attho tena iva kāraṇena gihī jātaḥ ti kāya saṃsagga samāpajjana hetunā

original: ukkaṇṭhito hutvā hīnāyāvatto. Jhāyīti jhāyanaṃ ḍayhanamāpajji. Mahācetiyaṅgaṇepi
analyzed: ukkaṇṭhitaḥ hutvā hīnāya avattaḥ jhāyi iti jhāyanam ḍayhanam āpajji mahā cetiyaṅgaṇe pi

original: cīvarakuṭiṃ katvā tattha sajjhāyaṃ gaṇhantīti vuttaṃ “cīvarakuṭidaṇḍake”ti, cīvarakuṭiyā
analyzed: cīvara kuṭim katvā tattha sajjhāyam gaṇhanti iti vuttam cīvara kuṭi daṇḍaka iti cīvara kuṭiyā

original: cīvarachadanatthāya katadaṇḍaketi attho. “Maṇisappo nāma sīhaḷadīpe vijjamānā ekā
analyzed: cīvara chadana tthāya kata daṇḍakā iti atthaḥ maṇisappaḥ nāma sīhaḷadīpe vijjamānā ekā

original: sappajātīti vadantī”ti ācariyānandattherena, ācariyadhammapālattherena ca vuttaṃ.
analyzed: sappajātī iti vadanti iti ācariya ānanda therena ācariya dhammapāla ttherena ca vuttam

original: “Keci, apare, aññe”ti vā avatvā “vadanti”cceva vacanañca sārato gahetabbatāviññāpanatthaṃ
analyzed: keci apare aññā iti vā a vatvā vadanti icca iva vacanam ca sārataḥ gahetabba tā viññāpana attham

original: aññathā gahetabbassa avacanato, tasmā na nīlasappādi idha “maṇisappo”ti veditabbo.
analyzed: aññathā gahetabbassa avacanato tasmā na nīla sappa ādi idha maṇisappaḥ ti veditabbaḥ

original: Mahātheravatthunāti evaṃnāmakassa therassa vatthunā. Antevāsikehīti tattha nisinnesu
analyzed: mahā thera vatthunā ti evaṃnāmakassa therassa vatthunā antevāsikehi iti tattha nisinnesu

original: bahūsu antevāsikesu ekena antevāsikena. Tenāha “taṃ antevāsikā pucchiṃsū”ti. Kammaṭṭhānanti
analyzed: bahūsu antevāsikesu ekena antevāsikena tena āha tam antevāsikā kammaṭṭhānam ti

original: “abbhantare attā nāmā”tiādinā vakkhamānappakāraṃ dhātukammaṭṭhānaṃ. Pakaraṇatopi
analyzed: abbhantare attā nāma ati ādinā vakkhamāna ppakāram dhātu kammaṭṭhānam pakaraṇataḥ pi

original: hi attho viññāyatīti. Tattha ṭhitānaṃ pucchantānaṃ saṅgahaṇavasena “tumhehī”ti puna
analyzed: hi atthaḥ viññāyati iti tattha ṭhitānam pucchantānam saṅgahaṇa vasena tumhehi iti puna

original: puthuvacanakaraṇaṃ. Evaṃ rūpaṃ sabhāvo yassāti evarūpo niggahitalopavasena tena,
analyzed: puthuvacana karaṇam evam rūpam sabhāvaḥ yassa ati evarūpaḥ niggahita lopa vasena tena

original: kammaṭṭhānamanasikārasabhāvenāti attho. Evametthāpīti api-saddena heṭṭhā vuttaṃ ālokitavilokitapakkhamapekkhanaṃ
analyzed: kammaṭṭhāna manasikāra sabhāvena āti atthaḥ evam ettha api iti api saddena heṭṭhā vuttam ālokita vilokita pakkham apekkhanam

original: karoti. Ayaṃ nayo uparipi.
analyzed: karoti ayam uparipi

original: Suttākaḍḍhanavasenāti yante yojitasuttānaṃ āviñchanavasena. Dāruyantassāti dārunā
analyzed: sutta ākaḍḍhana vasena ati yante yojita suttānam āviñchana vasena dāru yantassa ati dārunā

original: katayantarūpassa. Taṃ taṃ kiriyaṃ yāti pāpuṇāti, hatthapādādīhi vā taṃ taṃ ākāraṃ
analyzed: kata yanta rūpassa tam tam kiriyam yāti pāpuṇāti hattha pāda ādīhi vā tam tam ākāram

original: kurumānaṃ yāti gacchatīti yantaṃ, naṭakādipañcālikārūpaṃ, dārunā kataṃ yantaṃ tathā,
analyzed: kurumānam yāti gacchati iti yantam naṭaka ādi pañcālikā rūpam dārunā katam yantam tathā

original: nidassanamattañcetaṃ. Tathā hi naṃ potthena vatthena alaṅkariyattā potthalikā, pañca
analyzed: tathā hi nam potthena vatthena potthalikā pañca

original: aṅgāni yassā sajīvassevāti pañcālikāti ca voharanti. Hatthapādalaḷananti hatthapādānaṃ
analyzed: aṅgāni yassā sa jīvassa iva ati pañcālikā iti ca voharanti hattha pāda laḷananti hattha pādānam

original: kampanaṃ, hatthapādehi vā līḷākaraṇaṃ.
analyzed: kampanam hattha pādehi vā līḷā karaṇam

original: Saṅghāṭipattacīvaradhāraṇeti ettha saṅghāṭicīvarānaṃ samānadhāraṇatāya ekatodassanaṃ
analyzed: saṅghāṭi patta cīvara dhāraṇā iti ettha saṅghāṭi cīvarānam samāna dhāraṇa tāya ekatas dassanam

original: ganthagarutāpanayanatthaṃ, antaravāsakassa nivāsanavasena, sesānaṃ pārupanavasenāti
analyzed: gantha garu ta apanayana attham antaravāsakassa nivāsana vasena sesānam pārupana vasena ati

original: yathārahamattho. Tatthāti saṅghāṭicīvaradhāraṇapattadhāraṇesu. Vuttappakāroti paccavekkhaṇavidhinā
analyzed: yathāraham attho tattha ati saṅghāṭi cīvara dhāraṇa patta dhāraṇesu vutta ppakāraḥ ti paccavekkhaṇa vidhinā

original: sutte vuttappabhedo.

original: “ācārapaṇṇattī”ti vuttaṃ. Ādi-saddena vārittapaṇṇattisikkhāpadaṃ saṅgaṇhāti.
analyzed: ācāra paṇṇattī iti vuttam ādi saddena vāritta paṇṇatti sikkhāpadam saṅgaṇhāti

original: Pavesitoti pavesāpito. Bandhanāgāraṃ pavesāpitattā aladdhanakkhattānubhavano puriso
analyzed: pavesito ti pavesāpitaḥ bandhanāgāram pavesāpita ttā a laddha nakkhatta anubhavanaḥ puriso

original: hi “nakkhattadivase bandhanāgāraṃ pavesito puriso”ti vutto, nakkhattadivase eva vā

original: tadananubhavanatthaṃ tathā kato puriso evaṃ vuttotipi vaṭṭati. Aparasminti tato pacchime,
analyzed: tad ananubhavana ttham tathā kataḥ purisaḥ evam vuttaḥ ti pi vaṭṭati aparasmin ti tatas pacchime

original: aññasmiṃ vā nakkhattadivase. Okāsanti kammakāraṇākāraṇaṃ, kammakāraṇakkhaṇaṃ vā.
analyzed: aññasmin vā nakkhatta divase kamma kāraṇa akāraṇam kamma kāraṇa kkhaṇam vā

original: Mahānatthakaranti diṭṭhadhammikādiatthahāpanamukhena mahato anatthassa kārakaṃ. Cha
analyzed: mahānatthakaranti diṭṭhadhammika ādi attha hāpana mukhena mahataḥ anatthassa kārakam cha

original: dhammeti atibhojane nimittaggāho, iriyāpathasamparivattanatā, ālokasaññāmanasikāro,
analyzed: dhamme ti ati bhojane nimitta ggāhaḥ iriyāpatha samparivattana tā āloka saññā manasikāro

original: abbhokāsavāso, kalyāṇamittatā, sappāyakathāti ime cha dhamme, dhammanakkhattassāti
analyzed: abbhokāsa vāso kalyāṇa mitta tā sappāya kathā ati ime cha dhamme dhamma nakkhattassa ati

original: yathāvuttasotabbadhammasaṅkhātassa mahassa. Sādhūnaṃ ratijananato hi dhammopi chaṇasadisaṭṭhena

original: “nakkhatta”nti vutto.
analyzed: nakkhattan ti vuttaḥ

original: Uddhaccakukkucce mahānatthakaranti parāyattatāpādanena vuttanayena mahato anatthassa

original: kalyāṇamittatā, sappāyakathāti ime cha dhamme. Balassa, balena vā attanā icchitassa

original: na paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ. Ayañhi upacārabhāvanādhikāro.

original: Balavāti paccatthikavidhamanasamatthena balena balavā vantu-saddassa abhisayatthavisiṭṭhassa
analyzed: balavā ti paccatthika vidhamana samatthena balena balavā vantu saddassa abhisaya ttha visiṭṭhassa

original: atthiyatthassa bodhanato. Hatthasāranti hatthagatadhanasāraṃ. Sajjāvudhoti sajjitadhanvādiāvudho,

original: sannaddhapañcāvudhoti attho. Sūravīrasevakajanavasena saparivāro. Tanti yathāvuttaṃ

analyzed: duccarita vidhūnan ūpāyoti

analyzed: sakala sarīram khobhayamānā ati iminā pi iti nāma ettha balava pīti iti dasseti sā hi

analyzed: nekkhamma pada ttham yathātatham aggahetvā pāḷiyam aṭṭhakathāyam pi saṃkiṇṇa ākulam keci karonti iti

original: Paṭhamajjhānakathāvaṇṇanā
226. Yadevaṃ “sukhino cittaṃ samādhiyatī”ti eteneva upacāravasenapi appanāvasenapi

original: kimatthiyāti codanāya “so vivicceva…pe… vuttanti veditabba”nti vuttaṃ. Tattha “samāhite”ti

original: vuccati. Karoti hi mātu soṇitasaṅkhātapupphassa, pitu sukkasaṅkhātasambhavassa ca
analyzed: vuccati karoti hi mātu soṇita saṅkhāta pupphassa pitu sukka saṅkhāta sambhavassa ca

original: nāmaṃ, tato jāto pana aṇḍajajalābujavasena gabbhaseyyakakāyova. Kāmaṃ opapātikādīnampi
analyzed: tatas jātaḥ pana aṇḍa ja jalābu ja vasena gabbhaseyyaka kāyaḥ uva kāmam opapātika ādīnam pi

original: hetusampannānaṃ yathāvuttasamādhisamadhigamo sambhavati, tathāpi yebhuyyattā, pākaṭattā
analyzed: hetu sampannānam yathā vutta samādhi samadhigamaḥ sambhavati tathā api yebhuyyat tā pākaṭat tā

original: ca sveva kāyo vuttoti. Karoti putte nibbattetīti karo, sukkasoṇitaṃ, karena jāto karajotipi vadanti.
analyzed: ca su eva kāyaḥ vutto ti karoti putte nibbatteti iti karo sukka soṇitam karena jātaḥ karajoti pi vadanti

original: Nanu ca nāmakāyopi vivekajena pītisukhena tathā laddhūpakārova siyā, atha kasmā yathāvutto
analyzed: nanu ca nāma kāyaḥ api viveka jena pīti sukhena tathā laddhu upakāraḥ iva siyā atha kasmai yathā vuttaḥ

original: rūpakāyova idha gahitoti? Saddantarābhisambandhena adhigatattā. “Abhisandetī”tiādisaddantarābhisambandhato
analyzed: idha saddantara abhisambandhena adhigata ttā

original: hi rūpakāyo eva idha bhagavatā vuttoti adhigamīyati tasseva abhisandanādikiriyāyogyattāti.
analyzed: hi rūpa kāyaḥ eva idha bhagavatā vuttaḥ ti tassa iva abhisandana ādi kiriyā yogya ttā ati

original: Abhisandetīti abhisandanaṃ karoti, so imameva kāyaṃ vivekajena pītisukhenāti hi bhedavasena,
analyzed: abhisandeti iti abhisandanam karoti saḥ imam eva kāyam viveka jena pīti sukhena ati hi bheda vasena

original: samudāyāvayavavasena ca parikappanāmattasiddhā hetukiriyā ettha labbhati, abhisandanaṃ
analyzed: samudāya avayava vasena ca parikappanā matta siddhā hetu kiriyā ettha labbhati abhisandanam

original: panetaṃ jhānamayena pītisukhena karajakāyassa tintabhāvāpādanaṃ, sabbatthakameva
analyzed: pana itam jhāna mayena pīti sukhena karaja kāyassa tinta bhāva āpādanam sabbatthakam eva

analyzed: ca lūkha bhāvassa apanayananti āha sneha iti iti avassuta bhāvam alla bhāvam ca

analyzed: karoti iti atthaḥ atthato pana abhisandanam nāma yathāvutta pīti sukha samuṭṭhānehi paṇīta rūpehi

original: kāyassa parippharaṇaṃ daṭṭhabbaṃ. Tenevāha “sabbattha pavattapīti sukhaṃ karotī”ti.
analyzed: kāyassa parippharaṇam daṭṭhabbam tena iva āha sabbattha pavattapīti sukham karoti iti

original: Taṃsamuṭṭhānarūpapharaṇavaseneva hi sabbattha pavattapītisukhatā. Parisandetītiādīsupi
analyzed: tad samuṭṭhāna rūpa pharaṇa vasena iva hi sabbattha pavatta pīti sukha tā parisandeti iti ādīsu pi

original: eseva nayo. Bhastaṃ nāma cammapasibbakaṃ. Parippharatīti suddhakiriyāpadaṃ. Tena
analyzed: esa iva nayaḥ bhastam nāma camma pasibbakam parippharati iti suddha kiriyā padam tena

analyzed: sabbam etassa atthi iti sabbavā yathā guṇavā ati tassa sabbavataḥ avayava avayavī sambandhe

original: avayavīvisayoyevesa sabbasaddoti mantvā chavimaṃsādikoṭṭhāsasaṅkhātena avayavena
analyzed: sabba saddo ti mantvā chavi maṃsa ādi koṭṭhāsa saṅkhātena avayavena

analyzed: avayavībhāvam dassentaḥ āha sabba koṭṭhāsavataḥ kāyassa ati kiñci iti etassa upāpe

original: Yattha yattha kammajarūpaṃ, tattha tattha cittajarūpassāpi byāpanato tena tassa kāyassa

analyzed: phuṭa bhāvam sandhāya aphuṭam nāma na hoti iti vuttam

original: 227. Chekoti kusalo, taṃ pana kosallaṃ “kaṃsathāle nhāniyacuṇṇāni ākiritvā”tiādisaddantarasannidhānato,
analyzed: kusalaḥ tam pana kosallam kaṃsa thāle nhāniya cuṇṇāni ākiritvā ati ādi sadda antara sannidhānato

analyzed: pakaraṇato ca nhāniya cuṇṇānam karaṇe payojane piṇḍane ca samattha tā vasena veditabbanti

analyzed: dasseti paṭibalaḥ iti ādinā kaṃsa saddaḥ pana mahatiyā kaṃsapātiyā ati ādīsu suvaṇṇe

original: katthaci loheti āha “yena kenaci lohena katabhājane”ti. Nanu upamākaraṇamattamevidaṃ,

analyzed: byāpana karaṇa vasena parisiñcitvā parisiñcitvā ti atthaḥ anupasaggaḥ api hi saddo sa aupasaggaḥ

analyzed: phuṭā udaka snehena ati āha sabbatthakam eva udaka sinehena phuṭā ti sabbattha

analyzed: na ca paggharaṇī iti pana tena āha na ca

original: binduṃ bindu”ntiādi. Udakassa phusitaṃ phusitaṃ, na ca paggharaṇī sūdanīti attho,
analyzed: bindum bindum tiādi udakassa phusitam phusitam na ca paggharaṇī sūdanī ti attho

original: Dutiyajjhānakathāvaṇṇanā
analyzed: dutiya jhāna kathā vaṇṇanā

analyzed: addha māsanti ettha api vuṭṭhinti vassanam anuppavaccheyya ati

original: Idha pana sāvakānaṃ vipassanāva adhippetā.

original: Evamīdisesu. Nibbānaṃ, arahattamaggo ca ukkaṭṭhaniddesena idha khayo nāma, tattha
analyzed: evamīdisesu nibbānam arahatta maggo ca ukkaṭṭha niddesena idha khayaḥ nāma tattha

original: Arāti dūrā. “Arā siṅghāmi vārija”ntiādīsu viya hi dūratthoyaṃ nipāto. “Ārā”tipi pāṭho.

analyzed: arāsaddaḥ viya ārāsaddaḥ api dūra atthe ekaḥ nipāto ti veditabbaḥ tat eva hi padam sadda satthe

original: katvā, yo “muttiko”tipi vuccati. Savati pasavatīti sambuko, yaṃ “jalasutti, saṅkhalikā”ti
analyzed: katvā yaḥ muttikā iti pi vuccati savati pasavati iti sambukaḥ yam jala sutti saṅkhalikā ati

original: ca voharanti. Samāhāre yebhuyyato napuṃsakapayogoti vuttaṃ “sippiyasambuka”nti. Evamīdisesu.
analyzed: ca voharanti samāhāre yebhuyyataḥ napuṃsaka payogaḥ iti vuttam sippiya sambukam ti evam īdisesu

original: Sakkharāti muṭṭhippamāṇā pāsāṇā. Kathalānīti kapālakhaṇḍāni. Samūhavācakassa ghaṭāsaddassa

original: itthi liṅgassāpi dissanato “gumba”nti padassatthaṃ dasseti “ghaṭā”ti iminā.
analyzed: itthi liṅgassa api dissanataḥ padassa attham dasseti iminā

original: Kāmañca “sippiyasambukampi sakkharakathalampi macchagumbampi tiṭṭhantampi carantampī”ti
analyzed: kāmañca sippiya sambukampi sakkhara kathalampi maccha gumbampi tiṭṭhantampi carantampi iti

original: ettha sakkharakathalaṃ tiṭṭhatiyeva, sippiyasambukamacchagumbāni carantipi tiṭṭhantipi,
analyzed: ettha sakkhara kathalam tiṭṭhatiyā iva sippiya sambuka maccha gumbāni caranti pi tiṭṭhanti pi

original: tathāpi sahacaraṇanayena sabbāneva caranti viya evaṃ vuttanti atthaṃ dassento “tiṭṭhantampi
analyzed: tathā api sahacaraṇa nayena sabbān eva caranti viya evam vuttan ti attham dassento tiṭṭhantam pi

original: carantampīti etthā”tiādimāha. Tattha hi “sakkharakathalaṃ tiṭṭhatiyevā”tiādinā yathāsambhavamatthaṃ
analyzed: carantam pi iti ettha atiādim āha tattha hi sakkhara kathalam tiṭṭhati yeva iti ādinā yathāsambhavam attham

original: dasseti, “yathā panā”tiādinā pana sahacaraṇanayaṃ. Pana-saddo arucisaṃsūcane, tathāpīti
analyzed: dassa iti yathā pana ati ādinā pana sahacaraṇa nayam pana saddaḥ aruci saṃsūcane tathā api iti

original: attho. Antarantarāti bahūnaṃ gāvīnamantarantarā ṭhitāsu gāvīsu vijjamānāsupi. Gāvoti
analyzed: attho antar antarā iti bahūnam gāvīnam antar antarā ṭhitāsu gāvīsu vijjamānāsu pi gāvaḥ iti

original: gāviyo. Itarāpīti ṭhitāpi nisinnāpi. Carantīti vuccanti sahacaraṇanayena. Tiṭṭhantamevātiādīsu
analyzed: itarā api iti ṭhitā api nisinnā api carantī iti vuccanti sahacaraṇa nayena tiṭṭhantam eva ati ādīsu

original: ayamadhippāyo – sippiyasambukamacchagumbānaṃ caraṇakiriyāyapi yogato ṭhānakiriyāya
analyzed: ayam adhippāyaḥ yogataḥ ṭhāna kiriyāya

original: anekantattā ekantato tiṭṭhantameva na kadācipi carantaṃ sakkharakathalaṃ upādāya
analyzed: anekanta ttā ekantataḥ tiṭṭhantam eva na kadācipi carantam sakkhara kathalam upādāya

original: sippiyasambukampi macchagumbampi tiṭṭhantanti vuttaṃ, na tu tesaṃ ṭhānakiriyamupādāya.
analyzed: sippiya sambukam pi maccha gumbam pi tiṭṭhantam ti vuttam na tu tesam ṭhāna kiriyam upādāya

analyzed: tesam pana caraṇa kiriyam upādāya carantam pi iti pi sadda lopaḥ ha ittha daṭṭhabbo itaram pi

original: dvayanti sippiyasambukamacchagumbaṃ padavasena evaṃ vuttaṃ. Itarañca dvayanti sippiyasambukamacchagumbameva.

original: Carantanti vuttanti etthāpi tesaṃ ṭhānakiriyamupādāya “tiṭṭhantampī”ti pi-saddalopo,

analyzed: tathā hi vuttam kim vā imāya sahacariyāya yathā lābha ggahaṇam

analyzed: pana ittha daṭṭhabbam sakkhara kathalassa hi vasena sippi sambukassa maccha gumbassa

original: ca vasena tiṭṭhantampi carantampīti evaṃ yojanā kātabbā”ti. Alabbhamānassāpi atthassa
analyzed: ca vasena tiṭṭhantam pi carantam pi iti evam yojanā kātabbā ati alabbhamānassa api atthassa

analyzed: saha yogī vasena desanā mattam pati sahacaraṇa nayo sādhāraṇataḥ desitassa api atthassa

original: sambhavavasena vivecanaṃ pati yathālābhanayoti ubhayathāpi yujjati.

analyzed: evam pa ittha vadanti aṭṭhakathā ayam itarāni caranti pi

original: tiṭṭhantipī”ti iminā yathālābhanayo dassito yathāsambhavaṃ atthassa vivecitattā,

original: “yathā panā”tiādinā pana sahacaraṇanayo alabbhamānassāpi atthassa sahayogīvasena

original: udakarahadassa tīre. Udakarahado ca nāma katthaci samuddopi vuccati “rahadopi tattha
analyzed: udakarahadassa tīre udakarahado ca nāma katthaci samuddaḥ api vuccati rahadaḥ api tattha

original: gambhīro, samuddo saritodako”tiādīsu. Katthaci jalāsayopi “rahadopi tattha dharaṇī
analyzed: gambhīraḥ samuddaḥ saritā udakā iti ādīsu katthaci jalāsayaḥ api tattha dharaṇī

original: nāma, yato meghā pavassanti, vassā yato patāyantī”tiādīsu, idhāpi jalāsayoyeva. So
analyzed: nāma yatas meghā pavassanti vassāḥ yatas patāyanti itiādīsu idha api saḥ

original: hi udakavasena raho cakkhurahādikaṃ dadātīti udakarahado o-kārassa a-kāraṃ katvā.
analyzed: hi udaka vasena rahaḥ cakkhu raha ādikam dadāti iti udaka rahadaḥ okārassa akāram katvā

original: Saddavidū pana “udakaṃ haratīti udakarahado niruttinayenā”ti vadanti.
analyzed: pana udakam harati iti udaka rahadaḥ nirutti nayena ati vadanti

original: “Ettāvatā”tiādinā catutthajjhānāntaraṃ dassitavipassanāñāṇato paṭṭhāya yathāvuttatthassa
analyzed: ettāvatā iti ādinā catuttha jhāna antaram dassita vipassanā ñāṇataḥ paṭṭhāya

original: sampiṇḍanaṃ. Tattha ettāvatāti “puna caparaṃ mahārāja bhikkhu evaṃ samāhite citte…pe…
analyzed: sampiṇḍanam tattha ettāvatā iti puna ca aparam mahā rāja bhikkhu evam samāhite citta īpe

original: Vipassanāñāṇanti ñāṇadassananāmena dassitaṃ vipassanāñāṇaṃ, tassa ca visuṃ gaṇanadassanena
analyzed: vipassanā ñāṇan ti ñāṇa dassana nāmena dassitam vipassanā ñāṇam tassa ca visum gaṇana dassanena

analyzed: heṭṭhā catuttha jjhāna anantaram vattabba tā kāraṇesu tīsu nayesu tatiya nayassa iva yuttatara bhāvaḥ api

original: dīpitoti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Manomayañāṇassa iddhividhasamavarodhitabhāve visuddhimagge vuttepi
analyzed: dīpitaḥ ti daṭṭhabbam manaḥ maya ñāṇassa iddhividha samavarodhita bhāve visuddhi magge vutte api

original: idha pāḷiyaṃ visuṃ desitattā visuṃ eva gahaṇaṃ, tathā desanā ca pāṭiyekkasandiṭṭhikasāmaññaphalatthāti
analyzed: idha pāḷiyam visum desita ttā visum eva gahaṇam tathā desanā ca pāṭiyekka sandiṭṭhika sāmañña phalatthā ati

original: daṭṭhabbaṃ. Anāgataṃsañāṇayathākammūpagañāṇadvayassa pāḷiyaṃ anāgatattā “dibbacakkhuvasena
analyzed: daṭṭhabbam anāgataṃsa ñāṇa yathā kammūpaga ñāṇa dvayassa pāḷiyam anāgata ttā dibba cakkhu vasena

original: nipphanna”nti vuttaṃ, tabbasena nipphannattā taggahaṇeneva gahitaṃ taṃ ñāṇadvayanti
analyzed: nipphannanti vuttam tad basena nipphanna ttā tad gahaṇena iva gahitam tam ñāṇa dvayan ti

original: vuttaṃ hoti. Dibbacakkhussa hi anāgataṃsañāṇaṃ, yathākammūpagañāṇañcāti dvepi ñāṇāni

analyzed: paribhaṇḍāni honti iti dibba cakkhu ñāṇanti cutūpapāta ñāṇa nāmena dassitam dibba cakkhu ñāṇam

original: Sabbesaṃ pana dasannaṃ ñāṇānaṃ ārammaṇavibhāgassa visuddhimagge anāgatattā tatthānāgatañāṇānaṃ

analyzed: paritta ārammaṇa ādi tika ttayena iva hi tassa ārammaṇa vibhāgaḥ na magga ārammaṇa tikena nimmita rūpa āyatana mattam eva ati

original: attanā nimmitaṃ rūpārammaṇameva, attanā vā nimmite manomaye kāye vijjamānaṃ rūpāyatanamevātipi

original: yujjati. Idañhi tassa ñāṇassa abhinimmiyamāne manomaye kāye rūpāyatanamevārabbha

original: vuttaṃ. Tañhi parittatikavasena appamāṇārammaṇaṃ, ajjhattikavasena bahiddhārammaṇaṃ,

original: atītatikavasena navattabbārammaṇañca hoti.

original: āha “arahattanikūṭenā”ti. Desanaṃ niṭṭhāpesīti titthakaramataharavibhāviniṃ nānāvidhakuhanalapanādimicchājīvaviddhaṃsiniṃ

original: tividhasīlālaṅkataparamasallekhapaṭipattiparidīpiniṃ jhānābhiññādiuttarimanussadhammavibhūsiniṃ

original: Ajātasattuupāsakattapaṭivedanākathāvaṇṇanā

original: sādaraṃ gāravaṃ sutvā, “cintetvā”ti ettha idaṃ pubbakālakiriyāvacanaṃ. Ime pañhe

analyzed: hoti tena āha dasabalassa guṇa anubhāvam a jānanto ti sāmañña jotanā hi visese avatiṭṭhati

analyzed: cintetvā āvikarontaḥ iti sambandhaḥ ullaṅghana samatthāya api ubbega pītiyā an ullaṅghanam pi

original: attho, na byāpitasarīroti sabbāya pītiyā abyāpitattā. Tanti attano pasādassa āvikaraṇaṃ,

original: upāsakattapavedanañca. Āraddhaṃ dhammasaṅgāhakehi.
analyzed: upāsaka ttapa vedanam ca āraddham dhamma saṅgāhakehi

original: Abhikkantāti atikkantā vigatā, vigatabhāvo ca khayo evāti āha “khaye dissatī”ti.
analyzed: abhikkantā ati atikkantā vigatā vigata bhāvaḥ ca khayaḥ eva ati āha khaye dissati iti

original: tādiso ca sundaro bhaddako nāmāti vuttaṃ “sundare”ti.
analyzed: tādiso ca sundaraḥ bhaddakaḥ nāma ati vuttam sundara iti

original: “Ko me”tiādi gāthā vimānavatthumhi. Tattha koti devanāgayakkhagandhabbādīsu katamo.
analyzed: kaḥ mā iti ādi gāthā vimāna vatthumhi tattha kaḥ ti deva nāga yakkha gandhabba ādīsu katamaḥ

original: Meti mama. Pādānīti pāde, liṅgavipariyāyoyaṃ. Iddhiyāti īdisāya deviddhiyā. Yasasāti
analyzed: mā iti mama pādāni iti pāde liṅga vipariyāyaḥ yam iddhiyā ati īdisāya deviddhiyā

original: īdisena parivārena, parijanena ca. Jalanti jalanto vijjotamāno. Abhikkantenāti ativiya
analyzed: īdisena parivārena parijanena ca jalanti jalantaḥ vijjotamānaḥ abhikkantena ati

original: kantena kamanīyena, abhirūpenāti vuttaṃ hoti. Vaṇṇenāti chavivaṇṇena sarīravaṇṇanibhāya.
analyzed: kantena kamanīyena abhirūpena ati vuttam hoti vaṇṇena ati chavi vaṇṇena sarīra vaṇṇa nibhāya

original: Sabbā obhāsayaṃ disāti sabbā dasapi disā obhāsayanto. Cando viya, sūriyo viya ca
analyzed: sabbā obhāsayam disā ati sabbāḥ dasa api disāḥ obhāsayanto candaḥ viya sūriyaḥ viya ca

original: ekobhāsaṃ ekālokaṃ karonto ko vandatīti sambandho.
analyzed: ekobhāsam ekālokam karontaḥ kaḥ vandati iti sambandhaḥ

original: Abhirūpeti atirekarūpe uḷāravaṇṇena sampannarūpe. Abbhānumodaneti abhianumodane abhippamoditabhāve.
analyzed: abhirūpā iti atireka rūpe uḷāra vaṇṇena sampanna rūpe abbha anumodanā iti abhianumodane abhippamodita bhāve

original: Kimatthiyaṃ “abbhānumodane”ti vacananti āha “tasmā”tiādi. Yuttaṃ tāva hotu abbhānumodane,
analyzed: kim atthiyam abbha anumodanā iti vacanan ti āha tasmā atiādi yuttam tāva hotu abbha anumodane

original: kasmā panāyaṃ dvikkhattuṃ vuttoti codanāya sodhanāmukhena āmeḍitavisayaṃ niddhāreti
analyzed: kasmā pana ayam dvi kkhattum vuttaḥ iti codanāya sodhanā mukhena āmeḍita visayam niddhāreti

original: “bhaye kodhe”tiādinā, iminā saddalakkhaṇena hetubhūtena evaṃ vutto, iminā ca iminā
analyzed: bhaye kodha iti ādinā iminā sadda lakkhaṇena hetu bhūtena evam vuttaḥ iminā ca iminā

original: ca visayenāti vuttaṃ hoti. “Sādhu sādhu bhante”ti āmeḍitavasena atthaṃ dassetvā tassa
analyzed: ca visayena ati vuttam hoti sādhu sādhu bhante ti āmeḍita vasena attham dassetvā tassa

original: visayaṃ niddhārento evamāhātipi sambandhaṃ vadanti. Tattha “coro coro, sappo sappo”tiādīsu
analyzed: visayam sambandham vadanti tattha coro coro sappo sappo ti ādīsu

original: bhaye āmeḍitaṃ, “vijjha vijjha, pahara paharā”tiādīsu kodhe, “sādhu sādhū”tiādīsu
analyzed: bhaye āma īḍitam vijjha vijjha pahara pahara ati ādīsu kodhe sādhu sādhu iti ādīsu

original: pasaṃsāyaṃ, “gaccha gaccha, lunāhi lunāhī”tiādīsu turite, “āgaccha āgacchā”tiādīsu
analyzed: gaccha gaccha lunāhi lunāhi itiādīsu turite āgaccha āgaccha atiādīsu

original: kotūhale, “buddho buddhoti cintento”tiādīsu acchare, “abhikkamathāyasmanto abhikkamathāyasmanto”tiādīsu
analyzed: kotūhale buddhaḥ buddhaḥ iti cintentaḥ itiādīsu acchare abhikkamatha ayasmantaḥ abhikkamatha ayasmanto itiādīsu

original: hāse, “kahaṃ ekaputtaka, kahaṃ ekaputtakā”tiādīsu soke, “aho sukhaṃ, aho sukha”ntiādīsu
analyzed: hāse kaham ekaputtaka kaham ekaputtaka ati ādīsu soke aho sukham aho sukham iti ādīsu

original: pasāde. Casaddo avuttasamuccayattho, tena garahā asammānādīnaṃ saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo.
analyzed: pasāde ca saddaḥ a vutta samuccaya tthaḥ tena garahā asammāna ādīnam saṅgahaḥ daṭṭhabbo

original: “Pāpo pāpo”tiādīsu hi garahāyaṃ, “abhirūpaka abhirūpakā”tiādīsu asammāne. Evametesu
analyzed: hi garahā ayam abhirūpaka abhirūpaka ati ādīsu asammāne evam etesu

original: navasu, aññesu ca visayesu āmeḍitavacanaṃ budho kareyya, yojeyyāti attho. Āmeḍanaṃ
analyzed: navasu aññesu ca visayesu āmeḍita vacanam budhaḥ kareyya yojeyya ati atthaḥ āmeḍanam

original: punappunamuccāraṇaṃ, āmeḍīyati vā punappunamuccārīyatīti āmeḍitaṃ, ekassevatthassa
analyzed: punar punar uccāraṇam āmeḍīyati vā punar punar uccārīyati iti āmeḍitam ekassa iva atthassa

original: dvattikkhattuṃ vacanaṃ. Meḍisaddo hi ummādane, āpubbo tu dvattikkhattumuccāraṇe vattati
analyzed: dvatti kkhattum vacanam meḍi saddaḥ hi ummādane āpubbaḥ tu dvatti kkhattum uccāraṇe vattati

original: yathā “etadeva yadā vākya-māmeḍayati vāsavo”ti.
analyzed: yathā etat eva yadā vākyam āmeḍayati vāsava iti

original: Evaṃ āmeḍitavasena dvikkhattuṃ vuttabhāvaṃ dassetvā idāni nayidaṃ āmeḍitavaseneva
analyzed: evam āmeḍita vasena dvi kkhattum vutta bhāvam dassetvā idāni na yidam āmeḍita vasena iva

original: dvikkhattuṃ vuttaṃ, atha kho paccekamatthadvayavasenapīti dassento “atha vā”tiādimāha.
analyzed: dvi kkhattum vuttam atha kho paccekam attha dvaya vasena api iti dassentaḥ atha vā iti ādim āha

original: Āmeḍitavasena atthaṃ dassetvā vicchāvasenāpi dassento evamāhātipi vadanti, tadayuttameva
analyzed: attham dassetvā vicchā vasena api dassentaḥ vadanti tat ayuttam eva

original: byāpetabbassa dvikkhattumavuttattā. Byāpetabbassa hi byāpakena guṇakiriyādabbena
analyzed: byāpetabbassa dvi kkhattum a vutta ttā byāpetabbassa hi byāpakena guṇa kiriyā ādabbena

original: byāpanicchāya dvattikkhattuṃ vacanaṃ vicchā yathā “gāmo gāmo ramaṇīyo”ti. Tattha
analyzed: byāpanicchāya dvattikkhattum vacanam vicchā yathā gāmaḥ gāmaḥ ramaṇīyaḥ iti tattha

original: abhikkantanti abhikkamanīyaṃ, tabbhāvo ca atiiṭṭhatāyāti vuttaṃ “atiiṭṭha”ntiādi,
analyzed: abhikkantanti abhikkamanīyam tad bhāvaḥ ca ati iṭṭha tāya ati vuttam ati iṭṭha ntiādi

original: padattayañcetaṃ pariyāyavacanaṃ. Etthāti dvīsu abhikkantasaddesu. “Abhikkanta”nti
analyzed: pariyāya vacanam ettha ati dvīsu abhikkanta saddesu abhikkantanti

original: vacanaṃ apekkhitvā napuṃsakaliṅgena vuttaṃ, taṃ pana bhagavato vacanaṃ dhammadesanāyevāti
analyzed: vacanam apekkhitvā napuṃsaka liṅgena vuttam tam pana bhagavataḥ vacanam dhamma desanāya iva āti

original: katvā “yadidaṃ bhagavato dhammadesanā”ti āha, yāyaṃ bhagavato dhammadesanā mayā sutā,
analyzed: katvā yat idam bhagavataḥ dhamma desanā ti āha yā ayam bhagavataḥ dhamma desanā mayā sutā

original: tadidaṃ bhagavato dhammadesanāsaṅkhātaṃ vacanaṃ abhikkantanti attho. Evaṃ paṭiniddesopi
analyzed: tat idam bhagavataḥ dhamma desanā saṅkhātam vacanam abhikkantanti atthaḥ evam paṭiniddesaḥ api

original: hi atthato abhedattā yutto eva “yattha ca dinnaṃ mahapphalamāhū”tiādīsu viya. “Abhikkanta”nti
analyzed: hi atthataḥ abheda ttā yuttaḥ eva yattha ca dinnam mahat phalam āhūti ādīsu viya

original: vuttassa vā atthamattadassanaṃ etaṃ, tasmā atthavasena liṅgavibhattivipariṇāmo veditabbo,
analyzed: vuttassa vā attha matta dassanam etam tasmai attha vasena liṅga vibhatti vipariṇāmaḥ veditabbo

original: kāriyavipariṇāmavasena cettha vibhattivipariṇāmatā. Vacananti hettha seso, abhikkantaṃ
analyzed: kāriya vipariṇāma vasena ca ittha vibhatti vipariṇāma tā vacanan ti ha ittha sesaḥ abhikkantam

original: bhagavato vacanaṃ, yāyaṃ bhagavato dhammadesanā mayā sutā, sā abhikkantaṃ abhikkantāti
analyzed: bhagavataḥ vacanam yā ayam bhagavataḥ dhamma desanā mayā sutā sā abhikkantam abhikkantā ati

original: attho. Dutiyapadepi “abhikkantanti pasādanaṃ apekkhitvā napuṃsakaliṅgena vutta”ntiādinā
analyzed: atthaḥ dutiya pade pi abhikkanta nti pasādanam apekkhitvā napuṃsaka liṅgena vutta nti ādinā

original: yathārahamesa nayo netabbo.
analyzed: yathāraham esa nayaḥ netabbo

original: “Bhagavato vacana”ntiādinā atthadvayasarūpaṃ dasseti. Tattha dosanāsanatoti rāgādikilesadosaviddhaṃsanato.
analyzed: bhagavataḥ vacana nti ādinā attha dvaya sarūpam dasseti tattha dosa nāsanato ti rāga ādi kilesa dosa viddhaṃsanato

original: Guṇādhigamanatoti sīlādiguṇānaṃ sampādanavasena adhigamāpanato. Ye guṇe desanā adhigameti,
analyzed: guṇa adhigamanataḥ iti sīla ādi guṇānam sampādana vasena adhigamāpanataḥ ye guṇe desanāḥ adhigama iti

original: tesu “guṇādhigamanato”ti vuttesuyeva guṇesu padhānabhūtā guṇā dassetabbāti te padhānabhūte
analyzed: tesu guṇa adhigamanataḥ ti vuttesu yeva guṇesu padhāna bhūtāḥ guṇāḥ dassetabbā ati te padhāna bhūte

original: guṇe tāva dassetuṃ “saddhājananato paññājananato”ti vuttaṃ. Saddhāpadhānā hi lokiyā
analyzed: guṇe tāva dassetum saddhā jananato paññā jananato ti vuttam saddhā apadhānāḥ hi lokiyā

original: guṇā, paññāpadhānā lokuttarāti, padhānaniddeso cesa desanāya adhigametabbehi sīlasamādhidukādīhipi
analyzed: guṇā paññā padhānā lokuttarā ti padhāna niddeso ca isa desanāya adhigametabbehi sīla samādhi duka ādīhi pi

original: yojanāsambhavato. Aññampi atthadvayaṃ dasseti “sātthato”tiādinā. Sīlādiatthasampattiyā
analyzed: yojanā sambhavataḥ aññam pi attha dvayam dasseti sātthato tiādinā sīla ādi attha sampattiyā

original: sātthato. Sabhāvaniruttisampattiyā sabyañjanato. Suviññeyyasaddapayogatāya uttānapadato.
analyzed: sa atthataḥ sa bhāva nirutti sampattiyā sa byañjanataḥ su viññeyya sadda payoga tāya uttāna padato

original: Saṇhasukhumabhāvena dubbiññeyyatthatāya gambhīratthato. Siniddhamudumadhurasaddapayogatāya
analyzed: saṇha sukhuma bhāvena dubbiññeyya tthatāya gambhīra tthataḥ siniddha mudu madhura sadda payoga tāya

original: kaṇṇasukhato. Vipulavisuddhapemanīyatthatāya hadayaṅgamato. Mānātimānavidhamanena
analyzed: kaṇṇa sukhataḥ vipula visuddha pemanīyatthatāya hadayaṅgamataḥ māna atimāna vidhamanena

original: anattukkaṃsanato. Thambhasārambhanimmaddanena aparavambhanato. Hitādhippāyappavattiyā
analyzed: anattukkaṃsanataḥ thambha sārambha nimmaddanena apara vambhanataḥ hita adhippāya ppavattiyā

original: paresaṃ rāgapariḷāhādivūpasamanena karuṇāsītalato. Kilesandhakāravidhamanena paññāvadātato.
analyzed: paresam rāga pariḷāha ādi vūpasamanena karuṇā sītalataḥ kilesa andhakāra vidhamanena paññā avadātato

original: Avadātaṃ, odātanti ca atthato ekaṃ. Karavīkarutamañjutāya āpātharamaṇīyato. Pubbāparāviruddhasuvisuddhatāya
analyzed: avadātam odātam ti ca atthataḥ ekam āpātha ramaṇīyataḥ pubba apara aviruddha su visuddha tāya

original: vimaddakkhamato. Āpātharamaṇīyatāya eva suyyamānasukhato. Vimaddakkhamatāya, hitajjhāsayappavattitāya
analyzed: vimadda khamataḥ āpātha ramaṇīya tāya eva suyyamāna sukhataḥ vimadda khama tāya hita jjhāsaya ppavatti tāya

original: ca vīmaṃsiyamānahitatoti evamettha attho veditabbo. Ādisaddena pana saṃsāracakkanivattanato,
analyzed: ca vīmaṃsiyamāna hitataḥ ti evam ettha atthaḥ veditabbaḥ ādi saddena pana saṃsāra cakka nivattanato

original: saddhammacakkappavattanato, micchāvādaviddhaṃsanato, sammāvādapatiṭṭhāpanato, akusalamūlasamuddharaṇato,
analyzed: saddhamma cakka ppavattanataḥ micchāvāda viddhaṃsanataḥ sammāvāda patiṭṭhāpanataḥ akusala mūla samuddharaṇataḥ

original: kusalamūlasaṃropanato, apāyadvāravidhānato, saggamaggadvāravivaraṇato, pariyuṭṭhānavūpasamanato,
analyzed: kusala mūla saṃropanataḥ apāya dvāra vidhānataḥ sagga magga dvāra vivaraṇataḥ pariyuṭṭhāna vūpasamanataḥ

original: anusayasamugghāṭanatoti evamādīnaṃ saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo.
analyzed: anusaya samugghāṭanato ti evamādīnam saṅgahaḥ daṭṭhabbo

original: Na kevalaṃ padadvayeneva, tato parampi catūhi upamāhīti pi-saddo sampiṇḍanattho.
analyzed: na kevalam pada dvayena iva tatas param pi catūhi upamāhi iti pi saddaḥ sampiṇḍana ttho

original: “Cakkhumanto rūpāni dakkhantī”ti idaṃ “telapajjotaṃ dhāreyyā”ti catutthaupamāya ākāramattadassanaṃ,
analyzed: cakkhumantaḥ rūpāni dakkhanti iti idam tela pajjotam dhāreyya ati catuttha aupamāyaḥ ākāra matta dassanam

original: na pana upamantaradassananti āha “catūhi upamāhī”ti. Adhomukhaṭṭhapitanti kenaci
analyzed: na pana upam antara dassananti āha catūhi upamāhi iti adhomukha ṭṭhapitanti kenaci

original: adhomukhaṃ ṭhapitaṃ. Heṭṭhāmukhajātanti sabhāveneva heṭṭhāmukhaṃ jātaṃ. Ugghāṭeyyāti
analyzed: adhomukham ṭhapitam heṭṭhā mukha jātam iti sabhāvena iva heṭṭhā mukham jātam ugghāṭeyya ati

original: vivaṭaṃ kareyya. “Hatthe gahetvā”ti samācikkhaṇadassanatthaṃ vuttaṃ, “puratthābhimukho,
analyzed: vivaṭam kareyya hatthe gahetvā iti samācikkhaṇa dassana tham vuttam purattha abhimukhaḥ

original: uttarābhimukho vā gacchā”tiādinā vacanamattaṃ avatvā “esa maggo, evaṃ gacchā”ti hatthe
analyzed: uttara abhimukhaḥ vā gacchāti ādinā vacanamattam avatvā esa maggo evam gacchāti hatthe

original: gahetvā nissandehaṃ dasseyyāti vuttaṃ hoti. Kāḷapakkhe cātuddasī kāḷapakkhacātuddasī.
analyzed: gahetvā nissandeham dasseyya iti vuttam hoti kāḷapakkhe cātuddasī kāḷapakkha cātuddasī

original: Nirantararukkhagahanena ekagghano vanasaṇḍo ghanavanasaṇḍo. Meghassa paṭalaṃ meghapaṭalaṃ,
analyzed: nirantara rukkha gahanena eka gghanaḥ vana saṇḍaḥ ghana vana saṇḍaḥ meghassa paṭalam megha paṭalam

original: meghacchannatāti vuttaṃ hoti. Nikkujjitaṃ ukkujjeyyāti kassacipi ādheyyassa anādhārabhūtaṃ
analyzed: megha channa tā iti vuttam hoti nikkujjitam ukkujjeyya ati kassaci pi ādheyyassa an ādhāra bhūtam

original: kiñci bhājanaṃ ādhārabhāvāpādanavasena ukkujjeyya upari mukhaṃ ṭhapeyya. Heṭṭhāmukhajātatāya
analyzed: kiñci bhājanam ādhāra bhāva āpādana vasena ukkujjeyya upari mukham ṭhapeyya heṭṭhā mukha jāta tāya

analyzed: vimukham adhomukha ṭṭhapita tāya asat dhamme evam pada dvayam nikkujjita padassa

original: yathādassitena atthadvayena yathārahaṃ yojetabbaṃ, na yathāsaṅkhyaṃ. Attano sabhāveneva
analyzed: yathādassitena attha dvayena yathāraham yojetabbam na yathāsaṅkhyam sabhāvena iva

original: hi esa rājā saddhammavimukho, pāpamittena pana devadattena pitughātādīsu uyyojitattā

original: asaddhamme patitoti. Vuṭṭhāpentena bhagavatāti sambandho.
analyzed: asat dhamme patito ti vuṭṭhāpentena bhagavatā iti sambandho

original: “Kassapassa bhagavato”tiādinā tadā raññā avuttassāpi atthāpattimattadassanaṃ. Kāmañca
analyzed: kassapassa bhagavato tiādinā tadā raññā a vuttassa api attha āpattimat ta dassanam kāmañca

original: kāmacchandādayopi paṭicchādakā nīvaraṇabhāvato, micchādiṭṭhi pana savisesaṃ paṭicchādikā
analyzed: kāmacchanda ādayaḥ api paṭicchādakāḥ nīvaraṇa bhāvataḥ micchādiṭṭhi pana sa visesam paṭicchādikā

original: satte micchābhinivesavasenāti āha “micchādiṭṭhigahanapaṭicchanna”nti. Tenāha bhagavā
analyzed: satte micchā abhinivesa vasena ati āha micchādiṭṭhi gahana paṭicchannan ti tena āha bhagavā

original: “micchādiṭṭhiparamāhaṃ bhikkhave vajjaṃ vadāmī”ti, [a. ni. 1.310 (atthato samānaṃ)]
analyzed: micchādiṭṭhi paramā aham bhikkhave vajjam vadāmi iti a ni atthataḥ samānam

original: micchādiṭṭhisaṅkhātagumbapaṭicchannanti attho. “Micchādiṭṭhigahanapaṭicchannaṃ sāsanaṃ
analyzed: micchādiṭṭhi saṅkhāta gumba paṭicchannanti atthaḥ micchādiṭṭhi gahana paṭicchannam sāsanam

original: vivarantenā”ti vadanto sabbabuddhānaṃ ekāva anusandhi, ekaṃva sāsananti katvā kassapassa
analyzed: vivarantena ati vadantaḥ sabba buddhānam ekā ava anusandhi ekam iva sāsananti katvā kassapassa

original: bhagavato sāsanampi iminā saddhiṃ ekasāsanaṃ karotīti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Aṅguttaraṭṭhakathādīsupi
analyzed: bhagavato sāsanam pi iminā saddhim eka sāsanam karoti iti daṭṭhabbam aṅguttara ṭṭhakathā ādīsu pi

original: hi tathā ceva vuttaṃ, evañca katvā micchādiṭṭhigahanapaṭicchannassa sāsanassa vivaraṇavacanaṃ upapannaṃ hotīti.
analyzed: hi tathā ca iva vuttam evam ca katvā micchādiṭṭhi gahana paṭicchannassa sāsanassa vivaraṇa vacanam upapannam hoti iti

original: Sabbo akusaladhammasaṅkhāto apāyagāmimaggo kummaggo kucchito maggoti katvā. Sammādiṭṭhiādīnaṃ
analyzed: sabbaḥ akusala dhamma saṅkhātaḥ apāya gāmi maggo kummaggaḥ kucchitaḥ maggo ti katvā sammādiṭṭhi ādīnam

original: ujupaṭipakkhatāya micchādiṭṭhiādayo aṭṭha micchattadhammā micchāmaggo mokkhamaggato
analyzed: uju paṭipakkha tāya micchādiṭṭhi ādayaḥ aṭṭha micchatta dhammāḥ micchāmaggaḥ mokkha maggato

original: micchā vitatho maggoti katvā. Teneva hi tadubhayassa paṭipakkhataṃ sandhāya “saggamokkhamaggaṃ
analyzed: micchā vitathaḥ maggo ti katvā tena iva hi tad ubhayassa paṭipakkha tam sandhāya sagga mokkha maggam

original: āvikarontenā”ti vuttaṃ. Sabbo hi kusaladhammo saggamaggo. Sammādiṭṭhiādayo aṭṭha

original: vāti anantarassa gahaṇaṃ. Kā sampattīti tadubhayesameva sammāpaṭipattipucchā, kā

original: nivasanamupādāya janapadassāyaṃ samaññāti dassanatthaṃ. “Tesaṃ nivāso”ti iminā “kosalānaṃ
analyzed: nivasanam upādāya janapadassa ayam samaññāti dassana attham tesam nivāso ti iminā kosalānam

original: nivāsā kosalā”ti taddhitaṃ dasseti. “Ekopi janapado”ti iminā pana saddatoyevetaṃ
analyzed: nivāsā kosalā ti taddhitam dasseti ekaḥ api janapado ti iminā pana

original: puthuvacanaṃ, atthato panesa eko evāti vibhāveti. Api-saddo cettha anuggahe, tena
analyzed: puthuvacanam atthataḥ pana esa ekaḥ evā ti vibhāveti api saddo ca ittha anuggahe tena

original: kāmaṃ ekoyevesa janapado, tathāpi iminā kāraṇena puthuvacanamupapannanti anuggaṇhāti.
analyzed: kāmam tathā api iminā kāraṇena puthuvacanam upapannanti anuggaṇhāti

original: Yadi ekova janapado, kathaṃ tattha bahuvacananti āha “ruḷhisaddenā”tiādi, ruḷhisaddattā
analyzed: yadi ekaḥ iva janapadaḥ katham tattha bahuvacananti āha ruḷhi saddena atiādi ruḷhi saddattā

original: bahuvacanamupapannanti vuttaṃ hoti. Nissitesu payuttassa puthuvacanassa, puthubhāvassa
analyzed: bahuvacanam upapannam ti vuttam hoti nissitesu payuttassa puthuvacanassa puthu bhāvassa

original: vā nissaye abhiniropanā idha ruḷhi, tena vuttaṃ ācariyena idha ceva aññattha ca majjhimāgamaṭīkādīsu
analyzed: vā nissaye abhiniropanā idha tena vuttam ācariyena idha ca iva aññattha ca majjhima āgama ṭīkā ādīsu

original: “akkharacintakā hi īdisesu ṭhānesu yutte viya īdisaliṅgavacanāni icchanti, ayamettha
analyzed: akkhara cintakāḥ hi īdisesu ṭhānesu yutte viya īdisa liṅga vacanāni icchanti ayam ettha

original: ruḷhi yathā ‘aññatthāpi kurūsu viharati, aṅgesu viharatī’ti cā”ti. Keci pana kosalanāmābhiniropanamicchanti,
analyzed: ruḷhi yathā aññattha api kurūsu viharati aṅgesu viharati iti ca ati keci pana kosala nāma abhiniropanam icchanti

original: ayuttametaṃ puthuvacanassa appayujjitabbattā. Nāmābhiniropanāya hi ekavacanampi bhavati
analyzed: ayuttam etam puthuvacanassa nāma abhiniropanāya hi ekavacanam pi bhavati

original: yathā “sīho gāyatī”ti. Tabbisesitepi janapadasadde jātisaddattā ekavacanameva. Tenāha
analyzed: yathā sīhaḥ gāyati iti tad visesite pi janapada sadde jāti sadda ttā ekavacanam eva tena āha

original: “tasmiṃ kosalesu janapade”ti, kosalanāmake tasmiṃ janapadeti attho. Abhūtato hi vohāramattaṃ
analyzed: tasmin kosalesu janapada iti kosala nāmake tasmin janapada iti atthaḥ a bhūtatas hi vohāra mattam

original: ruḷhi, bhūtatoyeva attho vinicchinitabbo. Yathā hi –
analyzed: ruḍhi bhūta toyā iva atthaḥ vinicchinitabbaḥ yathā hi

original: “Santi puttā videhānaṃ, dīghāvu raṭṭhavaḍḍhano;
analyzed: santi puttāḥ videhānam dīghāvu raṭṭhavaḍḍhano

original: Te rajjaṃ kārayissanti, mithilāyaṃ pajāpatī”ti. ādīsu –
analyzed: te rajjam kārayissanti mithilāyam pajāpati iti ādīsu

original: Taṃputtasaṅkhātassa ekatthassa ruḷhivasena “puttā”ti bahuvacanapayogo, tathā idhāpi
analyzed: taṃputta saṅkhātassa ekatthassa ruḷhi vasena putta ati bahuvacana payogaḥ tathā idha api

original: tannivāsasaṅkhātassa ekatthassa ruḷhivasena “kosalesū”ti bahuvacanapayogo hoti. Yathā
analyzed: tad nivāsa saṅkhātassa ekatthassa ruḷhi vasena kosalesu iti bahuvacana payogaḥ hoti yathā

original: ca “pāṇaṃ na haññe, na ca’dinnamādiye”tiādīsu jātivasena bahvatthānamekavacanapayogo,
analyzed: ca pāṇam na haññe na jāti vasena bahu atthānam ekavacana payogaḥ

original: tathā idhāpi jātivasena avayavappabhedena bahvatthassa “janapade”ti ekavacanapayogo
analyzed: tathā idha api jāti vasena avayava ppabhedena bahu atthassa janapada iti ekavacana payogaḥ

original: hoti. Vuttañca ācariyena majjhimāgamaṭīkāyaṃ “tabbisesanepi janapadasadde jātisadde
analyzed: hoti vuttam ca ācariyena majjhima āgama ṭīkāyam tad visesane pi janapada sadde jāti sadde

original: ekavacanameva. Tenāha ‘tasmiṃ aṅgesu janapade’ti”.
analyzed: eka vacanam eva tena āha tasmin aṅgesu janapada iti

original: Evaṃ ruḷhivasena bahumhi viya vattabbe bahuvacanaṃ dassetvā idāni bahvatthavasena
analyzed: evam ruḷhi vasena bahumhi viya vattabbe bahuvacanam dassetvā idāni bahu attha vasena

original: bahumpi eva vattabbe bahuvacanaṃ dassento “porāṇā panāhū”tiādimāha. Pana-saddo cettha
analyzed: eva vattabbe bahuvacanam dassentaḥ porāṇā pana āhū ti ādim āha pana saddo ca ittha

original: visesatthajotano, tena puthuatthavisayatāya evetaṃ puthuvacanaṃ, na ruḷhivasenāti
analyzed: tena puthu attha visaya tāyai puthuvacanam na ruḷhi vasena ati

original: vakkhamānaṃ visesaṃ joteti. So hi padeso tiyojanasataparimāṇatāya bahuppabhedoti,
analyzed: vakkhamānam visesam joteti so hi padesaḥ ti yojana sata parimāṇa tāya bahu ppabhedaḥ ti

original: imasmiṃ pana naye tesu kosalesu janapadesūti attho veditabbo. Mahāpanādanti mahāpanādajātaka
analyzed: imasmin pana naye tesu kosalesu janapadesu iti atthaḥ veditabbo mahāpanādam ti mahāpanāda jātaka

original: surucijātakesu āgataṃ surucino nāma videharañño puttaṃ mahāpanādanāmakaṃ rājakumāraṃ.
analyzed: suruci jātakesu āgatam surucinaḥ nāma videha rañño puttam mahāpanāda nāmakam rāja kumāram

original: Nānānāṭakānīti bhaṇḍukaṇḍapaṇḍukaṇḍapamukhāni chasatasahassāni nānāvidhanāṭakāni,
analyzed: nānā nāṭakāni iti cha sata sahassāni nānāvidha nāṭakāni

original: katthaci pana ādisaddopi diṭṭho, so jātakaṭṭhakathāyaṃ na dissati, yadi ca dissati,
analyzed: katthaci pana ādi saddaḥ api diṭṭhaḥ saḥ jātaka ṭṭhakathā ayam na dissati yadi ca dissati

original: tena naṭalaṅghakādīnaṃ saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. Sitamattampīti mihitamattampi. Tassa kira
analyzed: tena naṭa laṅghaka ādīnam saṅgahaḥ daṭṭhabbo sita mattam pi iti mihita mattam pi tassa kira

original: dibbanāṭakānaṃ anantarabhaveyeva diṭṭhattā manussanāṭakānaṃ naccaṃ amanuññaṃ ahosi.
analyzed: dibba nāṭakānam diṭṭha ttā manussa nāṭakānam naccam amanuññam ahosi

original: Naṅgalānipi chaḍḍetvāti kasikammappahānavasena naṅgalāni pahāya, nidassanamattañcetaṃ.
analyzed: naṅgalāni pi chaḍḍetvā iti kasi kamma pahāna vasena naṅgalāni pahāya

original: Na hi kevalaṃ kassakā eva, atha kho aññepi ubhayaraṭṭhavāsino manussā attano attano
analyzed: na hi kevalam kassakāḥ eva atha kho aññe pi ubhaya raṭṭha vāsinaḥ manussāḥ attanaḥ attanaḥ

original: kiccaṃ pahāya tasmiṃ maṅgalaṭṭhāne sannipatiṃsu. Tadā kira mahāpanādakumārassa pāsādamaṅgalaṃ,
analyzed: kiccam pahāya tasmin maṅgala ṭṭhāne sannipatiṃsu tadā kira mahāpanāda kumārassa pāsāda maṅgalam

original: chattamaṅgalaṃ, āvāhamaṅgalanti tīṇi maṅgalāni ekato akaṃsu, kāsivideharaṭṭhavāsinopi
analyzed: chatta maṅgalam āvāha maṅgalanti tīṇi maṅgalāni ekatas kāsi videha raṭṭha vāsinaḥ pi

original: tattha sannipatitvā atirekasattavassāni chaṇamanubhaviṃsūti, adhunā pana “naṅgalādīnī”ti
analyzed: tattha sannipatitvā atireka satta vassāni adhunā pana naṅgala ādīni iti

original: pāṭho dissati, so na porāṇapāṭho ṭīkāyamanuddhaṭattā.
analyzed: pāṭhaḥ dissati saḥ na porāṇa pāṭhaḥ ṭīkā āyam anuddhaṭa ttā

original: Mahājanakāye sannipatiteti keci “pahaṃsanavidhiṃ dassetvā rājakumāraṃ hāsāpessāmā”ti,
analyzed: mahā jana kāye sannipatitā iti keci pahaṃsana vidhim dassetvā rāja kumāram hāsāpessāma ati

original: keci “taṃ kīḷanaṃ passissāmā”ti evaṃ mahājanasamūhe sannipatite. Atulambābhiruhanadārucitakapavesanādi

original: nāma dasseti, ekova hattho, eko pādo, ekaṃ akkhi, ekā dāṭhā naccati calati, upaḍḍhaṃ
analyzed: nāma dasseti ekaḥ iva hatthaḥ ekaḥ pādaḥ ekam akkhi ekā dāṭhā naccati calati upaḍḍham

original: phandati, sesaṃ niccalamahosi, taṃ disvā mahāpanādo thokaṃ hasitamakāsi, imamatthaṃ
analyzed: phandati sesam niccalam ahosi tam disvā mahā panādaḥ thokam hasitam akāsi imam attham

original: sandhāya “so dibbanāṭakaṃ dassetvā hasāpesī”ti vuttaṃ. Suhajjā nāma vissāsikā “suṭṭhu
analyzed: sandhāya saḥ dibba nāṭakam dassetvā hasāpesi iti vuttam suhajjā nāma vissāsikā suṭṭhu

original: hadayametesa”nti katvā. Ādisaddena ñātakaparijanādīnaṃ saṅgaho. Tasmāti tathā vacanato.
analyzed: katvā ādi saddena ñātaka parijana ādīnam saṅgahaḥ tasmā iti tathā vacanato

original: Taṃ kusalanti vacanaṃ upādāyāti ettha “kacci kusalaṃ? Āma kusala”nti vacanapaṭivacanavasena
analyzed: tam kusalanti vacanam upādāya ati ettha kacci kusalam vacana paṭivacana vasena

original: pavattakusalavāditāya te manussā ādito “kusalā”ti samaññaṃ labhiṃsu, tesaṃ kusalānaṃ
analyzed: pavatta kusala vāditāya te manussāḥ āditas kusalā ati samaññam labhiṃsu tesam kusalānam

original: issarāti rājakumārā kosalā nāma jātā, tesaṃ nivāsaṭṭhānatāya pana padeso kosalāti
analyzed: rāja kumārā kosalāḥ nāma jātā tesam nivāsa ṭṭhāna tāya pana padeso

original: pubbe vuttanayameva. Tenāha “so padeso kosalāti vuccatī”ti. Evaṃ majjhimāgamaṭīkāyaṃ
analyzed: pubbe vutta nayam eva tena āha so padeso kosalā ati vuccati iti evam majjhima āgama ṭīkāyam

original: ācariyeneva vuttaṃ. Tatrāyamadhippāyo siyā – “so padeso kosalāti vuccatī”ti saññīsaññā
analyzed: ācariyena iva vuttam tatra ayam adhippāyaḥ siyā so padeso kosalā ati vuccati iti saññīsaññā

original: yathākkamaṃ ekavacanabahuvacanavasena vuttattā purimanaye viya idhāpi ruḷhivaseneva
analyzed: yathākkamam ekavacana bahuvacana vasena vutta ttā purima naye idha api ruḷhi vasena iva

original: bahuvacanaṃ hoti. Rājakumārānaṃ nāmalābhahetumattañhettha visesoti. Idha pana ācariyena
analyzed: bahuvacanam idha pana ācariyena

original: evaṃ vuttaṃ so padesoti padesasāmaññato vuttaṃ, vacanavipallāsena vā, te padesāti
analyzed: evam vuttam so padeso ti padesa sāmaññato vuttam vacana vipallāsena vā te padesā ti

original: attho. Kosalāti vuccati kusalā eva kosalāti katvā”ti tatrāyamadhippāyo siyā – so
analyzed: attho kosalā ati vuccati kusalāḥ eva kosalā ati katvā ati tatra ayam adhippāyaḥ siyā so

original: padesoti jātisaddavasena, vacanavipallāsena vā vuttattā puthuatthavisayatāya eva
analyzed: padeso ti jāti sadda vasena vacana vipallāsena vā vutta ttā puthuattha visaya tāya eva

original: bahuvacanaṃ hoti. Padesassa nāmalābhahetu hettha visesoti. “Kusala”nti hi vacanamupādāya
analyzed: bahuvacanam hoti padesassa nāma lābha hetu ha ittha visesaḥ ti kusalam ti hi vacanam upādāya

analyzed: ruḷhi nāma vasena vutta nayena kosalāḥ yathā apica vacana paṭivacana vasena

original: “kacci nu bhoto kusalaṃ, kacci bhoto anāmaya”ntiādīsu viya, kacci tumhākaṃ ārogyaṃ
analyzed: kacci nu bhoto kusalam kacci bhoto anāmayanti ādīsu kacci tumhākam ārogyam

original: hotīti attho, chekaṃ vā “kusalā naccagītassa, sikkhitā cāturitthiyo”tiādīsu viya,
analyzed: hoti iti attho chekam vā kusalā nacca gītassa sikkhitā cāturitthiya uti ādīsu viya

original: kacci tesaṃ nāṭakānaṃ chekatā hotīti attho.
analyzed: kacci tesam nāṭakānam cheka tā hoti iti attho

original: Caraṇaṃ cārikā, caraṇaṃ vā cāro, so eva cārikā, tayidaṃ maggagamanameva idhādhippetaṃ,
analyzed: caraṇam cārikā caraṇam vā cāro eva cārikā tayā idam magga gamanam eva idha adhippetam

original: na cuṇṇikagamanamattanti dassetuṃ “addhānagamana”nti vuttaṃ, bhāvanapuṃsakañcetaṃ,

original: addhānagamanasaṅkhātāya cārikāya caramānoti vuttaṃ hoti, abhedepi vā bhedavohārena

original: karontoti attho. Sabbatthako hi karabhūdhātūnamatthoti. “Addhānamagga”ntipi katthaci
analyzed: karontoti attho sabbatthakaḥ hi kara bhū dhātūnam attho ti katthaci

original: pāṭho, so na sundaro. Na hi cārikāsaddo maggavācakoti. Idāni taṃ vibhāgena dassetvā
analyzed: pāṭhaḥ saḥ na sundaraḥ na hi cārikā saddo magga vācakaḥ ti idāni tam vibhāgena dassetvā

original: idhādhippetaṃ niyamento “cārikā ca nāmesā”tiādimāha. Sāvakānampi ruḷhivasena cārikāya
analyzed: idha adhippetam cārikā ca nāma isā ati ādim āha sāvakānam pi ruḷhi vasena cārikāya

original: sambhavato tato viseseti “bhagavato”ti iminā. Tathā hi majjhimāgamaṭṭhakathāyaṃ vuttaṃ
analyzed: sambhavataḥ tatas viseseti bhagavataḥ ti iminā tathā hi majjhima āgama aṭṭhakathāyam vuttam

analyzed: cārikam ettha kiñca api ayam cārikā nāma mahā jana saṅgahattham

original: labbhati, buddhe upādāya pana ruḷhisaddena sāvakānampi vuccati kilañjādīhi katabījanīpi
analyzed: labbhati buddhe upādāya pana ruḷhi saddena sāvakānam pi vuccati kilañja ādīhi

original: tālavaṇṭaṃ viyā”ti. Dūrepīti ettha pi-saddena, api-saddena vā nātidūrepīti sampiṇḍanaṃ
analyzed: tālavaṇṭam viyāti dūre pi iti ettha pi saddena api saddena vā na ati dūre pi iti sampiṇḍanam

original: tatthāpi cārikāsambhavato. Bodhaneyyapuggalanti catusaccapaṭivedhavasena bodhanārahapuggalaṃ.
analyzed: tattha api cārikā sambhavataḥ bodhaneyya puggalan ti catu sacca paṭivedha vasena bodhanā raha puggalam

original: Sahasā gamananti sīghagamanaṃ. “Mahākassapassa paccuggamanādīsū”ti vuttameva sarūpato
analyzed: sahasā gamananti sīgha gamanam mahākassapassa paccuggamana ādīsu iti vuttam eva sarūpataḥ

original: dasseti “bhagavā hī”tiādinā. Paccuggacchantoti paṭimukhaṃ gacchanto, paccuṭṭhahantoti
analyzed: dassa iti bhagavā hi itiādinā paccuggacchanto iti paṭimukham gacchanto paccuṭṭhahanto ti

original: attho. “Tathā”ti iminā “tiṃsayojana”nti padamanukaḍḍhati. Pakkusāti nāma gandhārarājā.
analyzed: tathā ti iminā padam anukaḍḍhati pakkusāti nāma gandhāra rājā

original: Mahākappino nāma kukkuṭavatīrājā. Dhaniyo nāma koraṇḍaseṭṭhiputto gopo.
analyzed: mahākappinaḥ nāma kukkuṭavatī rājā dhaniyaḥ nāma koraṇḍa seṭṭhi putto gopo

original: Evaṃ dhammagarutākittanamukhena mahākassapapaccuggamanādīni ekadesena dassetvā idāni
analyzed: evam mahākassapa paccuggamana ādīni ekadesena dassetvā idāni

original: vanavāsitissasāmaṇerassa vatthuṃ vitthāretvā cārikaṃ dassetuṃ “ekadivasa”ntiādi āraddhaṃ.
analyzed: vanavāsi tissa sāmaṇerassa vatthum vitthāretvā cārikam dassetum eka divasa nti ādi āraddham

original: Ko panesa tissasāmaṇero nāma? Sāvatthiyaṃ dhammasenāpatino upaṭṭhākakule jāto mahāpuñño
analyzed: kaḥ pana esa tissasāmaṇeraḥ nāma sāvatthiyam dhammasenāpatino upaṭṭhāka kule jātaḥ mahā puññaḥ

original: “piṇḍapātadāyakatisso, kambaladāyakatisso”ti ca pubbe laddhanāmo pacchā “vanavāsitisso”ti
analyzed: piṇḍapāta dāyaka tisso kambala dāyaka tisso ti ca pubbe laddha nāmo pacchā vanavāsi tisso ti

original: pākaṭo khīṇāsavasāmaṇero. Vitthāro dhammapade. Ākāsagāmīhi saddhiṃ ākāseneva gantukāmo
analyzed: pākaṭaḥ khīṇāsava sāmaṇero vitthāraḥ dhamma pade ākāsa gāmīhi saddhim ākāsena iva gantu kāmo

original: bhagavā “chaḷabhiññānaṃ ārocehī”ti avoca. Tassāti tissasāmaṇerassa. Tanti bhagavantaṃ
analyzed: bhagavā chaḷabhiññānam ārocehi iti avoca tassa ati tissa sāmaṇerassa tanti bhagavantam

original: saddhiṃ bhikkhusaṅghena cīvaraṃ pārupantaṃ. No thero no oramattako vatāti sambandho,
analyzed: saddhim bhikkhu saṅghena cīvaram pārupantam no theraḥ no oramattakaḥ vata ati sambandho

original: guṇena lāmakappamāṇiko no hotīti attho.
analyzed: guṇena lāmakappamāṇikaḥ no hoti iti attho

original: Attano pattāsaneti bhikkhūnaṃ āsanapariyante. Tesaṃ gāmikānaṃ dānapaṭisaṃyuttaṃ maṅgalaṃ
analyzed: attano pattāsane iti bhikkhūnam āsana pariyante tesam gāmikānam dāna paṭisaṃyuttam maṅgalam

original: vatvā. Kasmā pana sadevakassa lokassa maggadesakopi samāno bhagavā evamāhāti codanaṃ

original: sodhetuṃ “bhagavā kirā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Maggadesakoti nibbānamaggassa, sugatimaggassa vā desako.

original: tadeva dhīraṅgaṃ nāmāti āha “vīriyanti vuttaṃ hotī”ti. Rūpanti sarīraṃ. Tena vuttaṃ

original: “vīriyamayasarīrā viyā”ti. Vīriyameva vīriyamayaṃ yathā “dānamaya”nti, tasmā vīriyasaṅkhātasarīrā
analyzed: vīriya maya sarīrā viyāti vīriyam eva vīriya mayam yathā dānam ayanti tasmai vīriya saṅkhāta sarīrā

analyzed: cira ppabandha saṅkhātāya yāpanāya kacci yāpetum sakkuṇeyyam sīsa roga ādi ābādha abhāvena

original: kacci appābādhaṃ, dukkhajīvikābhāvena kacci appātaṅkaṃ, taṃtaṃkiccakaraṇe uṭṭhānasukhatāya
analyzed: kacci appa ābādham dukkha jīvikā bhāvena kacci appa ātaṅkam taṃtaṃ kicca karaṇe uṭṭhāna sukha tāya

original: kacci lahuṭṭhānaṃ, tadanurūpabalayogato kacci balaṃ, sukhavihāraphalasabbhāvena kacciphāsuvihāro
analyzed: kacci lahu ṭṭhānam tad anurūpa bala yogato kacci balam sukha vihāra phala sabbhāvena kacci phāsu vihāro

original: atthīti sabbattha kacci-saddaṃ yojetvā attho veditabbo. Balappattā pīti pītiyeva.
analyzed: atthi iti sabbattha kacci saddam yojetvā atthaḥ veditabbaḥ bala ppattā pīti pītiyā iva

original: Taruṇā pīti pāmojjaṃ. Sammodanaṃ janeti karotīti sammodanikaṃ, tadeva sammodaniyaṃ
analyzed: taruṇā pīti pāmojjam sammodanam janeti karoti iti sammodanikam tat eva sammodaniyam

original: ka-kārassa ya-kāraṃ katvā. Sammodetabbato sammodanīyanti imamatthaṃ dasseti “sammodituṃ
analyzed: kakārassa yakāram katvā sammodetabbataḥ sammodanīyanti imam attham dasseti sammoditum

original: yuttabhāvato”ti iminā. Evaṃ ācariyehi vuttaṃ. Sammodituṃ arahatīti sammodanikaṃ,
analyzed: yutta bhāvataḥ ti iminā evam ācariyehi vuttam sammoditum arahati iti sammodanikam

original: tadeva sammodaniyaṃ yathāvuttanayenāti imamatthampi dassetīti daṭṭhabbaṃ. “Sāretu”nti
analyzed: tat eva sammodaniyam yathā vutta nayena ati imam attham pi dasseti iti daṭṭhabbam sāretum ti

original: etassa “nirantaraṃ pavattetu”nti atthavacanaṃ. Saritabbabhāvatoti anussaritabbabhāvato.
analyzed: etassa nirantaram pavattetunti attha vacanam saritabba bhāvato ti anussaritabba bhāvato

original: “Sāretuṃ arahatī”ti atthe yathāpadaṃ dīghena “sāraṇīya”nti vuttaṃ. “Saritabba”nti
analyzed: sāretum arahati iti atthe yathāpadam dīghena sāraṇīyanti vuttam saritabbanti

original: atthe pana “saraṇīya”nti vattabbe dīghaṃ katvā “sāraṇīya”nti vuttanti veditabbaṃ.
analyzed: atthe pana saraṇīyanti vattabbe dīgham katvā sāraṇīyanti vuttan ti veditabbam

original: Evaṃ saddato atthaṃ dassetvā idāni atthamattato dassetuṃ “suyyamānasukhato”tiādi
analyzed: evam saddataḥ attham dassetvā idāni attha mattataḥ dassetum suyyamāna sukhatā itiādi

original: vuttaṃ. Tattha suyyamānasukhatoti āpāthamadhurattamāha, anussariyamānasukhatoti vimaddaramaṇīyattaṃ.
analyzed: vuttam tattha suyyamāna sukhato ti āpātha madhura ttam āha anussariyamāna sukhato ti vimadda ramaṇīya ttam

original: Byañjanaparisuddhatāyāti sabhāvaniruttibhāvena tassā kathāya vacanacāturiyaṃ, atthaparisuddhatāyāti
analyzed: byañjana parisuddha tāya ati sabhāva nirutti bhāvena tassā kathāya vacana cāturiyam attha parisuddha tāya ati

original: atthassa nirupakkilesattaṃ. Anekehi pariyāyehīti anekehi kāraṇehi.
analyzed: atthassa nirupakkilesa ttam anekehi pariyāyehi iti anekehi kāraṇehi

original: Apasādessāmīti maṅkuṃ karissāmi. Ubhosu khandhesu sāṭakaṃ āsajjetvā kaṇṭhe olambanaṃ
analyzed: apasādessāmi iti maṅkum karissāmi ubhosu khandhesu sāṭakam āsajjetvā kaṇṭhe olambanam

original: sandhāya “kaṇṭhe olambitvā”ti vuttaṃ. Dussakaṇṇaṃ gahetvāti nivatthasāṭakassa koṭiṃ
analyzed: sandhāya kaṇṭhe olambitvā iti vuttam dussa kaṇṇam gahetvā iti nivattha sāṭakassa koṭim

original: ekena hatthena gahetvā. Caṅkamitumāruhanaṃ sandhāya “caṅkamaṃ abhiruhitvā”ti āha.
analyzed: ekena hatthena gahetvā caṅkamitum āruhanam sandhāya caṅkamam abhiruhitvā iti āha

original: Dhātusamatāti rasādidhātūnaṃ samāvatthatā, arogatāti attho. Pāsādikatthanti pasādajananatthaṃ
analyzed: dhātu sama tā ati rasa ādi dhātūnam samāvattha tā aroga tā iti attho pāsādika ttham ti pasāda janana ttham

analyzed: gata gata ṭṭhānā iti iminā sambandhaḥ pāsādika ttā atipi pāṭhaḥ tassa atthaḥ aṅga paccaṅgānam

original: pasādāvahattāti, “uppannabahumānā”ti iminā sambandho. Uppaṇḍanakathanti avahasitabbatāyuttakathaṃ.
analyzed: pasāda āvahattā iti uppanna bahu mānā iti iminā sambandhaḥ uppaṇḍana katham ti avahasitabba tā yutta katham

original: “Anācārabhāvasāraṇīya”nti tassa visesanaṃ, anācārabhāvena sāraṇīyaṃ “anācāro vatāya”nti
analyzed: tassa visesanam anācāra bhāvena sāraṇīyam anācāraḥ

original: saritabbakanti attho.
analyzed: saritabbakam ti attho

original: 262. Kātuṃ dukkaramasakkuṇeyyaṃ kiccamayaṃ ārabhīti dassetuṃ “bhavaggaṃ gahetukāmo
analyzed: kātum dukkaram a sakkuṇeyyam kicca mayam ārabhi iti dassetum bhavaggam gahetu kāmaḥ

original: viyā”tiādi vuttaṃ. Asakkuṇeyyañhetaṃ sadevakenapi lokena, yadidaṃ bhagavato apasādanaṃ.
analyzed: viya iti ādi vuttam a sakkuṇeyyan ha etam sa devakena api lokena yat idam bhagavataḥ apasādanam

original: Tenāha “aṭṭhāne vāyamatī”ti. Handa tena saddhiṃ mantemīti evaṃ aṭṭhāne vāyamantopi
analyzed: tena āha aṭṭhāne vāyamati iti handa tena saddhim mantemi iti evam aṭṭhāne vāyamantaḥ api

original: ayaṃ bālo “mayi kiñci akathente mayā saddhiṃ uttari kathetumpi na visahatī”ti mānameva
analyzed: ayam bālaḥ mayi kiñci a kathente mayā saddhim uttari kathetum pi na visahati iti mānam eva

original: paggaṇhissati, kathente pana kathāpasaṅgenassa jātigotte vibhāvite mānaniggaho bhavissati,
analyzed: paggaṇhissati kathente pana kathā apasaṅgena assa jāti gotte vibhāvite māna niggahaḥ bhavissati

original: “handa tena saddhiṃ mantemī”ti bhagavā ambaṭṭhaṃ māṇavaṃ etadavocāti attho. Ācārasamācārasikkhāpanena
analyzed: handa tena saddhim mantemi iti bhagavā ambaṭṭham māṇavam etat avoca ati attho ācāra samācāra sikkhāpanena

original: ācariyā, tesaṃ pana ācariyānaṃ pakaṭṭhā ācariyāti pācariyā yathā “papitāmaho”ti imamatthaṃ
analyzed: ācariyā tesam pana ācariyānam pakaṭṭhā ācariyā ati pācariyā yathā imam attham

original: dassetuṃ “ācariyehi ca tesaṃ ācariyehi cā”ti vuttaṃ.
analyzed: dassetum ācariyehi ca tesam ācariyehi ca ati vuttam

original: Paṭhamaibbhavādavaṇṇanā
263. Kiñcāpi “sayāno vā”tiādivacanaṃ na vattabbaṃ, mānavasena pana yugaggāhaṃ karonto
analyzed: kiñca api sa yānaḥ vā ati ādi vacanam na vattabbam māna vasena pana yuga ggāham karontaḥ

original: vadatīti dassento “kāmaṃ tīsū”tiādimāha. Tattha tīsu iriyāpathesūti ṭhānagamananisajjāsu.
analyzed: vadati iti dassentaḥ kāmam tīsu itiādim āha tattha tīsu iriyāpathesu ti ṭhāna gamana nisajjāsu

original: Tesveva hi ācariyena saddhiṃ sallapitumarahati, na tu sayane garukaraṇīyānaṃ sayānānampi
analyzed: tesu eva hi ācariyena saddhim sallapitum arahati na tu sayane

original: sammukhā garukārehi sayanassa akattabbabhāvato. Kathāsallāpanti kathāvasena yugaggāhakaraṇatthaṃ
analyzed: sammukhāḥ garukārehi sayanassa a kattabba bhāvataḥ kathā sallāpanti kathā vasena yugaggāha karaṇa attham

original: sallapanaṃ. Sayānena hi ācariyena saddhiṃ sayānassa kathā nāma ācāro na hoti, tathāpetaṃ
analyzed: sallapanam sa yānena hi ācariyena saddhim sa yānassa kathā nāma ācāro na hoti tathāpetam

original: itarehi sadisaṃ katvā kathanaṃ idha kathāsallāpo.
analyzed: itarehi sadisam katvā kathanam idha kathā sallāpaḥ

original: Yaṃ panetaṃ “sayāno vā hi bho gotama brāhmaṇo sayānena brāhmaṇena saddhiṃ sallapitumarahatī”ti
analyzed: yam panetam sa yānaḥ vā hi bho gotama brāhmaṇaḥ sa yānena brāhmaṇena saddhim sat lapitum arahati iti

original: vuttassa sallāpassa anācārabhāvavibhāvanaṃ satthārā ambaṭṭhena saddhiṃ kathentena
analyzed: vuttassa sallāpassa anācāra bhāva vibhāvanam satthārā ambaṭṭhena saddhim kathentena

original: kataṃ, taṃ pāḷivasena saṅgītimanāruḷhampi agarahitāya ācariyaparamparāya yāvajjatanā

original: samābhatanti “ye ca kho te bho gotamā”tiādikāya uparipāḷiyā sambandhabhāvena dassento
analyzed: ye ca kho te bho gotama ati ādikāya upari pāḷiyā sambandha bhāvena dassento

original: “tato kirā”tiādimāha. Gorūpanti go nūna rūpakavasena vuttattā, rūpasaddassa ca tabbhāvavuttito.
analyzed: tatas kirāti ādim āha go rūpam ti go nūna rūpaka vasena vuttattā rūpa saddassa ca tad bhāva vuttitaḥ

original: Yadi ahīḷento bhaveyya, “muṇḍā samaṇā”ti vadeyya, hīḷento pana garahatthena ka-saddena
analyzed: yadi a hīḷentaḥ bhaveyya muṇḍā samaṇā ati vadeyya hīḷentaḥ pana gara hatthena kasaddena

original: padaṃ vaḍḍhetvā “muṇḍakā samaṇakā”ti vadatīti dassetuṃ “muṇḍe muṇḍā”tiādi vuttaṃ.
analyzed: padam vaḍḍhetvā muṇḍakā samaṇakā iti vadati iti dassetum muṇḍe muṇḍa atiādi vuttam

original: Ibbhāti gahapatikāti atthamattavacanaṃ, saddato pana ibhassa payogo ibho uttarapadalopena,
analyzed: ibbhā ati gahapatikā ati attha matta vacanam saddataḥ pana ibhassa payogaḥ ibhaḥ uttara pada lopena

original: taṃ ibhaṃ arahantīti ibbhā dvittaṃ katvā. Kiṃ vuttaṃ hoti – yathā sobhanaṃ gamanato
analyzed: tam ibham arahanti iti ibbhāḥ dvittam katvā kim vuttam hoti yathā sobhanam gamanataḥ

original: ibhasaṅkhāto hatthivāhanabhūto parassa vasena pavattati, na attano, evametepi brāhmaṇānaṃ
analyzed: ibha saṅkhātaḥ hatthi vāhana bhūto parassa vasena pavattati na attanaḥ evam ete pi brāhmaṇānam

original: sussūsakā suddā parassa vasena pavattanti, na attano, tasmā ibhasadisapayogatāya
analyzed: sussūsakā suddā parassa vasena pavattanti na tasmai ibha sadisa payoga tāya

original: ibbhāti. Te pana kuṭumbikatāya gharavāsino gharasāmikā hontīti atthamattaṃ dasseti
analyzed: te pana kuṭumbika tāya ghara vāsinaḥ ghara sāmikāḥ honti iti attha mattam dasseti

original: “gahapatikā”ti iminā.
analyzed: gahapatikā ati iminā

original: Kaṇhāti kaṇhajātikā. Dvijā eva hi suddhajātikā, na itareti tassādhippāyo. Tenāha
analyzed: kaṇhā iti kaṇha jātikāḥ dvijāḥ eva hi suddha jātikāḥ na itare iti tassa adhippāyaḥ tena āha

original: “kāḷakā”ti. Pitāmahabhāvena ñātibandhavattā bandhu. Tenāha “pitāmahoti voharantī”ti.
analyzed: pitāmaha bhāvena ñāti bandhavattā bandhu tena āha pitāmaha uti voharanti iti

original: Apaccāti puttā. Mukhato nikkhantāti brāhmaṇānaṃ pubbapurisā brahmuno mukhato nikkhantā,
analyzed: apaccā ati puttāḥ mukhataḥ nikkhantā ati brāhmaṇānam pubbapurisāḥ brahmunaḥ mukhataḥ nikkhantā

original: ayaṃ tesaṃ paṭhamuppattīti adhippāyo. Sesapadesupi eseva nayo. Ayaṃ panettha viseso
analyzed: ayam tesam paṭhama uppatti iti adhippāyaḥ sesa padesu pi esā iva nayaḥ ayam pana ittha viseso

original: – “ibbhā kaṇhā”ti vatvā “bandhupādāpaccā”ti vadanto kulavasena samaṇā vessakulapariyāpannā,
analyzed: ibbhā kaṇhā iti vatvā vadanto kula vasena samaṇāḥ vessa kula pariyāpannā

original: paṭhamuppattivasena pana brahmuno piṭṭhipādato nikkhantā, na pakativessā viya nābhitoti

original: catuvaṇṇapariyāpannasseva samaṇabhāvasambhavato. Aniyametvāti avisesetvā, anuddesikabhāvenāti attho.
analyzed: catu vaṇṇa pariyāpannassa iva samaṇa bhāva sambhavataḥ a niyametvā iti a visesetvā anuddesika bhāvena ati attho

original: Mānameva nissāya kathesīti mānamevāpassayaṃ katvā attānaṃ ukkaṃsento, pare ca vambhento
analyzed: mānam eva nissāya kathesi iti mānam eva apassayam katvā attānam ukkaṃsentaḥ pare ca vambhentaḥ

original: “muṇḍakā samaṇakā”tiādivacanaṃ kathesi. Jānāpessāmīti attano gottapamāṇaṃ yāthāvato
analyzed: muṇḍakā samaṇakā ati ādi vacanam kathesi jānāpessāmi iti attanaḥ gotta pamāṇam yāthāvataḥ

original: vibhāvanena viññāpessāmi. Atthoti hitaṃ, icchitavatthu vā, taṃ pana kattabbakiccamevāti
analyzed: vibhāvanena viññāpessāmi attho ti hitam icchita vatthu vā tam pana kattabba kiccam eva ati

original: vuttaṃ “āgantvā kattabbakiccasaṅkhāto attho”ti, so etassa atthīti atthikaṃ yathā
analyzed: vuttam āgantvā kattabba kicca saṅkhātaḥ atthaḥ ti saḥ etassa atthi iti atthikam yathā

original: “daṇḍiko”ti. Dutiyassapi puggalavācakassa tadassatthipaccayassa vijjamānattā paṭhamena
analyzed: daṇḍiko ti dutiyassa api puggala vācakassa tad assatthi paccayassa vijjamāna ttā paṭhamena

original: tadārammaṇikacittameva viññāyatīti āha “tassa māṇavassa citta”nti. Atthikamassa atthīti
analyzed: tad ārammaṇika cittam eva viññāyati iti āha tassa māṇavassa cittanti atthikam assa atthi iti

original: atthikavā yathā “guṇavā”ti.
analyzed: atthikavā yathā guṇavā ati

original: “Yāyeva kho panatthāyā”ti liṅgavipallāsavasena vuttanti dasseti “yeneva kho panatthenā”ti

original: iminā. Tenevāha “tameva atthanti idaṃ purisaliṅgavaseneva vutta”nti. Tattha hi sābhāvikaliṅgatādassanena
analyzed: iminā tena iva āha tam eva attham ti idam purisa liṅga vasena iva vuttan ti tattha hi sābhāvika liṅga tā dassanena

original: idha asābhāvikaliṅgatāsiddhīti. Ayaṃ panettha aṭṭhakathāto aparo nayo – yāya atthāyāti
analyzed: idha asābhāvika liṅga tā siddhi iti ayam pana ittha aṭṭhakathātaḥ aparaḥ nayaḥ yāya atthāya ati

original: pulliṅgavaseneva tadatthe sampadānavacanaṃ, yassa kattabbakiccasaṅkhātassa atthassa
analyzed: pulliṅga vasena iva tad atthe sampadāna vacanam yassa kattabba kicca saṅkhātassa atthassa

original: atthāyāti atthoti. Assāti ambaṭṭhassa dassetvāti sambandho. Aññesaṃ santikaṃ āgatānanti

original: garuṭṭhāniyānaṃ santikamupagatānaṃ sādhurūpānaṃ. Vattanti tesaṃ samāciṇṇaṃ. Pakaraṇatoyeva
analyzed: santikam upagatānam sādhu rūpānam vattanti tesam samāciṇṇam pakaraṇataḥ yā iva

original: “ācariyakule”ti attho viññāyati, “avusitavā”ti ca asikkhitabhāvoyeva vohāravasena
analyzed: ācariya kule ti attho viññāyati ca vohāra vasena

original: vutto yathā taṃ cīvaradānaṃ ticīvarena acchādesīti. Tenāha “ācariyakule avusitavā
analyzed: vuttaḥ yathā tam cīvara dānam ti cīvarena acchādesi iti tena āha ācariya kule a vusitavā

original: asikkhito”ti. Asikkhitattā eva appassuto, “vusitamānī”ti ca padāpekkhāya apariyositavacanattā
analyzed: asikkhitoti a sikkhita ttā eva appassutaḥ vusitamānī iti ca pada apekkhāya a pariyosita vacana ttā

original: samānoti pāṭhasesoti dasseti “appassutova samāno”ti iminā. Bāhusaccañhi nāma yāvadeva
analyzed: samānaḥ ti dasseti appassutaḥ uva samānaḥ ti iminā bāhusaccam hi nāma yāvat eva

original: viññāyatīti evampi atthāpattito kāraṇaṃ vibhāvento āha “kimaññatra avusitattā”ti.
analyzed: viññāyati iti evam pi attha āpattitaḥ kāraṇam vibhāventaḥ āha kim aññatra a vusita ttā ti

original: Imampi sambandhaṃ dīpeti “etassa hī”tiādinā. Yathārutato pana pharusavacanasamudācārena
analyzed: imam pi sambandham dīpeti etassa hi iti ādinā yathārutataḥ pana pharusa vacana samudācārena

original: anupasamakāraṇadassanametaṃ. Tatrāyaṃ yojanā – “kimaññatra avusitattā”ti idaṃ kāraṇaṃ
analyzed: anupasama kāraṇa dassanam etam tatra ayam yojanā kim aññatra a vusita ttā ati idam kāraṇam

original: etassa ambaṭṭhassa pharusavacanasamudācāre kāraṇanti. “Pharusavacanasamudācārenā”tipi

original: pāṭho, tathā samudācāravasena vuttaṃ kāraṇanti attho. Evampi yojenti – avusitattā

analyzed: a vusita bhāvam aññatra ṭhapetvā etassa evam pharusa vacana samudācāre kāraṇam kimaññam

original: atthīti. Purimayojanāvettha yuttatarā yathāpāṭhaṃ yojetabbato. “Aññatrā”ti nipātayogato
analyzed: atthi iti yuttatarā yathāpāṭham yojetabbataḥ aññatra ati nipāta yogataḥ
