analyzed: gaṇam bhūtā pattā ati gaṇībhūtā ati a bhūta tad bhāve hi akārassa īkāra ādesaḥ

original: īpaccayo vā. Rājarājaññādīnaṃ daṇḍadharo purisova tato tato khattiyānaṃ tāyanato
analyzed: īpat cayaḥ vā rāja rājañña ādīnam daṇḍadharo puriso iva tatas tatas khattiyānam

original: rakkhaṇato khattā niruttinayena. So hi yattha tehi pesito, tattha tesaṃ dosaṃ pariharanto
analyzed: rakkhaṇato khattā nirutti nayena so hi yattha tehi pesitaḥ tattha tesam dosam pariharantaḥ

original: yuttapattavasena pucchitamatthaṃ katheti. Tenāha “pucchitapañhe byākaraṇasamattho”ti.
analyzed: yutta patta vasena pucchitam attham kathā iti tena āha pucchita pañhe byākaraṇa samatthā iti

original: Kulāpadesādinā mahatī mattā pamāṇametassāti mahāmatto.
analyzed: kula apadesa ādinā mahatī mattā pamāṇam etassa ati mahāmatto

original: Soṇadaṇḍaguṇakathāvaṇṇanā
analyzed: soṇa daṇḍa guṇa kathā vaṇṇanā

original: 303. Ekassa rañño āṇāpavattiṭṭhānāni rajjāni nāma, visiṭṭhāni rajjāni virajjāni,
analyzed: ekassa raññaḥ āṇā pavatti ṭṭhānāni rajjāni nāma visiṭṭhāni rajjāni virajjāni

original: tāneva verajjāni, nānāvidhāni verajjāni tathā, tesu jātātiādinā tidhā taddhitanibbacanaṃ.
analyzed: tān eva verajjāni nānāvidhāni verajjāni tathā tesu jāta ati ādinā tidhā taddhita nibbacanam

original: Vicitrā hi taddhitavuttīti. Yaññānubhavanatthanti yassa kassaci yaññassa anubhavanatthaṃ.
analyzed: vicitrā hi taddhita vutti iti yañña anubhavana attham ti yassa kassaci yaññassa anubhavana attham

original: Teti nānāverajjakā brāhmaṇā. Tassāti soṇadaṇḍabrāhmaṇassa. Uttamabrāhmaṇoti abhijanasampattiyā,
analyzed: te iti nānā verajjakā brāhmaṇā tassa ati soṇadaṇḍa brāhmaṇassa uttama brāhmaṇaḥ iti abhijana sampattiyā

original: vittasampattiyā, vijjāsampattiyā ca uggatataro, uḷāro vā brāhmaṇo. Āvaṭṭanīmāyā vuttāva.
analyzed: vitta sampattiyā vijjā sampattiyā ca uggatataraḥ uḷāraḥ vā brāhmaṇaḥ āvaṭṭanī māyā

original: Lābhamaccherena nippīḷitatāya asannipāto bhavissati.
analyzed: lābha maccherena nippīḍita tāya asannipātaḥ bhavissati

original: Aṅgeti gameti attano phalaṃ ñāpeti, sayaṃ vā aṅgīyati gamīyati ñāyatīti aṅgaṃ, hetu.
analyzed: aṅgeti gameti phalam ñāpeti sayam vai aṅgīyati gamīyati ñāyati iti aṅgam hetu

original: Tenāha “kāraṇenā”ti. Lokadhammatānussaraṇena aparānipi kāraṇāni āhaṃsūti dassento “eva”ntiādimāha.
analyzed: tena āha kāraṇena ati loka dhamma tā anussaraṇena aparāni api kāraṇāni āhaṃsu iti dassentaḥ eva nti ādim āha

original: Dvīhi pakkhehīti mātupakkhena, pitupakkhena cāti dvīhi ñātipakkhehi. “Ubhato sujāto”ti
analyzed: dvīhi pakkhehi iti mātu pakkhena pitu pakkhena ca ati dvīhi ñāti pakkhehi ubhatas su jātaḥ ti

original: hi etthakeyeva vutte yehi kehici dvīhi bhāgehi sujātattaṃ vijāneyya, sujātasaddo
analyzed: hi etthakā iya iva vutte yehi kehici dvīhi bhāgehi sujāta ttam vijāneyya sujāta saddaḥ

original: ca “sujāto cārudassano”tiādīsu ārohasampattipariyāyopi hotīti jātivaseneva sujātattaṃ
analyzed: ca sujātaḥ cārudassanaḥ ti ādīsu āroha sampatti pariyāyaḥ api hoti iti jāti vasena iva sujātattam

original: vibhāvetuṃ “mātito ca pitito cā”ti vuttaṃ. Tenāha “bhoto mātā brāhmaṇī”tiādi. Evanti
analyzed: vibhāvetum mātito ca pitito ca ati vuttam tena āha bhoto mātā brāhmaṇī itiādi evam ti

original: vuttappakārena, mātupakkhato ca pitupakkhato ca paccekaṃ tividhena ñātiparivaṭṭenāti
analyzed: vutta ppakārena mātu pakkhataḥ ca pitu pakkhataḥ ca paccekam tividhena ñāti parivaṭṭena ati

original: vuttaṃ hoti. “Saṃsuddhagahaṇiko”ti imināpi “mātito ca pitito cā”ti vuttamevatthaṃ
analyzed: vuttam hoti saṃsuddha gahaṇiko ti iminā api mātitaḥ ca pititaḥ ca ati vuttam eva attham

original: samatthetīti āha “saṃsuddhā te mātugahaṇī”ti, saṃsuddhāva anaññapurisasādhāraṇāti
analyzed: samatthā iti iti āha saṃsuddhā te mātu gahaṇī iti anañña purisa sādhāraṇā ti

original: attho. Anorasaputtavasenāpi hi loke mātāpitusamaññā dissati, idha panassa orasaputtavaseneva
analyzed: attho anorasa putta vasena api hi loke mātā pitu samaññā dissati idha pana assa orasa putta vasena iva

original: icchitāti dassetuṃ “saṃsuddhagahaṇiko”ti vuttaṃ. Gabbhaṃ gaṇhāti dhāretīti gahaṇī,
analyzed: icchitā ti dassetum saṃsuddha gahaṇikā iti vuttam gabbham gaṇhāti dhāreti iti gahaṇī

original: tatiyāvaṭṭasaṅkhāto gabbhāsayasaññito mātukucchipadeso samavepākiniyāti samavipācaniyā.
analyzed: tatiya avaṭṭa saṅkhātaḥ gabbhāsaya saññitaḥ mātukucchi padeso samavepākiniyā ati samavipācaniyā

original: Etthāti mahāsudassanasutte. Yathābhuttamāhāraṃ vipācanavasena gaṇhāti na chaḍḍetīti
analyzed: ettha ati mahāsudassana sutte yathābhuttam āhāram vipācana vasena gaṇhāti na chaḍḍeti iti

original: gahaṇī, kammajatejodhātu, yā “udaraggī”ti loke paññāyati.
analyzed: gahaṇī kamma ja tejaḥ dhātu yā udaraggī iti loke paññāyati

original: Pitupitāti pituno pitā. Pitāmahoti āmaha-paccayena taddhitasiddhi. “Catuyuga”ntiādīsu
analyzed: pitu pitā ati pituno pitā pitāmahaḥ iti āmaha paccayena catu yuga nti ādīsu

original: viya taṃ tadatthe yujjitabbato kālaviseso yugaṃ nāma. Etaṃ yugasaddena āyuppamāṇavacanaṃ
analyzed: viya tam tad atthe yujjitabbataḥ kāla visesaḥ yugam nāma etam yuga saddena āyu ppamāṇa vacanam

original: abhilāpamattaṃ lokavohāravacanamattameva, adhippetatthato pana pitāmahoyeva pitāmahayugasaddena
analyzed: abhilāpa mattam loka vohāra vacana mattam eva adhippeta tthato pana pitāmaha yā iva pitāmaha yuga saddena

original: vutto tasseva padhānabhāvena adhippetattāti adhippāyo. Tato uddhanti pitāmahato upari.
analyzed: vuttaḥ tassa iva padhāna bhāvena adhippetattā ati adhippāyaḥ tatas uddhanti pitāmahataḥ upari

original: Tenāha “pubbapurisā”ti, tadavasesā pubbakā cha purisāti attho. Purisaggahaṇañcettha
analyzed: tena āha pubba purisā ti tad avasesā pubbakā cha purisā ti atthaḥ purisa ggahaṇam ca ittha

original: ukkaṭṭhaniddesena katanti daṭṭhabbaṃ. Evañhi “mātito”ti pāḷivacanaṃ samatthitaṃ hoti.
analyzed: ukkaṭṭha niddesena katanti daṭṭhabbam evam hi mātito ti pāḷivacanam samatthitam hoti

original: Tatrāyamaṭṭhakathāmuttakanayo – mātā ca pitā ca pitaro, pitūnaṃ pitaro pitāmahā,
analyzed: tatra ayam aṭṭhakathāmutta kanayaḥ mātā ca pitā ca pitaraḥ pitūnam pitaraḥ pitāmahā

original: tesaṃ yugo dvando pitāmahayugo, tasmā, yāva sattamā pitāmahayugā pitāmahadvandāti
analyzed: tesam yugaḥ dvandaḥ pitāmaha yugaḥ tasmai yāva sattamā pitāmaha yugā pitāmaha dvandā ati

original: attho veditabbo, evañca pitāmahaggahaṇeneva mātāmahopi gahito. Yugasaddo cettha ekaseso
analyzed: atthaḥ veditabbaḥ evam ca pitāmaha ggahaṇena iva mātāmahaḥ api gahitaḥ yuga saddo ca ittha ekasesaḥ

original: “yugo ca yugo ca yugo”ti, ato tattha tattha ñātiparivaṭṭe pitāmahadvandaṃ gahitaṃ hotīti.
analyzed: yugo ca yugo ca yugo ti ato tattha tattha ñāti parivaṭṭe pitāmaha dvandam gahitam hoti iti

original: “Yāva sattamā pitāmahayugā”ti idaṃ kākāpekkhanamiva ubhayattha sambandhagatanti āha
analyzed: yāva sattamā pitāmaha yugā ti idam kāka apekkhanam iva ubhayattha sambandha gatan ti āha

original: “eva”ntiādi. Yāva sattamo puriso, tāva akkhitto anupakuṭṭho jātivādenāti sambandho.
analyzed: evam tiādi yāva sattamaḥ puriso tāva akkhittaḥ anupakuṭṭhaḥ jāti vādena ati sambandhaḥ

original: Akkhittoti appattakhepo. Anavakkhittoti saddhathālipākādīsu na chaḍḍito. Na upakuṭṭhoti
analyzed: akkhittaḥ ti appatta khepaḥ anavakkhittaḥ ti saddhatha ālipāka ādīsu na chaḍḍitaḥ na upakuṭṭho ti

original: na upakkosito. “Jātivādenā”ti idaṃ hetumhi karaṇavacananti dassetuṃ “kena kāraṇenā”tiādi
analyzed: na upakkositaḥ jāti vādena ati idam hetumhi karaṇa vacananti dassetum kena kāraṇena atiādi

original: vuttaṃ. Itipīti imināpi kāraṇena. Ettha ca “ubhato…pe… yugā”ti etena brāhmaṇassa
analyzed: vuttam iti pi iti iminā api kāraṇena ettha ca etena brāhmaṇassa

original: yonidosābhāvo dassito saṃsuddhagahaṇikabhāvakittanato, “akkhitto”ti etena kiriyāparādhābhāvo.
analyzed: yoni dosa abhāvaḥ dassitaḥ saṃsuddha gahaṇika bhāva kittanataḥ akkhitto ti etena kiriyā aparādha abhāvaḥ

original: Kiriyāparādhena hi sattā khepaṃ pāpuṇanti. “Anupakuṭṭho”ti etena ayuttasaṃsaggābhāvo.
analyzed: kiriyā aparādhena hi sattā khepam pāpuṇanti etena ayutta saṃsagga abhāvaḥ

original: Ayuttasaṃsaggañhi paṭicca sattā akkosaṃ labhantīti.
analyzed: ayutta saṃsaggam hi paṭicca sattāḥ akkosam labhanti iti

original: Issaroti ādhipateyyasaṃvattaniyakammabalena īsanasīlo, sā panassa issaratā vibhavasampattipaccayā
analyzed: issaro ti ādhipateyya saṃvattaniya kamma balena īsana sīlo sā panassa issara tā vibhava sampatti paccayā

original: pākaṭā jātā, tasmā aḍḍhabhāvapariyāyena dassento “aḍḍhoti issaro”ti āha. Mahantaṃ
analyzed: pākaṭā jātā tasmai aḍḍha bhāva pariyāyena dassentaḥ aḍḍho ti issaro ti āha mahantam

original: dhanamassa bhūmigataṃ, vehāsagatañcāti mahaddhano. Tassāti tassa tassa guṇassa, ayameva
analyzed: dhanam assa bhūmi gatam vehāsa gatam ca ati mahat dhanaḥ tassa ati tassa tassa guṇassa ayam eva

original: ca pāṭho adhunā dissati. Aguṇaṃyeva dassemāti anvayato tassa guṇaṃ vatvā byatirekato
analyzed: ca pāṭhaḥ adhunā dissati aguṇam yā iva dassema ati anvayataḥ tassa guṇam vatvā byatirekato

original: bhagavato anupasaṅkamanakāraṇaṃ aguṇameva dassema.
analyzed: bhagavataḥ an upasaṅkamana kāraṇam aguṇam eva dassema

original: Adhikarūpoti visiṭṭharūpo uttamasarīro. Dassanaṃ arahatīti dassanīyoti āha “dassanayoggo”ti.
analyzed: adhika rūpo ti visiṭṭha rūpo uttama sarīro dassanam arahati iti dassanīyaḥ ti āha dassana yoggaḥ ti

original: Pasādaṃ āvahatīti pāsādiko. Tenāha “pasādajananato”ti. Pokkharasaddo idha sundaratthe,
analyzed: pasādam āvahati iti pāsādiko tena āha pasāda jananataḥ ti pokkhara saddaḥ idha sundara tthe

original: sarīratthe ca niruḷho. Vaṇṇassāti vaṇṇadhātuyā. Pakāsaniyena parisuddhanimittena
analyzed: sarīra atthe ca niruḷhaḥ vaṇṇassa ati vaṇṇa dhātuyā pakāsaniyena parisuddha nimittena

original: vaṇṇasaddassa vaṇṇadhātuyaṃ pavattanato tannimittameva vaṇṇatā, sā ca vaṇṇanissitāti
analyzed: vaṇṇa saddassa vaṇṇa dhātuyam pavattanataḥ tad nimittam eva vaṇṇa tā sā ca vaṇṇa nissitā ti

original: abhedavasena vuttaṃ “uttamena parisuddhena vaṇṇenā”ti. Sarīraṃ pana sannivesavisiṭṭhaṃ
analyzed: abheda vasena vuttam uttamena parisuddhena vaṇṇena ati sarīram pana sannivesa visiṭṭham

original: karacaraṇagīvāsīsādisamudāyaṃ, tañca avayavabhūtena saṇṭhānanimittena gayhati, tasmā
analyzed: kara caraṇa gīvā sīsa ādi samudāyam tat ca avayava bhūtena saṇṭhāna nimittena tasmāt

original: tannimittameva pokkharatāti vuttaṃ “sarīrasaṇṭhānasampattiyā”ti, uttamāya sarīrasaṇṭhānasampattiyātipi
analyzed: tad nimittam eva pokkhara tā ti vuttam sarīra saṇṭhāna sampattiyā iti uttamāya sarīra saṇṭhāna sampattiyā atipi

original: yojetabbaṃ. Atthavasā hi liṅgavibhattivipariṇāmo. Sabbesu vaṇṇesu suvaṇṇavaṇṇova
analyzed: yojetabbam attha vasā hi liṅga vibhatti vipariṇāmaḥ sabbesu vaṇṇesu suvaṇṇa vaṇṇaḥ uva

original: uttamoti āha “parisuddhavaṇṇesupi seṭṭhena suvaṇṇavaṇṇena samannāgato”ti. Tathā hi
analyzed: uttamaḥ iti āha parisuddha vaṇṇesu pi seṭṭhena suvaṇṇa vaṇṇena samannāgataḥ ti tathā hi

original: buddhā, cakkavattino ca suvaṇṇavaṇṇāva honti. Yasmā pana vacchasasaddo sarīrābhe
analyzed: buddhā cakkavattino ca honti yasmā pana vacchasasaddaḥ sarīra ābhe

original: pavattati, tasmā brahmavacchasīti uttamasarīrābho, suvaṇṇābho icceva attho. Imameva
analyzed: pavattati tasmai uttama sarīra ābho suvaṇṇa ābho icca iva atthaḥ imam eva

original: hi atthaṃ sandhāya “mahābrahmuno sarīrasadiseneva sarīrena samannāgato”ti vuttaṃ,
analyzed: hi attham sandhāya mahābrahmuno sarīra sadisena iva sarīrena samannāgataḥ iti vuttam

original: na brahmujugattataṃ. Okāsoti sabbaṅgapaccaṅgaṭṭhānaṃ. Ārohapariṇāhasampattiyā, avayavapāripūriyā
analyzed: na okāsaḥ ti sabbaṅga paccaṅga ṭhānam āroha pariṇāha sampattiyā avayava pāripūriyā

original: ca dassanassa okāso na khuddakoti attho. Tenāha “sabbānevā”tiādi.
analyzed: ca dassanassa okāsaḥ na khuddakaḥ ti attho tena āha sabbān eva atiādi

original: Sīlanti yamaniyamalakkhaṇaṃ sīlaṃ, taṃ panassa rattaññutāya vuddhaṃ vaddhitanti visesato
analyzed: sīlanti yama niyama lakkhaṇam sīlam tam panassa rattaññu tāya vuddham vaddhitam ti visesato

original: “vuddhasīlī”ti vuttaṃ. Vuddhasīlenāti sabbadā sammāyogato vuddhena dhuvasīlena. Evañca
analyzed: vuddha sīlī iti vuttam vuddha sīlena ati sabbadā sammāyogato vuddhena dhuva sīlena evam ca

original: katvā padattayampetaṃ adhippetatthato visiṭṭhaṃ hoti, saddatthamattaṃ pana sandhāya
analyzed: katvā adhippeta tthataḥ visiṭṭham hoti sadda ttha mattam pana sandhāya

original: “idaṃ vuddhasīlīpadasseva vevacana”nti vuttaṃ. Pañcasīlato paraṃ tattha sīlassa abhāvato,
analyzed: idam vuddha sīlī padassa iva vevacanan ti vuttam pañca sīlato param tattha sīlassa abhāvato

original: tesamajānanato ca “pañcasīlamattamevā”ti āha.
analyzed: ca āha

original: Vācāya parimaṇḍalapadabyañjanatā eva sundarabhāvoti vuttaṃ “sundarā parimaṇḍalapadabyañjanā”ti.
analyzed: vācāya parimaṇḍala pada byañjana tā eva vuttam sundarā parimaṇḍala pada byañjanā ati

original: Ṭhānakaraṇasampattiyā, sikkhāsampattiyā ca kassacipi anūnatāya parimaṇḍalapadāni
analyzed: ṭhāna karaṇa sampattiyā sikkhā sampattiyā ca kassacipi anūna tāya parimaṇḍala padāni

original: byañjanāni akkharāni etissāti parimaṇḍalapadabyañjanā. Akkharameva hi taṃtadatthavācakabhāvena
analyzed: byañjanāni akkharāni etissā ati parimaṇḍala pada byañjanāḥ akkharam eva hi tat tat attha vācaka bhāvena

original: paricchinnaṃ padaṃ. Atha vā padameva atthassa byañjakattā byañjanaṃ, sithiladhanitādiakkharapāripūriyā
analyzed: paricchinnam padam atha vā padam eva atthassa byañjaka ttā byañjanam sithila dhanitā ādi akkhara pāripūriyā

original: ca padabyañjanassa parimaṇḍalatā, parimaṇḍalaṃ padabyañjanametissāti tathā. Apica
analyzed: ca pada byañjanassa parimaṇḍala tā parimaṇḍalam pada byañjanam etissā ati tathā api ca

original: pajjati attho etenāti padaṃ, nāmādi, yathādhippetamatthaṃ byañjetīti byañjanaṃ, vākyaṃ,
analyzed: pajjati atthaḥ etena ati padam nāma ādi yathā adhippetam attham byañjeti iti byañjanam vākyam

original: tesaṃ paripuṇṇatāya parimaṇḍalapadabyañjanā. Atthaviññāpane sādhanatāya vācāva karaṇaṃ
analyzed: tesam paripuṇṇa tāya parimaṇḍala pada byañjanāḥ attha viññāpane sādhana tāya vācā ava karaṇam

original: vākkaraṇanti tulyādhikaraṇataṃ dassetuṃ “udāharaṇaghoso”ti vuttaṃ, vacībhedasaddoti
analyzed: vāc karaṇam ti tulya adhikaraṇa tam dassetum udāharaṇa ghoso ti vuttam vacī bheda saddo ti

original: attho. Tassa brāhmaṇassa, tena vā bhāsitabbassa atthassa guṇaparipuṇṇabhāvena pūre
analyzed: atthaḥ tassa brāhmaṇassa tena vā bhāsitabbassa atthassa guṇa paripuṇṇa bhāvena pūre

original: guṇehi paripuṇṇabhāve bhavāti porī. Puna pureti rājadhānīmahānagare. Bhavattāti saṃvaḍḍhattā.
analyzed: guṇehi paripuṇṇa bhāve bhavāti porī puna purā iti rājadhānī mahā nagare bhavattā ati saṃvaḍḍhattā

original: Sukhumālattanenāti sukhumālabhāvena, iminā tassā vācāya mudusaṇhattamāha. Apalibuddhāyāti
analyzed: sukhu mālattanena ati sukhu māla bhāvena iminā tassāḥ vācāya apalibuddhāya iti

original: pittasemhādīhi apariyonaddhāya, hetugabbhapadametaṃ. Tato eva hi yathāvuttadosābhāvoti.
analyzed: pitta semha ādīhi a pariyonaddhāya hetu gabbha padam etam tatas eva hi yathā vutta dosa abhāvā ti

original: Ḍaṃsetvā viya ekadesakathanaṃ sandiṭṭhaṃ, saṇikaṃ cirāyitvā kathanaṃ vilambitaṃ,
analyzed: ḍaṃsetvā viya eka desa kathanam sandiṭṭham saṇikam cirāyitvā kathanam vilambitam

original: “sanniddhavilambitādī”tipi pāṭho. Saddena ajanakaṃ vacinaṃ, mammakasaṅkhātaṃ vā ekakkharameva
analyzed: sanniddha vilambita ādi iti pi saddena ajanakam mammaka saṅkhātam vā eka kkharam eva

original: dvattikkhattumuccāraṇaṃ sanniddhaṃ. Ādisaddena dukkhalitānukaḍḍhitādīni saṅgaṇhāti.

original: 309. Anonatakāyavasena thaddhagatto, na mānavasena. Tena pāḷiyaṃ vakkhati “abbhunnāmetvā”ti. Cetovitakkaṃ sandhāya cittasīsena “cittaṃ aññāsī”ti vuttaṃ. Vighātanti cittadukkhaṃ.

original: 311. Sakasamayeti brāhmaṇaladdhiyaṃ. Mīyamānoti mariyamāno. Diṭṭhisañjānanenevāti

original: Tā hi ito bāhirakānampi ijjhanti. Na ajjhattikā bhagavatā sāmukkaṃsikabhāvena appaveditattā.
analyzed: tāḥ hi itas bāhirakānam pi ijjhanti na ajjhattikāḥ bhagavatā sāmukkaṃsika bhāvena a pavedita ttā

original: Na hi te saccāni viya sāmukkaṃsikā. Yadatthanti yesaṃ atthāya, abhedepi bhedavacanametaṃ,
analyzed: na hi te saccāni sāmukkaṃsikāḥ atthāya abhede pi bheda vacanam etam

original: yassa vā visesanabhūtassa atthāya. Teti ariyaphaladhamme. “Ta”ntipi adhunā pāṭho.

original: Te hi sacchikātabbā, “atthi kho mahāli aññeva dhammā…pe… yesaṃ sacchikiriyāhetu bhikkhū
analyzed: te hi sacchikātabbāḥ atthi kho mahāli aññā iva dhammāpe yesam sacchikiriyā hetu bhikkhū

original: mayi brahmacariyaṃ carantī”ti sacchikātabbadhammā ca idha vuttā.
analyzed: mayi brahmacariyam caranti iti sacchikātabba dhammā ca idha vuttā

original: Catuariyaphalavaṇṇanā
analyzed: catuariya phala vaṇṇanā

original: 373. Saṃyojentīti bandhenti. Tasmāti yasmā vaṭṭadukkhabhaye saṃyojanato tattha satte
analyzed: saṃyojenti iti bandhenti tasmā iti yasmā vaṭṭa dukkha bhaye saṃyojanato tattha satte

analyzed: ācariyena a vaṇṇita ttā magga sotam āpanno na pasāda ādi sotam soto ti bhikkhave ariya maggassa etam

original: adhivacana”nti hi vuttaṃ. Āpannoti ca ādito pattoti attho ā-upasaggassa ādikammani

analyzed: pana magga sotam āpajjati nāma tena iva āha dakkhiṇa vibhaṅge sotāpanne dānam deti sotāpatti phala sacchikiriyāya

analyzed: paṭipanne dānam deti iti a patana dhammaḥ ti anupapajjana sabhāvaḥ dhamma niyāmena ati upari magga dhamma niyāmena

original: Heṭṭhimantena sattamabhavato upari anupapajjanadhammatāya vā niyatoti aṭṭhakathāmuttakanayo.
analyzed: heṭṭhimantena sattama bhavataḥ upari anupapajjana dhamma tāya vā niyataḥ ti aṭṭhakathā muttaka nayo

original: cettha luttaniddiṭṭho.

analyzed: paññā vimuttin ti ettha api esa iva nayo tena āha paññā vimutti iti

original: Sāmanti attanāva, aparappaccayenāti attho. “Abhijānitvā”ti iminā tvādipaccayakāriyassa
analyzed: sāmanti apara ppaccayena ati atthaḥ abhijānitvā iti iminā tu ādi paccaya kāriyassa

original: Sacchīti paccakkhatthe nepātikaṃ. Paccakkhakaraṇaṃ nāma anussavākāraparivitakkādike
analyzed: sacchi iti paccakkha atthe nepātikam paccakkhakaraṇam nāma anussava ākāra parivitakka ādike

analyzed: ariya aṭṭhaṅgika magga vaṇṇanā

original: Dullabhasukho bhavissāmi duggatīsu upapattiyāti adhippāyo. Asakkontoti ettha antasaddo bhāvalakkhaṇe, asakkuṇamāne satīti attho.

analyzed: asuka ṭṭhānataḥ ti asuka bhavataḥ āgatā ati upapatti vasena idha āgatā idāni gantabba ṭṭhānam ca ati

analyzed: diṭṭhadhammikassa samparāyikassa ca atthassa sādhana vasena pavattiyāḥ garuka ttā

original: na koci na sādhūti vadati. Pañcavidhaṃ veranti pāṇātipātādipañcavidhaveraṃ. Tañhi
analyzed: na koci na sādhu iti vadati pañcavidham pāṇa atipāta ādi pañcavidha veram tat hi

analyzed: pañcavidhassa sīlassa paṭipakkha bhāvato sattānam vera hetutāya ca veranti vuccati

analyzed: tatas eva ca tam na koci sādhu iti vadati tathā diṭṭhadhammika ādi atthānam asādhanato

original: Dassanīyadassanattho hi cakkhupaṭilābhoti tesamadhippāyo. Ayameva nayo sotādīsupi.

original: Tesūti kotūhalasālāyaṃ sannipatitesu nānātitthiyasamaṇabrāhmaṇesu. Ekacceti eke.
analyzed: tesu iti kotūhala sālāyam sannipatitesu nānā titthiya samaṇa brāhmaṇesu ekacca iti eke

original: Purimoti “ahetū appaccayā purisassa saññā uppajjantipi nirujjhantipī”tiādinā vuttavādī.
analyzed: purimaḥ ti ahetū appaccayā purisassa saññā uppajjanti pi nirujjhanti pi itiādinā vutta vādī

original: Etthāti catūsu vādīsu. Yvāyaṃ idha uppajjatīti sambandho. Samāpattinti asaññībhavāvahaṃ

original: pañcavokārabhave saññāya uppādo, tadubhayampi hetuṃ avisayatāya apassanto.

original: Dutiyoti “saññā hi bho purisassa attā”tiādinā vuttavādī. Nanti paṭhamavādiṃ. Nisedhetvāti
analyzed: dutiyaḥ ti saññā hi bho purisassa attā atiādinā vutta vādī paṭhama vādim nisedhetvā iti

analyzed: vakkhati hi visaññī hutvā ati cattālīsa nipāte āgata nayena migasiṅga tāpasa vatthum

original: santāpanato attantapo. Dukkaratapatāya ghoratapo tibbatapo. Nibbisevanabhāvāpādanena

original: sandhāyāha. Tañhi tathārūpapaccayā kadāci uṇhaṃ, kadāci thaddhaṃ, kadāci calitaṃ

original: Catutthoti “santi hi bho devatā mahiddhikā”tiādinā vuttavādī. Yakkhadāsīnanti devadāsīnaṃ,

analyzed: ahetuka saññā uppāda nirodha kathā vaṇṇanā

analyzed: kāraṇassa iva nāman ti yam pana pāḷiyam vuttam sa hetū hi poṭṭhapāda sa paccayā purisassa

original: nāma. Pubbābhogavasena hi jhānaṃ pakappento idha “cetetī”ti vutto. Abhisaṅkharontovāti
analyzed: nāma pubba ābhoga vasena hi jhānam pakappentaḥ idha ceteti iti vuttaḥ abhisaṅkharontaḥ vā ati

original: tattha appahīnanikantikatāvasena āyūhanto eva. Nābhisaṅkharotīti tathā heṭṭhimajhānesu
analyzed: tattha appahīna nikantika tā vasena āyūhantaḥ eva na abhisaṅkharoti iti tathā heṭṭhima jhānesu

original: viya vā pubbābhogābhāvato nāyūhati nāma. “Ahametaṃ jhānaṃ nibbattemi upasampādemi
analyzed: viya vā pubba ābhoga abhāvataḥ na āyūhati nāma aham etam jhānam nibbattemi upasampādemi

original: samāpajjāmī”ti hi evaṃ abhisaṅkharaṇaṃ tattha sālayasseva hoti, na anālayassa, tasmā
analyzed: samāpajjāmi iti hi evam abhisaṅkharaṇam tattha sa ālayassa iva hoti na an ālayassa tasmā

original: ekadvicittakkhaṇikampi jhānaṃ pavattento tattha appahīnanikantikatāya “abhisaṅkharonto
analyzed: eka dvi citta khaṇikam pi jhānam pavattento tattha appahīna nikantika tāya abhisaṅkharonto

original: evā”ti vutto. Yasmā panassa tathā heṭṭhimajhānesu viya vā tattha pubbābhogo natthi,
analyzed: eva ati vuttaḥ yasmā pana assa tathā heṭṭhima jhānesu viya vā tattha pubbābhogo natthi

original: tasmā “na abhisaṅkharotī”ti vuttaṃ. “Imassa bhikkhuno”tiādi vuttassevatthassa vivaraṇaṃ.
analyzed: tasmā na abhisaṅkharoti iti vuttam imassa bhikkhuno tiādi vuttassa iva atthassa vivaraṇam

original: Tattha yasmā imassa…pe… atthi, tasmā “na ceteti, nābhisaṅkharotī”ti ca vuttanti adhippāyo.
analyzed: tattha yasmai atthi tasmai na cetā iti na abhisaṅkharoti iti ca vuttam ti adhippāyaḥ

original: Ābhogasamannāhāroti ābhogasaṅkhāto, ābhogavasena vā cittassa ārammaṇābhimukhaṃ, ārammaṇassa

original: vā cittābhimukhaṃ anvāhāro. “Svāyamattho”tiādinā tadevatthaṃ upamāya paṭipādeti.
analyzed: vā citta abhimukham anvāhāro svāyam atthā iti ādinā tad evattham upamāya paṭipādeti

original: Puttagharācikkhaṇenāti puttagharassa ārocananayena.
analyzed: putta ghara ācikkhaṇena ati putta gharassa ārocana nayena

original: Gantvā ādāya āgatanti sambandho. Pacchābhāgeti āsanasālāya pacchimadisāyaṃ ṭhitassa
analyzed: gantvā ādāya āgatanti sambandho pacchābhāgā iti āsana sālāya ṭhitassa

original: pitugharassa pacchābhāge. Tatoti puttagharato. Laddhagharamevāti yatonena bhikkhā
analyzed: pitu gharassa pacchābhāge tato ti putta gharataḥ laddha gharam eva ati yato nena bhikkhā

original: laddhā, tameva gharaṃ puttagehameva. Āsanasālā viya ākiñcaññāyatanasamāpatti tato
analyzed: laddhā tam eva gharam putta geham eva āsana sālā viya ākiñcaññāyatana samāpatti tatas

original: pitugharaputtagharaṭṭhāniyānaṃ nevasaññānāsaññāyatananirodhasamāpattīnaṃ upagantabbato.

original: Pitugehaṃ viya nevasaññānāsaññāyatanasamāpatti amanasikātabbato, majjhe ṭhitattā

original: ācikkhaṇaṃ viya ekaṃ dve cittavāre samāpajjitabbampi nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ amanasikaritvā
analyzed: ācikkhaṇam viya ekam dve citta vāre samāpajjitabbam pi nevasaññānāsaññāyatanam a manasikaritvā

original: parato nirodhasamāpattatthāya eva manasikāro daṭṭhabbo. Evaṃ amanasikārasāmaññena,
analyzed: paratas nirodha samāpatta tthāya eva manasikāraḥ daṭṭhabbo evam amanasikāra sāmaññena

original: manasikārasāmaññena ca upamopameyyatā vuttā ācikkhaṇenapi manasikārasseva jotanato.

original: Na hi manasikārena vinā ācikkhaṇaṃ sambhavati.
analyzed: na hi manasikārena vinā ācikkhaṇam sambhavati

original: Tā jhānasaññāti ekaṃ dve cittavāre pavattā nevasaññānāsaññāyatanajhānasaññā. Nirodhasamāpattiyañhi

original: Nirujjhantīti sarasavaseneva nirujjhanti, pubbābhisaṅkhārabalena pana upari anuppādo.
analyzed: nirujjhanti iti sa rasa vasena iva nirujjhanti pubba abhisaṅkhāra balena pana upari anuppādaḥ

original: Yathā ca jhānasaññānaṃ, evaṃ itarasaññānampīti āha “aññā cā”tiādi. Nuppajjanti yathāparicchinnakālanti

original: adhippāyo. So evaṃ paṭipanno bhikkhūti yathāvutte saññagge ṭhitabhāvena paṭipanno

original: bhikkhu, so ca kho anāgāmī vā arahā vā dvīhi phalehi samannāgamo, tiṇṇaṃ saṅkhārānaṃ
analyzed: bhikkhu so ca kho anāgāmī vā arahā vā dvīhi phalehi samannāgamaḥ tiṇṇam saṅkhārānaṃ

original: paṭippassaddhi, soḷasavidhā ñāṇacariyā, navavidhā samādhicariyāti imesaṃ vasena nirodhapaṭipādanapaṭipattiṃ
analyzed: soḷasavidhā ñāṇa cariyā navavidhā samādhi cariyā ati imesam vasena nirodha paṭipādana paṭipattim

analyzed: saññā vedayita nirodhan ti vuttā phusati iti ettha phusanam nāma vindanam paṭiladdhi iti

original: dasseti “vindati paṭilabhatī”ti iminā. Atthato pana vuttanayena yathāparicchinnakālaṃ
analyzed: dasseti vindati paṭilabhati iti iminā atthataḥ pana vutta nayena yathā paricchinna kālam

original: cittacetasikānaṃ sabbaso appavattiyeva.
analyzed: citta cetasikānam sabbaso appavattiyā iva

original: Niratthakatāya upasaggamattaṃ, tasmā saññā icceva attho. Nirodhapadena anantarikaṃ

analyzed: evam poṭṭhapādā ti ettha pana sampaṭicchana atthaḥ tathā iva anujānananti katvā tena āha

original: “suuggatitaṃ tayā’ti anujānanto”ti.

original: ca kiriyā hotiyeva yathā “aññena maggena yānena dīpikāya gacchatī”ti.

analyzed: tatas eva ca ittha jhāna ggahaṇena api kasiṇa jhānāni eva gahitāni iti veditabbam yathā

analyzed: pathavī kasiṇena karaṇa bhūtena ati tad ārammaṇikam jhānam a nāmasitvā vuttam evam paṭhama jhānena

analyzed: ayam pana ittha sāraḥ iti vibhāvetum tipiṭaka mahāsivatthera vādaḥ ābhataḥ tathā hi arahatta phala saññāya

original: vā, tattha saññā padhānā, tadanantarañca paccavekkhaṇañāṇanti tadubhayaṃ niddhārento

analyzed: saḥ pana thera vāde na phala samādhi saññā eva ati āha phala samādhi saññā paccayā ati arahatta phala samādhi sahagata saññā paccayā ati

original: gahetvā tathā paññapenti. Lokathūpikā nāma brahmabhūmi vuccati lokassa thūpikasadisatāparikappanena.
analyzed: gahetvā tathā paññapenti lokathūpikā nāma brahma bhūmi vuccati lokassa thūpika sadisa tā parikappanena

original: Keci pana “nevasaññānāsaññāyatanabhūmiṃ lokathūpikā”ti vadanti, tadayuttaṃ aṭṭhakathāsu
analyzed: keci pana nevasaññānāsaññāyatana bhūmim lokathūpikā iti vadanti tat ayuttam aṭṭhakathāsu

analyzed: tathā avacanataḥ ādi saddena ca ittha aññaḥ purisaḥ aññā pakatī iti pakati purisa antara avabodho

original: mokkho, buddhiādiguṇavinimuttassa attano asakattani avaṭṭhānaṃ mokkho, kāyavipattikati
analyzed: mokkhaḥ buddhi ādi guṇa vinimuttassa attanaḥ avaṭṭhānam mokkho

original: jātibandhānaṃ apavajjanavasena appavatto mokkho, parena purisena palokatā mokkho,
analyzed: jāti bandhānam apavajjana vasena appavattaḥ mokkho parena purisena paloka tā mokkho

original: taṃsamīpatā mokkho, taṃsamāyogo mokkhoti evamādīnaṃ saṅgaho daṭṭhabbo. Tasmiṃ tasmiñhi
analyzed: tad samīpa tā mokkho tad samāyogaḥ mokkho ti evamādīnam saṅgahaḥ daṭṭhabbo tasmin tasmin hi

original: samaye niṭṭhaṃ apaññapento nāma natthi. Brāhmaṇānaṃ paṭhamajjhānabrahmaloko niṭṭhā.
analyzed: samaye niṭṭham a paññapentaḥ nāma natthi brāhmaṇānam paṭhamajjhāna brahmalokaḥ niṭṭhā

original: Tattha hi nesaṃ niccābhiniveso yathā taṃ bakassa brahmuno, vekhanasāditāpasānaṃ ābhassarā,
analyzed: tattha hi na īsam nicca abhinivesaḥ yathā tam bakassa brahmunaḥ ābhassarā

original: sañcayādiparibbājakānaṃ subhakiṇhā, ājīvakānaṃ “anantamānaso”ti parikappito asaññībhavo.
analyzed: sañcaya ādi paribbājakānam subha kiṇhā ājīvakānam ananta mānasaḥ ti parikappitaḥ asaññībhavaḥ

original: Imasmiṃ pana sāsane arahattaṃ niṭṭhā, sabbepi cete diṭṭhivasena brahmalokādīni arahattamaññanāya
analyzed: imasmim pana sāsane arahattam niṭṭhā sabbe pi ca ite diṭṭhi vasena brahma loka ādīni arahatta maññanāya

analyzed: nibbānam nibbānanti vacana sāmañña mattam gahetvā tathā paññapenti na pana paramatthato

original: nesaṃsamaye nibbānapaññāpanassa labbhanatoti āha “sā ca na niyyānikā”tiādi. Yathāpaññattāti
analyzed: nibbāna paññāpanassa labbhanato ti āha sā ca na niyyānikā atiādi yathā paññattā ti

original: yena yena pakārena paññattā, paññattappakārā hutvāti attho. Na niyyātīti “yenākārena
analyzed: yena yena pakārena paññattā paññatta ppakārā hutvā ati atthaḥ na niyyāti iti yena ākārena

original: niṭṭhā pāpuṇīyatī”ti tehi paveditā, tenākārena tassā apattabbatāya na niyyāti. Paṇḍitehi
analyzed: niṭṭhā pāpuṇīyati iti tehi paveditā tena ākārena tassāḥ a pattabba tāya na niyyāti paṇḍitehi

analyzed: paṭikkhittā nivattati iti paṭikkhepa kāraṇa vacanam yasmā tehi paññattā niṭṭhā paṭipadā

original: nivattati, tasmā paṇḍitehi paṭikkhittāti attho. Tanti aniyyānikabhāvaṃ.
analyzed: nivattati tasmā paṇḍitehi paṭikkhittā ti attho aniyyānika bhāvam

original: Jānaṃ, passanti ca puthuvacanavipariyāyoti āha “jānantā passantā”ti. Gacchantādisaddānañhi
analyzed: jānam passanti ca puthuvacana vipariyāyaḥ ti āha jānantā passantā ati gacchanta ādi saddānam hi

original: vipariyāyo, jānantīti attho. “Yācaṃ adadamappiyo”tiādīsu vibhattivasena, yācantassāti
analyzed: vipariyāyaḥ jānanti iti atthaḥ yācam adadam appiyaḥ iti ādīsu vibhatti vasena yācantassa ati

original: attho. Idha pana puthuvacanavasenāti veditabbaṃ. Padhānaṃ jānanaṃ nāma paccakkhato
analyzed: atthaḥ idha pana puthuvacana vasena ati veditabbam padhānam jānanam nāma paccakkhataḥ

original: jānanaṃ tassa jeṭṭhabhāvato, dassanamappadhānaṃ tassa saṃsayānubandhattāti ayaṃ kamo
analyzed: jānanam tassa jeṭṭha bhāvataḥ dassanam appadhānam tassa saṃsaya anubandha ttā ati ayam kamo

original: vutto “jānaṃ passa”nti. Tenettha jānanena dassanaṃ viseseti. Evañhi diṭṭhapubbāni
analyzed: vuttaḥ jānam passanti tena ittha jānanena dassanam viseseti evam hi diṭṭha pubbāni

original: kho tasmiṃ loke manussānaṃ sarīrasaṇṭhānādīnīti ekato adhippāyadassanaṃ sūpapannaṃ
analyzed: kho tasmin loke manussānam sarīra saṇṭhāna ādīni iti ekatas adhippāya dassanam su upapannam

original: hoti. Ayañhetthādhippāyo “kiṃ tumhākaṃ ekantasukhe loke paccakkhato ñāṇadassanaṃ
analyzed: hoti ayam ha itthā adhippāyaḥ kim tumhākam ekanta sukhe loke paccakkhataḥ ñāṇa dassanam

original: atthī”ti. Jānanti vā tassa lokassa anumānavisayataṃ vuccati, passanti paccakkhato
analyzed: atthi iti jānanti vā tassa lokassa anumāna visaya tam vuccati passanti paccakkhataḥ

original: visayataṃ. Idaṃ vuttaṃ hoti “api tumhākaṃ loko paccakkhato ñāto, udāhu anumānato”ti.
analyzed: visaya tat idam vuttam hoti api tumhākam lokaḥ paccakkhataḥ ñātaḥ udāhu anumānato ti

analyzed: atthena adhippāyam dassetum diṭṭha pubbāni itiādi vuttam diṭṭha padena vā dassanam

original: tadanugatañca jānanaṃ gahetvā tadubhayeneva atthena adhippāyaṃ vibhāvetuṃ evaṃ vuttantipi
analyzed: tad anugatam ca jānanam gahetvā tad ubhayena iva atthena adhippāyam vibhāvetum evam vutta nti pi

analyzed: daṭṭhabbam diṭṭha pubbāni iti hi dassanena tad anugatena ca ñāṇena gahita pubbāni iti

original: attho. Evañca katvā “sarīrasaṇṭhānādīnī”ti samariyādavacanaṃ samatthitaṃ hoti. “Appāṭihīrakata”nti
analyzed: evam ca katvā sarīra saṇṭhāna ādīni iti samariyāda vacanam samatthitam hoti appāṭihīrakatanti

original: ayaṃ anunāsikalopaniddesoti āha “appāṭihīrakaṃ ta”nti. Taṃ vacanaṃ appāṭihīrakaṃ

original: tadayuttaṃ samāsasambhavato, anunāsikalopassa ca avattabbattā. Evamettha vaṇṇayanti

original: – paṭipakkhaharaṇato paṭihāriyaṃ, tadeva pāṭihāriyaṃ. Attanā uttaravirahitavacanaṃ.

original: Sauttarañhi vacanaṃ tena uttaravacanena paṭiharīyati viparivattīyati, tasmā uttaravacanaṃ

analyzed: abhāvataḥ aniyyānikanti vattabba tam labhati tena vuttam aniyyānikanti

original: 426. Vilāso itthilīḷā, yo “siṅgārabhāvajā kiriyā”tipi vuccati. Ākappo kesabandhavatthaggahaṇādiākāraviseso,
analyzed: vilāsaḥ itthi līḷā siṅgāra bhāva jā kiriyā atipi vuccati ākappo kesa bandha vattha ggahaṇa ādi ākāra viseso

analyzed: tayā uatta paṭilābha vaṇṇanā

analyzed: āhitaḥ ahaṃmānaḥ ettha ati attā atta bhāvaḥ iti āha atta bhāva paṭilābhaḥ iti katham

original: Paṭhamajjhāne paṭiladdhamatte hīnabhāvato pīti dubbalā pāmojjapakkhikā, subhāvite

analyzed: tīra dassīsa kuṇūpamā vaṇṇanā

Lohiccabrāhmaṇavatthuvaṇṇanā

original: 502. “Kiñhi paro parassa karissatī”ti parānukampā virahitattā lāmakaṃ. Na tu ucchedasassatānaṃ
